choices: Hunter goes to the athletic field at school.
1.content:
The bell rang at exactly 3:00, signalling the end of another school day. The eager students packed their bags and left as the teachers yelled after them about remembering the homework. One of the last students left in the room was Hunter.

Hunter was a 13 year old anthro tiger, still in middle school. He was of average height and intelligence, and he was somewhat scrawny, though he wished he was bigger. He was nice, but he was somewhat depressed about one major thing: his stepfather.

His parents had died in a mysterious accident when he was younger (according to his stepfather at least), so Hunter was adopted by his stepfather. However, it turned out that Hunter's stepfather was a cruel man who had only adopted Hunter to use him for things he was too lazy to do himself. He yelled at Hunter whenever he did anything slightly wrong, never let him have sweets, never let him have friends over, made him clean and mow the yard, paint their rundown house, and just plain treated Hunter badly. It was a good thing that Hunter was kind and optimistic, or he would be seriously anti-social.

That considered, Hunter still led a relatively nice life. His stepfather did give him a few luxuries and he did have a few friends. However, those friends were nowhere to be found as Hunter left school, so he began to walk down the street towards home.

As Hunter walked passed a dark alleyway, he thought he heard a voice coming from the alley.

"Hunter... Hunter..." the voice called out to him.

Hunter, now curious at to who could be calling him, stepped into the dark alley. He thought at the other end he saw something glowing, but he figured that was impossible. However, as he got closer, he realized that he was right. There was a tall tiger standing there, and he gave off a bright, radiant light.

"Hunter... I need to tell you something..." the tiger said in a soft yet manly voice.

"Who are you? How do you know my name?" Hunter asked, curious but frightened.

"Why, I'm an angel from above, here to bring you a message." the tiger said.

Hunter paused. He wasn't sure whether to believe the tiger or not, but something compelled him to believe the strange tiger. "Who's the message from?" Hunter asked.

"It's a message from your parents," the angel said.

Hunter was in shock. "My parents? What do you mean?" he asked.

"Hunter, your parents were no ordinary tigers," the angel said. "They never died like you have been told. Your parents are the great tiger gods, and you are their son!"

Hunter nearly fainted from shock and disbelief. His parents, gods? Normally he wouldn't believe anyone if they said that, but this tiger WAS an angel, so it was hard not to.

"So, what does that mean for me?" Hunter asked.

"You are a demigod! As the son of the tiger gods, you have the power to do whatever you wish! Simply think of what you want and it will happen. You could alter the universe with a simple thought!" the angel said.

Hunter's head was spinning with this new, amazing information. He couldn't believe he could do whatever he wanted! It was unbelievable. He barely managed to talk to the angel.

"Ummm.... thank you for telling me," Hunter said sheepishly.

"Your welcome. I must go now, Hunter. Use your power wisely!" the angel called out before he suddenly disappeared in a puff of smoke.

Hunter staggered out of the alley, a new outlook on life. He could do anything he wanted now! The possibilities were endless. And whatever Hunter did, he could simply make it so that no one would think anything unusual of it! Many ideas popped into Hunter's head on what to do first...
1.title: Divine Revelation

choices: Hunter wishes to be even more muscular.
Hunter goes home to his stepfather.
11.content:
Hunter thought about his new powers. He never would have guessed that his parents were gods. His whole life was changed! He could do anything he wanted! Hunter didn't know where to start.

One thing came to Hunter's mind: his muscles. He had always been a weak kid, never even having a little bit of muscle on his body. But now he could change that. He had all the power in the world now. So Hunter focused on his first change: his muscles.

Hunter felt the intense power build up in his muscles as he prepared for what was going to happen. It felt like an explosion inside his body as his muscles began to swell up. His pecs grew and shifted, widening his body and pushing out with great power. His abs also bulged out, forming a solid 6-pack to make his stomach rock hard. His legs thickened, pushing against each other like large trees. His biceps blew up like basketballs, being help up by Hunter's thick forearms. Finally, as Hunter was beginning to feel cramped, his bones shifted and he grew to over seven feet tall to allow his godly muscles room to move.

Hunter was sweating and panting once the growth ended, energy being sapped out of him. However, he quickly got over it, his new muscles giving him energy like he had never felt before. He truly felt like a god.

As Hunter looked over his muscles, he realized that people would notice him suddenly becoming a bodybuilder. So, with just another thought, the world instantly changed, and Hunter had always been a muscular bodybuilder.

Hunter noticed the new clothes one him, properly fitted for his new muscles. No one was staring at him, so he knew that reality had been changed. Hunter now wondered what else he could do to make his life better...
11.title: Hunter makes himself more muscular.

choices: Hunter wishes to have a more mature body.
Hunter wishes for his stepdad to accept him.
111.content:
Hunter looked good, he thought, but he could go even farther. He was a god!!!
With a single thought, his muscles began to ripple. His biceps grew to the point where they seemed to nearly tear his skin. His six pack rippled, and swelled, however so imposingly, to a solid, steel like ten pack. Hunter picked up a nail from the ground, and tied it into a knot. Now, how best to improve himself?
111.title: Hunter wishes to be even more muscular.

choices: He goes to see his friends.
1111.content: So it is thought, so it is done. Hunter's body poped as it grew nearly a foot. Under his pants, his genitals elongated, and became thicker, as his testicals swelled bigger every second. Within seconds, a large bump had formed in his jeans, and continued to grow. Hunters voice became deeper, and more mature.
1111.title: Hunter wishes to have a more mature body.

choices: Try powers by yourself some more
112.content:
Hunter couldn’t believe the power that pumped and flowed through his godly body. For a thirteen year old tiger, Hunter looked like twenty one year old! Hunter playfully squeezed his bicep and was thrilled to see it swell to great veiny peaks. He placed a paw over the bundle of power and could feel the strong warmth of his muscle struggling to get out of his arm. Hunter could literally feel his pulse streaming through his mighty arm.
Hunter then thought to himself, “If I look like a twenty one year old, why not be one?” He was a god after all. Why not have a body that matched his muscles? Hunter closed his eyes and pictured himself as twenty one years old. With little effort, Hunter could feel his whole body shifting. The power in his muscles ruptured but his muscles grew bigger to capture it again. His bones stretched making him taller and bigger. The process didn’t feel like anything to Hunter. It felt like a cool breeze creeping up his feet to his already rippled chest.
The tiger god opened his eyes again and saw his paws were bigger than ever before! His shirt somehow still maintained his new shape but he took it off to run his paws over his new solid 8 pack abs and his tree trunk legs. Hunter’s muscles were harder than diamonds! Excitedly, Hunter flexed his arms down while tensing his chest and legs. He could raw energy jumping across each cell on his new body. He felt like a boulder that no one could stop.
Hunter liked the body he had but he was curious about what face he had. With a snap of his meaty fingers, a hand held mirror flashed into his paw. Hunter held it up against his face gritted his teeth euphoniously. His face had clean cut cheekbones and slight facial hair covering a dimple in his chin. He gave a sexy smile to himself in approval.
Hunter began to love being a god more and more. If his powers could give him an amazing body, what else could they do? Hunter walked down the public streets confidently smiling at other people passing. People couldn’t stop staring at Hunter even when he altered reality to seem he was always a twenty one year old bodybuilder. But he didn’t care. He just wanted everyone to see and know the new Hunter.
112.title: Hunter wishes to be older.

1121.content:
Hunter couldn't help but keep noticing most everyone that walked around him , noticing what a lean and well-maintained physique the tiger had. Hunter just tried to focus on where he was going...wait, he wasn't even planning to go anywhere in the first place! Hunter puts on a sly grin, "Heh."

The tiger knees down on one knee, raising up his arms to show off his bulging arms. His biceps and forearms rippled with great definition. It wasn't much, but he could tell people from around him were taking notice. "Is he some sort of flash mob?" "What are ya, an idiot? A flash mob would need at least two people." "Oh yeah, right."

Anyways, Hunter stands back up, spreading his well-defined chest and lats for the small crowd. He then raises his hands to the back of his head, flexing his hardened biceps and even bouncing his thick pecs once or twice. "This guy ain't half bad.", remarks one guy. "He's a hunk!", cries out one gal.

Hunter was really enjoying himself with the crowd, he just didn't want to stop. He lowers his arms against his sides, pumping them with his abs and chest while he put on a proud grin. It's funny, Hunter never really thought he'd be this confindent with people before. Guess it helps to have a strong and muscular body. The next thing the muscled tiger does is raise his left arm up against his head, flexing his bicep all on its own. "Hm?"

Hunter takes notice a watch that he still wore. Looks like it's time for dinner. "Well, see ya guys. You were all great." A few of them were saddened, but Hunter had someplace he needed to be. As Hunter strutted his way a bit towards his home, he realizes something. He can't just show up at his house like this! No way would his stepdad not feel suspicious. What was the tiger to do? Should he just turn back to normal, or, maybe he can turn his dad, into a nice one...
1121.title: Street Performer

11212.content:
Hunter walked home nervously. He wondered what his stepfather would say to him when he saw him older and stronger. Hunter then remembered that he was a god. He could do whatever he wanted with a single thought, even his stepfather.

Hunter stopped at the front porch of his house. He thought that if he were to do anything with his dad, now would be the time to do it. The tiger god closed his eyes to concentrate on his stepdad being nice to him and knowing Hunter was a twenty one year old stud. Hunter opened his eyes again not knowing if his powers worked or not. There was only one way to find out. Hunter walked up to the front door and opened it.

The living room Hunter entered was deserted. There was no sign of his father anywhere. "Uh, Dad?" Hunter asked. "You home?" He then heard a booming voice coming from the kitchen but this voice had a tone of encouragement rather than threat. "Hey, Champ! I'm in here making dinner!"

Hunter walked to the kitchen making the floor of the house shake under his new weight of his muscles. He tilted his head to find a scruffy average joe tiger over the stove. "Dad?" asked Hunter trying to hide his fear. "Hey, Champ!" said his dad again. "Good to see you!"

Hunter's power worked! He made his dad nicer and made sure he never noticed his sudden growth. To his dad, he was always like that. "So, what's going on here?" asked Hunter.

"I'm making a healthy dinner for the both of us and I thought you and I could workout in the basement."

At first, Hunter had no idea what his dad was talking about. Then memories started flowing in his head. His dad had exercise equipment in the basement and the two of them exercise regularly to keep in shape. "Sure," replied Hunter. "That sounds great!"

After dinner, Hunter and his dad got changed into their gym clothes and made their way downstairs to the basement. The room had everything a bodybuilder could need: a stack of weights, weight benches, treadmills, and bars hanging from the ceiling. Hunter was very impressed with the equipment.

"Well, let's get to work!" said Hunter's stepdad.

Hunter's dad first made his way to the treadmill to warm himself up for more vigorous exercise. Hunter, on the other hand, wanted to find out what his muscles could really do besides attract an audience. He walked over the shelves of dumbbells looking for a decent sized ones to start with. He first spotted the fifty pound weights. He was skeptic but figured his muscles could handle the pressure.

Hunter wrapped the dumbbells with his paws ready to heave them up from the shelf. To Hunter's surprise, they were very light. They felt like pillows. He put them back to look for heavier ones. Hunter tested different sized weights to find the most challenging. After a few minutes, Hunter found the rights set of dumbbells at a hundred and fifty pounds! Hunter could feel the weights straining his arms making them thicker with veins popping out of his fur. Hunter loved that sight. He was looking at great power flowing through his godlike body. Hunter began pumping. It was challenging but he loved how dumbbells kept pushing more power into his muscles. He could get use to this new life.
11212.title: A New Dad and New Muscles

112122.content:
Hunter and his dad have spent the past twenty minutes doing nothing but working out. It was a good thing too, because Hunter was able to actually talk and get to know more about his father. As for the big tiger himself, he was feeling nothing but great adrenaline for his pumped body. After finishing another set of reps with a pair of 75-pound dumbbells, he sets them down and then turns his attention to a full-length mirror set against the wall in front of him. The first thing Hunter takes notice of were his thick peaks. He never ever thought he'd accquire such massive biceps or triceps in his life.

Hunter's father was sitting on a benching equipment, wiping his forehead with a towel from his most recent benching session. He then looks up at his son, who was starting to feel one arm while he flexes it as hard as he could against his head. His dad puts on a proud smile. Hunter was about ready to REALLY get into a pose-off with himself, but a sudden knock on the door eminates from upstairs. "Oh, Hunter, you mind gettin' that?"

Hunter turns to his dad, giving him a thumbs up, "Sure Dad, no problem." He was so excited about his new dad, he didn't even realize he was still shirtless once he runs upstairs and to the door. Oh well. Hunter turns the doorknob. Hunter was surprised to see a muscular dragon standing at his door. The dragon was at least a foot taller than him and looked a bit bigger than Hunter's. The dragon looked down at Hunter with a big smile. "Hey, little bro!" Hunter at first didn't know who this dragon was but his godly powers gave him new memories. The dragon's name was Adrian and he and Hunter have been best friends ever since they both started bodybuilding. They competed against each other in competitions, hung out together, and showed off sometimes.

Hunter shared the same smile to Adrian. "Hey, bro!" said Hunter. "Come on in!" Adrian watched his head and squeezed his giant arms as he went through the door. "What's up?" asked Hunter. Adrian chuckled. "Just thought I'd come over and hang out with my favorite little bro!" Hunter really liked the sound of that. He never had a friend that called him a brother before. "But seriously," continued Adrian, "It's such a beautiful day that I thought you and I could show off at the beach! Wouldn't that be cool?" Hunter couldn't help but smile at the thought of his muscular body in the water and sand, especially surrounded by girls. "That sounds awesome!" Adrian pumped his arms with enthusiasm. "Cool! I'm already wearing my suit underneath my clothes. Hurry up and change so we can go! The girls won't be there forever!" Hunter chuckled. "Okay, I'm going!" Hunter ran up stairs, two stepping them with great ease and he was in his room within seconds. He stopped in front of his drawers and began opening them, instead of the child's clothing he remembered when he woke up that morning, there were clothes made for a large adult and he begin rifling through them looking for a pair of beach shorts. In the bottom most drawer he found multiple pairs, a couple red with black stripes down the sides, a pair with grey and blue shorts and a pair of straight black shorts. he decided quickly on the pair of black shorts and quickly changed into them before bounding down the stairs again. "I'm ready to go!" Adrian grinned clamping a hand down on Hunter's shoulder. "Great, lets go little bro!" Hunter followed Adrian out the door and down the steps of his porch and they made a left turn, heading down the street.

Adrian walked ahead of Hunter, proudly showing off his body as he walked, getting plenty of stares of admiration. Hunter blushed a little and moved closer to Adrian and began copying the way he walked, trying to show off his well defined figure, getting quite a few stares himself. Hunter ate up the attention, grinning broadly and putting on a small show as they walked, flexing his massive biceps so they bulged and the veins popped out. Adrian turned around smiling at Hunter. "Hey bro, what do you say we put on a little show?"
112122.title: Hunter's Apparent New Friend

1121221.content:
Hunter smiles at his dragon friend, and then nods. "Yeah, why not?" The excited tiger goes on ahead, and kneels down on one knee and flexes up both of his arms. A couple people noticed Hunter, and started to crowd around to see what was going on. The pumped tiger then gets back up, turning his upper body around to show off his bulging back. Hunter's twitching ears were starting to overhear a couple people awe and 'ooh' around him. Suddenly, Adrian pulls his shirt right off, standing beside his flexing friend.

Adrian's immense and rippling body seemed to really reel in the crowd. "Eh. Wouldn't have minded taking my shirt off sooner anyway.", the big dragon shrugs. Adrian tosses his shirt off to the side, and then raises his arms up to flex them with his fists facing away from each other, showing off his mountainous peaks while putting on a big grin.

First thing Hunter notices, is that the people around them was starting to eye Adrian more than him. "Heh. Do I detect some competition here?" The rigorous tiger smirks as he prepares himself for his next pose against his etchy friend. With a simple thought, Hunter shrank his shirt with his powers. He could feel the fabric tightening to his fur. Just the way he wanted. After his shirt shrank, Hunter noticed how defined his chest looked under his shirt. His muscles literally looked like they were going to burst out of it. Hunter then raised his arms to the level of his shoulders. The crowd and Adrian could see Hunter's biceps tense to great peaks. The sleeves of his shirt seemed to melt on Hunter's fur.

Hunter then pushed his biceps harder. He gritted his teeth as everyone heard the slight tears coming from Hunter's sleeves. With a gentle growl, Hunter bursted his biceps out of the sleeves! The crowd and Adrian applauded him for his incredible feat. Adrian clapped his hand down on Hunter's shoulder. "Nice job little bro, glad to see you making full use of your strength, but now it's my turn" Adrian stepped back, curling my hands into fists as he flexed hard, his arms placed over his chest and abs as they bulged out into great peaks of muscle, his chest rippling with the very strength barely contained in his flesh, people watched in awe of his strength and began applauding again this time with Hunter int he crowd of onlookers. "That was amazing!" Hunter moved forward as Adrian relaxed a little, watching him in anticipation of what he did next. "You know I think I should get rid of this shirt, it's already ruined..." Hunter tensed his muscles and flex hard, making his chest bulge out, several veins popping up as there was a large tearing sound as Hunter's shirt was ripped apart, falling off his massive shoulders, inciting a large cheer from the crowd as Adrian looked on with pride clear on his face as he clapped.

Hunter and Adrian turned and faced one another with a smile. "You did a good job!" said Adrian. "You too!" replied Hunter. They both raised a claw and paw and smack them to together for a high five. But they didn't let go of each other's grip. They held their high five pose to ripple and flex their arms with incredible power. The crowd applauded and sensed that they were done.

"Thank you all!" said Adrian. "You all have been a lovely audience but right now my friend and I need to go." There were slight sounds of disappointment but the crowd understood. The people then dispersed leaving Hunter and Adrian by themselves. Adrian grabbed Hunter's shoulder tightly. "Ready to go to the beach?" he asked. Hunter nodded enthusiastically. "Let's go!"
1121221.title: Show Time!

11212211.content:
It was only a matter of time before the two weight-lifters reached the beach in record time, Adrian being the one to jog ahead of Hunter as he stands before the main entrance with his hands on his hips. "Ahhh... Salvation."

The fluffy tiger chuckles, "What're you talking about?"

"What? I love this place.", Adrian remarks with a wink. "Great place to show off what ya really got."

Hunter had his arms crossed over his burly chest, "More than that intersection we were just at?"

"Much more than that.", the big dragon replies. Hunter just chuckles again at his marvelous friend. Adrian flexes an arm in front of his chest to his friend, emphasizing the peak being flexed before him, "Now, why don't we change into something a little more...slimming."

Hunter points at his hilarious friend, "Slimming? You?"

"Oh, is that the wrong word?", Adrian remarks. "I meant to say...", the powerful dragon turns his upper body around in order to perform a back double-bicep for his friend, showing off his rippling back, "...something a little more, sportsman like."

The big tiger laughs to himself. "How did you mix THAT up?"

"No time for chit-chat, gotta get going." The muscular dragon runs off. Hunter follwed the dragon footprints in the sand and it led to a flexing Adrian in front of a group of girls. Hunter couldn't help but chuckle. That was very typical of Adrian. Hunter then smiled to himself thinking about how to get back at Adrian for getting at the girls first. He looked for a changing room across the beach and found one near a concession stand. The tiger god went to the first room closest to him. After closing the door, Hunter slipped out of his street clothes to reveal his swim suit that wrapped around his thighs tightly. They revealed tendons and strips of muscle so everyone could see the godly power Hunter possessed. Time to show what he was truly made of!

The moment Hunter stepped out to the blazing day, people instantly started staring at his amazing body. Hunter didn't mind. He just smiled as he made his way to Adrian's position. Hunter even toyed with the attention by pretending he had an itch on his chest and rub his paws against it. His confidence stayed at a high level until he saw Adrian and his audience. Hunter grinned, seeing it as a challenge to see how big a crowd he could pull in himself and he took a stance, reaching his arms up above his hand and clamping his hands together, pushing powerfully against one another so his muscles bulged and the veins popped. the crowd gasped excitedly and Hunter heard more than a few giggles from some girls watching.

Adrian turned, following the eyes of the crowd until he spotted Hunter and grinned, seeing what he was doing and immediately picked up on the challenge and prepared to give his own showase to the eager crowd. Adrian tensed his muscles, letting them ripple under his skin as Hunter finished up, a round of applause sounded from the crowd which quickly grew quiet in anticipation as they turned to Adrian who bulged out his biceps, squeezing his chest together letting it ripple and coil under his skin as he grabbed his left wrist,pushing down so his arms were almost completely straightened out, stretching out the biceps so they looked like two large footballs, with writhing veins in each one. The crowd gasped, their attention held by Adrian's big performance and Hunter gave a big grin, this was definitely going to be a big challenge for him, but he knew he could handle it.
11212211.title: Fun in the Sun

112122111.content:
Hunter has never been in such a tough competition before, even if it was only between him and his best friend. After the big dragon's last feat, Hunter's gonna have to do something pretty eye-catching to out-do the big guy. The ripped tiger just strokes his chin hair, plotting out what he can do to show Adrian up. After a moment's thought, Hunter comes up with with something. It's not much, but it's worth a try. The large feline suddenly stomps a foot out on the sand, making a loud enough sound to get everyone to look back at him.

Hunter bends down on one knee, his enormous thighs peaking outward quite well with thick definition. He then stretches his arms out and raises them up against his head, flexing out his bulging biceps while letting out a toothy grin that was enough to make a few ladies out there squeel with joy for the posing tiger. Adrian is bigger than Hunter, but way Hunter was flexing and the amount of muscle and tendons being flexed ot the brink, Hunter is practically as big as the dragon is now! The crowd behind Adrian cheers on for Hunter, who then gets up to perform his next pose. "Show-off." Adrian grinned, not wanting to let the crowd get disappointed as he stood up straight and tall, slowly spreading his legs a bit as he slid into his stance, arms raised up and moved behind his head, fingers interlocking as he tugged on each arm, his muscles bulged out massively, looking like rugged mountainous peaks of raw power, the more he tugged, the bigger the biceps seemed to get. the crowd gasped softly, small cheers here and there, growing steadily louder with each passing moment. Adrian gave a small laugh and flexed harder, the biceps pushing out to their peaks, large veins pushing out from the skin, inciting a loud applause from the crowd. Hunter smirked. "and you call ME a show-off?"

Hunter's words just added fuel to Adrian's passionate fire. While keeping his pose, the tough dragon centered his strength to his rippled chest. Adrian's pecs swelled like balloons while his abs grew more defined and revealed even the smallest muscles on his chest. The chest grew to envious proportions and made the crowd go wilder for Adrian than Hunter. The audience and Hunter were amazed as Adrian flexed his abs so hard that another row abs lightly defined his chest. Hunter thought to himself, "I stand corrected."

Adrian finally relaxed his pose even though it looked like his muscles still kept their tensed shape. The dragon raised his voice to the crowd. "Who do you think won this posedown?! Give a cheer for my little tiger bro if you think he won!" A solid audience clapped, cheered, and whistled for Hunter. Hunter responded by waving and flexing a single bicep. "Now," continued Adrian, "cheer if you guys think I won!" A humongous noise came from the crowd that Hunter covered his ears. It was clearly stated who won this posedown. Hunter was never a sore loser though. He was happy people liked his big dragon bro and knew that they liked him too.
112122111.title: Posedown!

1121221111.content:
Hunter wanted to congradulate his dragon friend, but he was still feeling pretty competitive himself. As Adrian raises his muscular arms up for the crowd, Hunter walks up in front of him. "Hunter!? What the...!?" The muscley tiger raises his arms up just like his friend, only trying harder to flex and pump up his arms. Still, they were nowhere near Adrian's, even while his arms weren't even being flexed. "Hey man, I think the crowd already have their sights set on me.", the big dragon remarks, setting his hands on his hips.

Hunter glances back, and then does just what his dragon friend was doing, only with A LOT more tensing and flexing, making his lats stick out like wings. Adrian raises an eyebrow, realizing what his pal is up to. "Oh. I see...", he utters in his head. Without noticing, Hunter just kept his pose, trying to attract as much attention as he could. After a moment, he takes a look back, his eyes growing wide. Holy cow! He never exactly got a glimpse of his pal's enlarged back muscles before. It didn't look like he was even flexing that hard, but he was still capable of earning such an impressive and rippled back! Then again, he does acquire such large wings.

As much as Hunter loved his best friend, he grew envious of Adrian's body. It was bigger, stronger, and more muscular than his own. Hunter wished that he had a body like Adrian's, maybe even bigger. Then it occurred to him, Hunter was a god. He could do whatever he wanted, even changing his own body some more. "Adrian," said Hunter, "I'm going to the bathroom." Adrian just kept on posing. "Okay, don't take too long though!" Hunter then walked towards the dressing rooms rather than the bathroom. The dressing rooms were more spacious. He got into one and covered the entrance. Hunter closed his eyes, thinking about growing taller, stronger, more muscular, there was the familiar sensation as his body began changing. His body growing taller, his biceps and triceps swelling to his old peak and growing even bigger, becoming great peaks of strength, his chest and abs growing bigger, more defined, his legs growing stronger, more defined. When Hunter opened his eyes, he was amazed at how much bigger he'd gotten, he felt extremely powerful.

Hunter rubbed his chest with his paw to see if his stronger muscles were real. Indeed they. Hunter flexed in every pose he could think of. He figured he was about the size of Adrian now. Hunter smirked to himself and thought, "Why be as big when I can be bigger?" Hunter closed his eyes again and pictured himself even bigger. The euphoric sensation came back again. Hunter could feel his muscles pushing against his skin and fur even more. Veins started popping out of his muscular peaks as his muscles grew even more stronger, bigger, and defined. Hunter stopped growing and opened his eyes to truly feel like a god. Hunter felt like he was the strongest and biggest around. Hunter smiled ready to show off the new him. Before leaving the changing room, Hunter quickly made everyone think he was always his new size and changed his bathing suit into a larger size (they were really tight against his thick thighs and waist).
1121221111.title: Sudden Makeover

11212211111.content:
Hunter stomped out of the dressing room ready to show the world his new look. He smiled as he walk across the blazing sand. Hunter was getting more stares than he did previously. He played with the stares by stretching his arms out making them tense and vascular. Hunter still felt incredible power running through his body and was enjoying every second if it. He truly felt like the happiest and strongest tiger in the world. Hunter stopped when he saw Adrian in sight. He figured it was time to say hello to his "little" bro.

Adrian was posing in front of a couple young lionesses. The muscle dragon got their attention more and more after each pose he performed. "Hey, Adrian!" said Hunter in a new deeper voice. Adrian and the lionesses turned to a giant tiger coming their way. The lionesses couldn't help but stare in awe of Hunter's gigantic muscles. Adrian smiled to Hunter. "Hey big bro!" said Adrian. Hunter chuckled to himself. He liked being called "Big Bro" Hunter clamped his hand down on Adriand's shoulder "Hey little bro, keeping the ladies entertained?" Adrian grinned "Not just them, eveyone loves the show we've been putting on." Hunter laughed "I bet so, how about I really give them something to watch." Adrian looked a little puzzled at first before Hunter intertwined his fingers. "Climb on up bro" Adrian grinned wickedly knowing what Hunter had planned, placing his foot onto Hunter's interlocked fingers.

Hunter took a deep breath, lifting up and the crowd took a very audible breath as Adrian was lifted into the air, pulling a classic pose of raising his arms up on both sides, bulging out his biceps and the crowd cheered. The lionesses couldn't keep their eyes off of Hunter. After seeing lift a giant dragon as if he was nothing, they gave the tiger god his full attention. Hunter put Adrian down back on the sand and Adrian stood proudly by his new big bro. "That was amazing!" said one of the girls. "I never seen such a strong tiger before!" Hunter looked down at the two of them and chuckles slightly. "Want to see how strong I really am?" he asked them.

Hunter kneeled on one knee to the lionesses level and raised an arm for them to behold. He then pushed against his arm to form a big strong mountain of a bicep. The girls were amazed how big Hunter's muscles were up close. "You two want to feel?" Without hesitation and without overeagerness, the girls places their paws on Hunter's bulking arm. It felt incredible to them. It was soft from his fur but at the same time hard from the power it possessed. The girls stroked his bicep up and down and they failed to wrap their paws around it completely. The girls grew shy as Hunter's muscles felt like they were going to explode with power. Their shyness grew more as Hunter winked at them. Adrian placed his hand on Hunter's shoulder. Hunter began purring himself, enjoying this amazing massage from the lioness. Hunter literally felt like he was floating in heaven. He was floating aimlessly feeling nothing but pleasure. His grin grew wider after each rubbing stroke from the lioness. It was about time he did something for her. Hunter sat up meeting her face to face still floating in the water. The lioness didn't know what he was doing until he wrapped her body into his mountains of muscle. Somehow, the lioness thought his body felt hotter than the actual blazing day. Hunter's muscles felt hard but at the same time soft and gentle. The lioness looked Hunter blushing more than ever. "Thank you," said Hunter. "You made this day very special for me!" The lioness clung on to his meaty neck. As Hunter put her down, she stood on her toes to peck him on the cheek. Hunter then became the one blushing.
112122111112.title: Go for a swim

1121221111121.content:
The lioness felt like a princess in Hunter's strong arms. She never would have thought a big tiger like him could be so gentle and nice. She felt comfortable and safe with him as Hunter carried back to shore. Adrian and the other lioness were not that far behind from them. Hunter sensed weariness in his lioness and in him. Hunter kept his giant arm around his lioness as she hugged his rippling torso. Adrian was playing with his lioness by flexing his bicep and letting her feel.

Hunter chuckled making his torso ripple even more and making his lioness blush. "You know," he said to her. "We've had so much fun that I completely forgot to ask what your name is!"
"It's alright," she said shyly. "My name's Alexis. My friend over there is Janice." Hunter smiled at Alexis. "It's a pleasure to meet you," he said softly. "I'm Hunter and that's my little bro, Adrian."
"Do you call him your little brother because he's younger than you?" asked Alexis.
"Naw," Hunter smiled and flexed a mountainous bicep for her. "I'm just bigger than he is!" Alexis laughed agreeing with him.

Adrian grumbled sarcastically at his friend. "Yeah, yeah. Maybe someday I'll be able to get bigger than you."

Hunter chuckles at his once-bigger-than-him friend. It's amazing how much his powers can change perspectives in his and other people's lives. Hunter then lies back with his arms folded behind his head, "Yeah. That'll be the day."

Adrian looks at his relaxing friend. "Hey, don't be falling asleep too long."

Hunter snarls a wee bit, "And why not?"

Adrian gets up on his feet, along with Janice holding his hardened shoulder. "Because, you said we were gonna come back to your place to weight train and all that good stuff.", he says proudly with a wink.

Hunter raises an eyebrow, "Huh? When did I...?" Suddenly, a few memories came back to him due to his powers. "Oh. That's right."

the Lioness giggled and told Hunter her number, and he nodded, giving her a big hug cuasing another furious blush from her before she and her friend left, leaving Adrian and Hunter alone.

Apparently, Hunter and Adrian shared a medium sized house with a basement that holds all their exercise equipment. Hunter found it a bit sudden to find out that he lives with Adrian but he knew he could trust his little dragon bro.

After a casual walk with more stares, Hunter and Adrian arrived at their home. As they walked in, Hunter stretched out his arms as a sign of tireness. "That was a pretty fun trip!" said Hunter to Adrian. "I hope we get to hang out with Alexis and Janice again soon." Adrian nodded. "Yeah, those lionesses were something all right!" he said. "I know we just got back and all but do you want to get started on our workout downstairs or do you want to relax a bit first? I'm fine either way." Adrian stomped up the stairs to his room leaving Hunter in the living room. Hunter was thinking about changing his clothes too, but after rubbing his abs and flexing a bicep to himself, he decided to stay in his trunks for a little while longer. Hunter sat on the couch with a slight creak on impact. He grabbed the remote, turned on the tv, and placed his bare feet on the table in front of him. Hunter then took a deep breath of relaxation and locked his fingers on top of his rocky chest.

Hunter rolled his neck a little, hearing a few satisfying pops as his joints released the pressure and he let out a soft contented sigh of relief. A short while later, he heard the heavy footfalls of Adrian as he came bounding down the stairs. The large dragon plopped down on the couch, which squealed with the added weight, and then there was the splintering of wood as the legs of the couch shattered and both Hunter and Adrian hit the ground with a light thump.

"Oh man!" Adrian sprung up and offered Hunter a hand, which he took as he stood up to look at their now squashed couched. "I guess it really wasn't made for such big guys, but i didn't think he wasn't going to give out like that"

"No Joke, it makes me wonder if our other furniture is any safer." Hunter took a look around at the wooden tables and chairs they had, they all looked a little older, but none of them seemed particularly dangerous, but then neither had the couch and it had just given out under them.

"I don't know, but we are definitely going to have to look into getting a new couch, this one is completely ruined."

Hunter agreed but not just on the couch but on their other furniture. The place looked unsuited big guys like him and Adrian. Come to think of it, the house looked a tad bit small for them. Even if they got the proper furniture, they would have no place to put it because their place isn't big enough. Hunter instantly knew what to do. With a snap of his fingers, Hunter found himself in a slightly bigger house with much more decent furniture. Their old broken couch was replaced with a new sturdier and bigger one and the rest of their furniture was more size appropriate. Hunter thought to himself that this was much better. He even made sure the workout room in the basement was more modern for use. Of course, Hunter made sure his dragon bro didn't notice a sudden change.

Hunter smiled for himself. He was really happy how his life was going after finding out he was a god. He could literally do whatever he wanted. But he was curious as to what else he could do. The possibilities were literally endless. The tiger god quickly thought on what he wanted to do next and then it hit him...

The lioness continued rubbing Hunter's rippling chest. Hunter felt completely relaxed and isolated from any distractions. Hunter hugged the lioness closer to him and said, "You know, you're a really cool girl." The lioness blushed a deep red as Hunter winked at her. "Well, you're a pretty cool guy!" she replied.

Hunter chuckled. "You know, we were having so much fun that I completely forgot to ask you for your name!" He held out his giant paw to her. "I'm Hunter."

The lioness shook Hunter's hand with it completely covering her own. "I'm Laura."

"Laura," repeated Hunter. "That's a pretty name for a pretty girl like you."

"Well, Hunter's a pretty cool name for a big guy like you."

Hunter smiled and the moment was ruined by a rumbling stomach. Hunter placed his paw on his abs embarrassed. Laura laughed lightly. "I guess it's snack time, huh?" she said.

"Yeah, I guess it is. You want me and my lil bro to get you two a snack? There was a stand not far from here."

Laura smiled. "Sure, that sounds great!"

Hunter got Adrian and they both went of the snack bar, leaving the girls to themselves. Adrian looked at Hunter and noticed he was smiling. "You having a good time with your girl, big bro?" asked Adrian. Hunter blushed again. Adrian continued, "It's alright. No need to be shy. I'm glad you're having fun with her. I know I'm having fun with Tina."

"Tina?" said Hunter.

"The girl I was with," explained Adrian. "What's your girl's name?"

"Laura."

Adrian smiled in approval. Shortly after, Hunter was carrying a couple of ice cream cones for the girls while Adrian was holding hot dogs for him and Hunter. Hunter still looked happy from being with Laura. He said to Adrian, "Say bro, just out of curiosity, have you ever thought about getting serious with a girl?"

Adrian shook his head. "Not really. Maybe someday but I just want to get as much attention my muscles can get! What about you?"

Hunter sighed puffing his rippling and defined chest. "I don't know. I like Laura a lot but I don't know if she would want to get serious with me. What if she just wants to hang out?"

Adrian grabbed Hunter's boulder-like shoulder and laughed. "Come on, bro. Don't be hard on yourself! Laura like you a lot! I can tell. If you want to hang out with her more then ask her! I'm sure she'd be happy to be with a big guy like you!"

It got Hunter thinking, what if Laura became his girlfriend? He never had one before but he never met a great girl like Laura. What harm could it done? If it didn't work out Hunter could always use his powers to fix it. With a lovesick heart, Hunter closed his eyes and used his powers to alter reality again. This time, he was going to make Laura his girlfriend. After a second, Hunter opened his eyes and saw his surroundings didn't change. Adrian didn't seem to notice anything. Before too long Hunter and Adrian returned to the girls with their refreshments.

Laura and Tina rushed to Hunter to get their cones. Tina grabbed hers and went back to sit with Adrian, who started to eat his hot dog. Hunter turned his face to Laura. It was strange. Laura was looking at him like he was looking at her a while ago. He knew it was a look of love. He did it. Laura was his. "I got your snack, Laura," said Hunter giving the ice cream cone to her.

Laura took it from his paw and said, "Thanks, tiger!" She rose up to Hunter's face with her toes and smooched his cheek. Hunter felt like he was going to melt faster than the ice cream. He was nervous but he was also excited.

Hunter grinned, cracking his knuckles a bit as thoughts churned in his mind. Getting to show off his athleticism AND woo 7 girls at one time? He made it onto the court before any of the girls noticed him. They were all huddled together, discussing something amongst themselves. The first one to notice him was the poodle, who caught sight of someone approaching on an idle glance. She turned immediately, gasping loudly as she was enraptured by the immense beauty of the tiger moving towards them. The others turned as well, having similar jaw-dropping reactions to Hunter. A couple of them even crossed their legs.

Hunter just grinned further as he got close to them, sand being kicked up from his heavy footfalls. "Hello there ladies. What seems to be the problem?" His voice was incredibly deep, yet silky smooth, almost hypnotizing to listen to. It took the girls a second to snap out of their stupor and even respond to the question.

"Uh... well... we were going to play volleyball... but we don't have even teams... so we were trying to figure out what to do," the vixen spoke up. She appeared to be having a hard time keeping her eyes on Hunter's face as opposed to his protruding package.

Hunter lightly chuckled, causing his bare chest to ripple. "Is that it? In that case, I'd be happy to join you and make it even."

The girls couldn't seem to believe their ears. The hottest guy they had ever seen... and he wanted to hang out with them?!

"But... won't the team you're on have an unfair advantage?" the raccoon nervously chimed in.

Hunter chuckled under his breath again, making a point of rubbing his hulking biceps a bit. Even he couldn't fully believe this was really happening.

"Don't worry about it... I'll go easy, I promise."

---

A few minutes later, the teams were set and the game was on. On one side was the panther, the rabbit, the vixen, and the raccoon. One the other side were the two tigresses, the poodle, and Hunter. Hunter figured that they had put all of the worse players on his team... not like it really mattered to him.

When the match started, even Hunter was a bit amazed at the skill he was showing off. He was going easy on them, like he had promised, but he still felt like a pro player out there on the court. He had barely even picked up a volleyball before that day, and yet the whole thing felt instinctual to him... like there was a computer in his brain telling him when to jump, where to hit the ball, how hard... and the girls were more than happy to feed him the ball to see his glorious muscles in action, his beautifully long hair blowing in the wind.

At one point, one of the tigresses hit the ball up in the air, but messed up, sending it way off to the side. Acting incredibly quickly, Hunter sprinted off after it, moving with record-breaking speed. He jumped up nearly ten feet in the air, did a double flip, and hit the ball in a bicycle kick to send it at the perfect angle to spike into the sand on the other side of the net. Hunter landed on his feet, his muscles bulging only a little from his nearly supernatural accomplishment.

Immediately, the girls on his side basically dogpiled him, though with his amazing strength, Hunter didn't even budge an inch. Still, he grinned, showing off his pristinely white and sharp teeth as the three lovely ladies basically groped him all over. The other team basically had their jaws on the ground, in disbelief over what they had just seen. Hunter was simply unreal.

114.content:
While Hunter desperately wanted to make more changes with his new power, he decided to head home. He had a lot of homework, and there would always be time for changes. So Hunter started running down the street towards home, his powerful leg muscles allowing him to run twice as fast as a normal person.

Hunter quickly reached home and walked through the door, having to duck a little to avoid hitting the top of the door frame due to his new height. He spotted his stepfather in his usual spot, sitting on his worn out recliner watching TV, a bag of chips on his large gut and a beer in his hand.

"Hey Dad," Hunter said, noting his slightly lower voice as he closed the door behind him. He then readied himself for his stepfather to yell at him to wash the dishes or mow the lawn or some other hard chore.

Hunter's stepfather turned towards him. "Hello Hunter," he said, actually smiling a bit, which he never did before.

Hunter was a little confused, but he quickly caught on. "Well, I have a lot of homework to do, so.... uh, bye," Hunter said awkwardly, still not used to his stepfather treating him this nicely.

"Alright. You can go out with your friends once you're finished if you like," Hunter's stepfather said before turning back to the TV.

Hunter was beaming with happiness. His stepdad rarely ever let him go out with his friends, especially on a school night. Hunter thought that it might be because he was too intimidated by Hunter's muscles, but Hunter didn't really care, as long as he was treated well now. "Thanks!" Hunter said before walking to his room to start his homework.

However, as Hunter opened the door to his room, he received a big shock. His room looked a lot different than it did before he grew his muscles. Now, looking at the different items in his room, it was clear that in this reality Hunter was...

Hunter was stunned as he looked around his new room, not believing what he was seeing. He was a champion bodybuilder! This idea excited him as he looked around the room to get some clues for his new lifestyle.

Of course, the room was mostly filled with exercise equipment. Bench presses, dumbells, and almost every type of workout machine was in Hunter's room, and it all looked brand new. Looking closer, Hunter was surprised at how heavy the weights were, even with his new body.

There were also pictures of Hunter with other muscular teenagers. There were pictures of him at competitions, gyms, beaches, and other places, always surrounded by other bodybuilders. Even though some looked 5 years older than Hunter, Hunter's body outclassed all of them by far.

Finally, there were the awards. There were more medals, trophies, and plaques than Hunter could count. But there was one especially big one in a large glass case. It was a gold trophy about as tall as a regular person with a flexing muscular figure on the top. Hunter got closer and read the inscription on the base of the trophy - "JUNIOR BODYBUILDING WORLD CHAMPIONSHIPS - 1st PLACE - FELINE DIVISION". Even though Hunter couldn't remember the event, he still felt honored.

Hunter suddenly jumped up as his stepfather's gruff voice called him from the living room. "Hunter! The mail's here!" he yelled. Hunter wanted to find out more about himself, but he begrudgingly went to retrieve the mail.

Hunter was sorting through the mail trying to find something interesting. "Bills... bills..." he muttered, bored already. However, an envelope different then the others caught his eye. It was:
1141.title: a world champion junior bodybuilder!

Hopefully, the owner won't notice beforehand. With his newly improved muscles and speedo, Hunter felt like he was ready for what the competition had in store for him.
114111.title: slighlty bigger than the biggest competitor.

1141112.content:
Hunter was looking into a mirror admiring himself when a voice came onto the intercom. "Competitors, please go to the waiting area, the event is about to begin." Hunter felt adrenaline pumping through him, so he flexed his monstrous bicep one more time before going to the waiting area.

All of the competitors were spread around the area as Hunter walked in. The hulking bodybuilders didn't seem as intimidating as before, now that he was taller, bigger, and stronger than any of them. In fact, some of the competitors were staring at him, trying to think about their odds of beating him.

A woman sitting at a table called Hunter over and placed a number on his posing speedo. The numbers represented the order that the competitors would go in. Each one would go up on stage and pose for the crowd and judges for one minute. After everyone had finished, the judges would tally up their scores and declare a winner. Hunter would be one of the last bodybuilders to go up.

Hunter waited around while the other competitors posed. A few minutes before he went on, Hunter froze up as he made a realization... he had no idea what to do! He had never been in a competition before!

... Except then he remembered he had. Thanks to his powers, Hunter had competed in dozens of competitions before. He concentrated as images flowed into his mind. All of the different poses, Hunter's favorite poses, his routine order... it was all clearly laid out.

Hunter was snapped out of his thoughts as his number was called to the stage. He walked with a brisk, confident stride, showing that he knew what he was doing and wasn't scared of losing. He strode onstage and turned towards the audience, the sheer number not fazing him one bit. He began his routine.

With only a minute, Hunter had to move quickly. He flexed each muscle in different ways, grinning as the powerful veins popped up and the crowd gasped at the sheer size of the feline beast. As time began to run out, Hunter knew he had to pull out his best pose to ensure his victory. He took a deep breath, then, with a mighty grunt, began to flex all of his muscles at once. He seemed to hulk out even more as the audience members looked on in awe. His biceps seemed to be even larger than before, and his calves were even straining up against his new speedo. He felt incredibly powerful.

Just then, time ran out, and Hunter stopped flexing and stood on the stage, panting with exhaustion but still beaming. The crowd cheered wildly and even gave him a standing ovation. For the first time, Hunter scanned the faces in the crowd. As he looked at the front row, he saw something that amazed him. It was his stepfather, clapping wildly and cheering for his stepson, beaming with pride. Hunter's old stepfather never supported him in anything, but now he was here during one of the greatest moment's in Hunter's life. The changes really were making his life better.

Hunter exited the stage and went back to the waiting area, where other competitors were waiting to congratulate him. After shaking a lot of hands and accepting a lot of congratulations, Hunter sat down and watched the last couple of competitors. They were good, but they weren't anything close to him, and they were obviously having trouble following up on his stellar performance.

Finally, the last of the competitors finished their routines and the competitors all gathered in a special section in front of the stage while the judges tallied up their scores. The waiting time was agonizing, as everyone knew that a chance at a pro career was on the line.

After a short wait that seemed like forever to Hunter, the head judge walked up to the stage to announce the winners. Third place went to the lion whose speedo you borrowed before the competition. He seemed disappointed that he only placed third and missed out on the opportunity of a life time, but he still looked pleased as he accepted his prize. Second place went to the dragon who was the biggest there before Hunter grew bigger. He kept a cool, confident look as he walked up onto stage.

Now was the moment everyone had been waiting for: the announcement of the winner. The head judge opened a sealed envelope and unfolded the paper inside to read the name on it. The judge cleared his throat in the microphone.

"And the winner is... Hunter!" he exclaimed as the audience burst into applause. Hunter was so happy he nearly sprinter up onto the stage. He shook the head judge's hand as he claimed his prizes: the ability to participate in professional bodybuilding competitions, thousands of dollars in cash, brand new gym equipment, and a lot more. At 13 years old, Hunter was the youngest professional bodybuilder in history, and yet he was still being counted as a favorite for upcoming major events, even Mr. Furlympia.

As the crowd departed, Hunter stayed on the stage to pose for pictures by himself and with the other top finishers, as well as be interviewed by several reporters. After all of that was over, Hunter stepped off of the stage and went back to the now empty waiting area. That's when he remembered he needed to return his speedo to the lion's locker. Not wanting the lion to know about it, he sprinted into the room and locked the door. He stripped off the speedo and threw it back into the locker. He then put back on his street clothes, a white tank top and shorts, making them grow a little bit to accommodate his new bulk.

Finally, Hunter walked out of the room, satisfied from the long day. He walked down the hallways, making his way back into the waiting area, once there, he saw standing there waiting for him:
1141112.title: The competition starts

choices: make his stepdad his muscular trainer.
give his stepdad a hot girlfriend.
11411121.content:
Hunter saw that his stepfather was in the middle of the room waiting for him. He was grinning from ear to ear with pride. Hunter wasn't used to seeing his father like this but he enjoyed it.

"There's my champion!" Hunter's stepdad yelled out as he patted his stepson on the back. Hunter began grinning too, remembering his recent win and feeling good about being recognized.

Hunter and his stepfather walked out into the parking lot together. The competition was long over and most of the reporters had left, but Hunter still saw an occasional flash of a camera trying to get a glimpse. Almost subconciously, Hunter began to flex a little as he walked while he listened to his stepdad praise him.

"That was amazing! It was probably your best performance yet! Those pros better watch out," his stepfather said, adding in a little laugh at the end. Hunter chuckled a little too. He couldn't remember having a better conversation with his stepdad in his entire life.

The two climbed into their pickup truck, though Hunter had a bit of a hard time squeezing through the small door frame. Eventually, they were both seated in the car and were driving back home.

Hunter and his stepdad chatted more in the truck. They discussed Hunter's performance, joked a little and talked about what they would do with the prize money. There was a small silence after the end of a conversation topic, and Hunter's stepfather's voice became more stern and solemn.

"You know Hunter, your parents would be really proud of you if they could... be here," he said, even tearing up a bit if Hunter was seeing correctly.

Hunter was pretty amazed. This was the first time his stepdad had brought up his parents, and it was really touching. It was the final straw that made Hunter really love the new version of his stepfather. He was kind, supportive, and really loved Hunter.

Hunter looked over his stepdad. He had a sort of grimy look to him and a large gut hanging out of his shirt. He didn't have a lot of money or friends, even with a bodybuilder for a stepson. It saddened Hunter that such a nice guy could be so lonely and miserable.

Hunter decided to use his powers for someone other than himself. He wanted to do something for his stepfather that would make him really happy. After some thought, Hunter decided to use his powers to:
11411121.title: his stepfather.

114111211.content:
Hunter decided to use his powers to make his stepfather his muscular trainer. That way, he would have more purpose in life and look good doing it. Hunter focuses on his guardian and he started grow. The stepdad's gut was shrinking in nothingness and a 6-pack took it's place. His arms grew to the size a giant steel pipe and his legs were growing outside of his pants. Hunter was pleased with the result. Before his stepfather became suspicious, Hunter placed memories in him training and coaching him. He then puts him to sleep on the chair he was on for the night.

Hunter goes up to his room to get ready for bed. He thinks about what will it be like to have his stepfather as a training coach. Will he be nice or will he be like he was before? Hunter worries about it for a minute but stops due to conclusion he could always "fix" him. He strips to his boxers to get ready to sleep in his huge bed. Before he could, he saw the mirror and had to have another posing session. Hunter makes several poses and saw how power ran all over his body. He loved his muscles and his new life. Hunter couldn't believe what happened today. He went from a scrawny 13-year-old to a huge bodybuilding hulk! With many thoughts running in his head, Hunter jumped into his bed and slept like a baby.

The next morning, Hunter went downstairs to find his new physically and emotionally improved stepdad making a huge breakfast for the both of them. "Morning Dad." said Hunter. "Good morning Champ!" says his stepdad still excited about yesterday. "I made a hearty breakfast to start our celebration day!" "What?" says Hunter.
"Your pro career doesn't start till a little while so I thought we would have fun and start training tomorrow." Says his dad," But this is your day. Tell me what you want to do and we'll do it!" Hunter smiled. His father never let him do whatever he wanted before! He didn't know where to start. He could start training to see how strong he is or have fun showing off his muscles. Hunter decides to:
114111211.title: make his stepdad his muscular trainer.

choices: Not wanting to wait, Hunter makes Mr. Furlympia the next day.
1141112111.content:
Hunter thought about his dad's offer. Sure, showing off at the beach would be a lot of fun, but there would be other days where he'd get to do that, and he had never gotten to really feel the exhilaration working out would give him. He couldn't wait one more day.

"If you don't mind, I'd like to start training now," Hunter said.

Hunter's dad stood up from the table, still grinning. "Nice choice! Mr. Furlympia is only a few months away, so we should get started early," he said. Apparently, Hunter's wish had given his dad a great passion for training Hunter to be the best. "We'll go with your regular routine for today."

The routine was only regular for Hunter. Just the warm up was daunting, with a 20 mile run set for him! Even Hunter was a bit nervous, but his fears were soon diminished. Though most bodybuilders' muscles were heavy and slow, the fact that Hunter's muscles were divine actually increased his speed, allowing him to go an insane 30 MPH! The run was also helped by his dad riding alongside him in the car yelling out inspirational yet firm cheers. By the end, Hunter was beaming with accomplishment.

Hunter's dad then took him to their backyard, which Hunter immediately noticed had a stack of wood in the middle along with some other objects scattered around. The two muscle tigers walked to the wood.

Hunter's dad pulled out a match, lit it, and dropped it onto the wood. It immediately burned and caused a flame, which quickly spread into a raging blaze. Hunter's dad turned to Hunter.

"A thousand push-ups over the flame, now," he demanded.

Not wanting to question his trainer, Hunter quickly dropped down and started performing the push-ups. He could feel the heat build up and warm his bare chest, making him sweat. However, he was a blur, moving up and down as fast as his arms could pump him (which was very fast). Like the run, Hunter was done in no time.

Hunter had barely stood up before he saw his stepdad dragging over a pull-up bar and placing it over the fire.

"Are we doing pull-ups next?" Hunter asked.

His stepdad shook his head. "Nope. This isn't for your hands; it's for your feet."

The next thing Hunter knew, he was upside down, blood pumping to his head as he did 1000 vertical sit-ups, once again over the fire. The strain of such a task might severely injure any regular person, but Hunter wasn't a regular person. He finished with ease before doing a back flip and landing perfectly on the grass, something he'd have to look into later on.

The workout only became more vigorous as time went on. Hunter was instructed to start hitting a punching bag as hard as he could. Within a minute, the punching bag was on the ground with a huge gaping hole in it. Hunter then ran a mile with the family car on his back, along with his dad sitting on top of the car shouting more encouragement. Finally, Hunter ended with an even more superhuman feat: pulling a tree out of the ground and curling it. Even that seemed a little too light!

Hunter finally walked into the house and plopped himself down on the couch, doing his best not to crush it. The thing that surprised him the most was that he wasn't even very tired! Even after all of that, he only felt like he had taken a light jog. He felt more powerful than any creature on the planet, and he probably was.

Hunter glanced at the clock. It was still the afternoon, so there was a lot of time left in the day. That also meant that there was a lot of fun left in the day. He could always go to the beach, meet friends, play some video games, and just hang out.

But Hunter really felt like changing reality a bit...
1141112111.title: Train

11411121111.content:
Hunter looked back to his life and loved how it turned out. He had the body everyone could dream of, finally won approval of his stepdad, and were winning competitions everywhere. As he was thinking, a thought came across his mind: If this was his life now, what would his life be in the future? Hunter went to a mirror to look at his body. He loved it but thought it was pretty big for a 13-year-old. He thought having a good age would match his body greatly. It was decided: Hunter wanted to be older.

Hunter closed his eyes and began to concentrate on altering reality. He thought about becoming 21 years old. That seemed like a good age for him. As he was concentrating, Hunter felt a sense sleepiness coming into his eyes. He had no idea why he was becoming so tired. He was still pumped from the workout! He was eventually consumed with fatigue that he collapsed.

When he opened his eyes, Hunter thought he was still asleep. He found himself in an incredibly fancy bedroom! The bed was twice his size, the closet to the far left was at least 10 feet wide, and there was a mirror opposite of that. Hunter first thought that he jumped into the life a millionaire even though that was not his wish. Hunter got out of bed with a big thump. He was then compelled to look into the mirror.

Every step he took to the mirror shook the room slightly. Hunter was flabergasted when he finally came face to face with the mirror. The mirror showed the image of HUGE tiger with boxers that were being pushed by his leg muscles. The stripes on his fur were rippling with muscle from head to toe.

Hunter first thought this godlike being was somebody but realized that it was him 21 years old! He couldn't believe how big he looked. He was at leat 7'2" in height and very heavy based on the creakiness of the floor. He also got closer to the mirror to observe his face more. It looked rougher than before and had a handsome goutee on his chin. Hunter couldn't take his eyes off his muscles. he was compelled to make some poses. As he flexed a bicep, it swelled to the size of a tire! He also looked at his chest to find a 10-pack followed by two gigantic pecs. Hunter conintued with more poses and amazed with each result.

Although Hunter was pleased with his body, he was still confused as to what was with his surroundings. His head was automatically filled with memories starting at the age of 13. He remembered winning the Furlympics bodybuilding competiton 8 times and last night he was the 8th! As for the fancy bedroom, he had enough money to live in a penthouse in the fanciest hotel in the city while his dad still lived in his old house.

Hunter conintued posing until he heard a rip. As he looked down he noticed that there were tears on the outer side of his boxers! His leg muscles must have been really strong he thought. Before he could ponder on it further, the doorbell rang.
11411121111.title: Hunter makes himself older.

114111211112.content:
Hunter quickly walked over to the door, which only took a couple strides with his massive legs, and twisted the knob, nearly pulling it off the door. Upon swinging the door open, Hunter came face-to-face with a large rhino smiling at him. Not just large, but LARGE. The rhino was almost as heavily muscled as Hunter, and almost as tall too at 6' 10". The ground shook with every step he took, and just looking at him was enough to make anyone except Hunter cower in fear.

"Hey Hunter, how's it going?" the rhino asked, grinning from ear to ear.

Hunter panicked and quickly searched his mind to find out who he was. Apparently, his name was Lance. He and Hunter had met at one of their first junior bodybuilding competitions and their friendship had took off. Lance was an easy-going guy, loving to joke around and have a good time. But that didn't mean he didn't take some things seriously, as he worked out more passionately than anyone else Hunter had met. This led to Lance getting close to Hunter in musculature without divine help. Therefore, while Hunter had gotten 1st at Mr. Furlympia for the past 8 years, Lance had worked his way up and managed to get 2nd this year.

"Hey Lance! Been having fun since yesterday?" Hunter asked.

Lance looked down to Hunter's straining, slightly ripped boxers and smirked. "Well, I certainly see you have."

Hunter followed Lance's gaze and blushed. "Ummm.... I'll be right back," Hunter said before dashing into his closet. After a few minutes, he emerged in a camo tank top and black running shorts.

"So, why are you here?" Hunter asked.

"What, I can't just come over to hang out with my bro?" Lance responded. "But seriously, we just got a gig!"

"What do you mean?" Hunter questioned.

"We were both asked to perform feats of strength in front of a crowd for charity! It'll be awesome!" Lance said.

Hunter couldn't believe it. "Awesome! High five!" The two smacked palms with enough force to break bones, though neither of them felt that much.

Lance checked his watch. "Well, we have a little time before the event to hang out, but we could always go early. What do you want to do?"
114111211112.title: A friend

choices: Hunter gets a call from his stepdad
1141112111121.content:
Hunter was starting to love this new reality. He loved his new body, home, and friend. Just to make things even better, he has an opportunity to show off his new strength. Hunter was filled with excitement. Although it would've been fun to show off, he really wanted how strong he was now. Hunter was full of excitement and adrenaline. He said to Lance, "Man, bro, let's do it!" Both give another bone-shaking high five.

Later that day, Hunter and Lance made their way to where the event was going to take place and spent the day getting prepared for it. The next thing he knew, Hunter found himself in sport shorts behind a brick wall. He could hear the murmuring of the crowd waiting for him and Lance. But then a booming voice overpowered the crowd.

"Ladies and gentlemen," Said the announcer, "Thank you very much for your kind donations for this event. It is very heartwarming to know that it is going to support a good cause. So, without further ado, let's start the show! First, our runner-up in the Mr. Furlympia competition, let's give it up for....Lance!" Hunter heard a loud crash of brick falling out of place and yelling following. "Now," Said the announcer, "Give it up for Mr. Furlympia: Hunter!" Hunter closed his hand into a fist and rammed into the brick wall. It automatically shattered and he was greeted by an entire wall full of people with Lance by his side. They both give off poses to get the crowd wild.

To start off, Hunter and Lance walk towards an I-beam knowing what they have to do. "Ready?" Asked Lance. "Yeah!" Replies Hunter. Hunter grabs one end while Lance gets the other. On the count of three to each other they both started to pull their end of the beam. It was evenly matched. They pulled with great strength with no trace of fatigue. As they pulled, the center of the I-beam grew thinner and eventually it snapped with each holding one half. Hunter and Lance raise their pieces to the crowd so they could cheer loudly. The loudness doubled when Hunter and Lance bended their halfs.

Next, Hunter and Lance walk towards an old building that was begging to be demolished. They both crack their knuckles simultaneously and ran to the foundation of it. They both start punching solid concrete until there was nothing left but dust. Hardly any time at all, the building sank into a cloud of dust. The crowd wondered and began to be concerned for Hunter and Lance's condition. But it was short lived after they both walk out of the cloud and posed for them. The crowd went crazier than the first stunt.

Hunter and Lance then made their way to the most dangerous stunt in the event. They positioned themselves near a giant contruction machine that was hanging a wrecking ball right above them. Hunter and Lance share smirks and raise their hands to the sky. There was a sense of doubt running through the crowd thinking to themselves that there was no way they could do it. Before the crowd could share thoughts, the wrecking ball dropped from its hanging positon and was going to fall right on top of Hunter and Lance! Hunter and Lance still stood their pose despite their confront with death. The crowd couldn't bear to watch the site of Hunter and Lance getting squished but the impact was dull. No disgusting sound followed the impact. As the crowd looked, Hunter and Lance were holding the giant wrecking ball! The crowd went totally insane at this sight! Hunter was a little surprised himself when he saw his and Lance's feet indentations in the ground along with ripples from the impact.

Lance turned to Hunter grinning. "I never get bored of this!" He exclaimed. Hunter smirks back and says, "Neither do I."
1141112111121.title: Go to the event

11411121111211.content:
Hunter and Lance were thrilled during the photo shoots and autographs after the show, especially Hunter. He truly felt like a god from the audience's attention. The way they looked at him made him feel empowered. Hunter really felt something when a 8-year-old otter came up to him and told him he wanted to be like him. Hunter was touched. He made the little otter feel a bulged bicep and took a picture of the both of them with the otter sitting on Hunter's bicep. Hunter felt really good thinking he was a good example for all.

Hunter finally sat down in a giant chair behind stage after the audience left. He stretched out his arms and legs to relax. His relaxation came up short when he felt shaking of Lance's feet coming towards him. Lance was already in his street clothes of nothing but sneakers and spandex shorts. "If I didn't know any better, I'd say they liked you more than me!" said Lance. Hunter sat up straight. "Come on, man," he says. "You were great too!" Lance smiled and slapped Hunter's shoulder. "I know bro! How can they not!" Lance pointed to his bare chest showing a firmly shaped 8-pack. "I thought that otter kid was really cute towards you. He wants to be like you." Hunter got embarrassed and told Lance to shut up. Lance's chuckle followed.

"That was really cool." said Hunter in a mellow tone. "Yep," said Lance. "And it's going to get better." Hunter turned to him. "What do you mean?" he asked. "There's going to be a party for us with the donors of the event!" Lance explained. "It's going to be at the top floor of that fancy hotel! Dude, we gotta be there!" Hunter was regenerated with energy at the thought. "Ok, let's go!" he says. Hunter ran to get his tank top and shorts and met Lance in front of the car they took to get to the event. "Ready." Hunter says to Lance. "Almost." Lance said. Lance grabbed the top of Hunter's shirt and ripped it right in the middle. He then threw the remains to the side. Hunter jaw dropped expressing his confusion. "You look better without it." Lance said laughing at Hunter's face. Hunter looks at his chest and after looking at his abs and pecs he agreed with him. As they drove to the hotel, Hunter told Lance that he owes him a new shirt.

They arrive at the party and it was packed with people, music, and lights. Hunter didn't know where to start at the party. "What now?" Hunter asked Lance. Lance gave him a smile and said, "Have fun! Look around! Eat! Drink! Meet the ladies!" A slender dragon girl caught Lance's attention. He turned to Hunter and said, "You're on your own." Lance followed the dragon girl into the crowd. Hunter laughed a bit how Lance went from a rhino to a hound dog. He too went into the crowd to see what he could find.

Hunter walked a bit with a small sandwich he picked up the food stand. He thought about finding Lance and getting out of there until he saw a beautiful vixen dancing the night away. Hunter was compelled to go to her and before he realized he was right in front of her. "Hi." He said shyly. The vixen stopped dancing to notice the giant that has taken interest in her. She could tell at that moment. She loved muscle guys and she loved how the lights reflected Hunter's muscles. "Hi," she said. "I'm Trixie." "Nice to meet you." Hunter said quickly. "I'm.." "I know who you are Hunter. You were amazing tonight!" Trixie grabbed Hunter's hand and invited him to dance. With his powers, Hunter could in no time. Hunter was dancing smoothly with Trixie and they both loved it. They finally decided to take a seat together.

They sat next to each other on a long couch. Trixie couldn't stop staring at Hunter's arms but she wanted to know him more. "So, how long have you been bodybuilding?" Hunter just smiled and flexed the arm she was staring. "All my life." He said. He sounded confident, but Hunter's heart was pounding out of nervousness. "May I?" Asked Hunter pointing at his arm. He nodded. Trixie put both arms on Hunter's bicep and could feel the power sleeping in it. She squeezed it to see it was hard and sculpted nicely. "Very nice." Trixie commented getting shy. They talked friendly towards each other and Hunter made small flexes for her. They both grew to like each other because one couldn't stop smiling at the other.
11411121111211.title: Have a party

choices: You and Lance prepare for tomorrow
You and Lance get some sleep
114111211112112.content:
After you and finished talking and flexing for Trixie, you told her you had to go find a friend. Before you take off, she holds your meaty right hand, leaving behind a folded piece of paper with her number on it. "Give me a call sometime handsome.", she says. She walks off and into the crowd of people.

"Oh! Sure thing!", you yell out. You look at the paper, and then stuff it into your pocket as you walk off as well. You looked around a bit to try and find Lance. It was pretty surprising to see you were taller than almost everyone at the party. Suddenly, the horn of a rhino catches your eye. By the looks of it, it had to be Lance. You immediately walk on, squeezing your way through a couple people just to get by. He looks as if he was talking with someone. Just as you walked up to Lance, the guy Lance was speaking to waved goodbye as he walked away from Lance. "Hey Lance. How have you been?"

Lance jumps up a bit once he heard your voice, and then turns around. "This part is off the hook! Can't believe how successful this party is!"

"Yeah!" Even though it was you who secretly got a couple people to show up. "So, who was that guy you were just speaking to?"
