Lance points back with his thumb, "Oh, that guy? His name's Derek. He told me he's a sponsor and he also owns his own gym."

You stroke the fur underneath your chin, "Interesting. What else were you guys talking about?"

"He said he wanted us to come by for a visit! He's gonna be sponsoring an event too!", Lance yells with anticipation.

"What kind of event?", you ask curiously.

"It's actually gonna be the grand opening of his gym." Lance starts doing a few bodybuilding poses, catching a few people's attention as well as he continued to explain, "He wants us to stop by and help promote his gym. You know! Get people to stop by and start weight training. Just like that kid you impressed earlier."

"Really? That sounds interesting!" You look around to notice the group of people still applauding even though Lance was finished with his routine. "I'll do it, but it looks like we've got another group to impress too." The crowd starts to cheer louder with anticipation.

"Huh." Lance slyly grins as he turns his head to you, "You thinkin' what I'm thinkin'?"

You nod your head in response, "Heh."

"Ladies and gentlemen, it's almost time for the party to end." The crowd started to awe with sadness. "But, how 'bout me and my good friend Hunter here give you all a quick show before you go!" The party-goers started to cheer. Lance inches his head in to whisper to you, "You wanna do this pantsless or are you good the way your are now?"

You look away to think to yourself, then you look back at Lance with a grin as you shrug your shoulders, "Eh. I've already been pantsless at the competition. So why not?" Hunter starts slipping off his spandex until he was in nothing but his posing trunks.

Lance smirks, "Heh." He does the same thing as well. He's tosses his pants to the side and then tenses his arms downward in front of his chest, "Alright people, step back. We may need some space here." The crowd backs away as they cheer for the both of them. Lance starts by doing the first pose, doing a double-bicep flex with his fists pointing away from him. You then do your first pose, bending your knees a bit as you stood sideways in front of the crowd and flexed up your left arm and tensed up your left leg. Lance then folds his large arms behind his head to flex out as much of his chest and abdomen as he could. Hunter then does his next pose, facing away from the crowd to spread out his massive back and lats. Hunter can hear the crowd cheering on for him, which makes him smile. He looks over to Lance, then realizing he was in the same pose as him. Only Lance was spreading out his back more than you were, as well as flexing his legs. This got your attention as you started to think to yourself. You make yourself bigger without anyone noticing, but then, you just decide to shrug it off. Just let Lance have his moment.

You turn around to flex out both your arms in front of your chest. Lance turns around to do the same thing, only you were just bending and tensing your arms, while he was flexing and pumping them with all his might. This made his arms a tad larger than yours in comparison as well. For your last pose, you went ahead and knelt down on your left knee while holding out your right leg and raised up both your arms. Lance syncs his pose with yours as well, only he positioned yourself in front of you. You were already a little bigger when compared to him, but were still just tensing the muscles in your body while he actually flexed them all. The crowd cheered on some more, more of the cheering being sent on to Lance. After your last pose, you both stood up. You were a bit sweaty, but Lance was sweating all over. You place a hand on Lance's shoulder and gave him a thumbs up, "Way ta go!"

Lance smiles at you, and then turns to the crowd. "Alright everyone, it's time for you to go. If you want to see us again, just stop by tomorrow at the grand opening of Pegasus Gym." The crowd gave one more cheer for the both of you as they were disbanding and leaving at the front entrance. Lance sets his hands on his hips, "Well, looks like we've got a lot of cleaning to do."

As Lance walked off, you realized there was still one person there from the party. It turned out to be Trixie. She walked up in front of you, checking out your naked body and then looking back up to you. "Wow... Just wow! You were amazing out there!"

"Uh... Oh, thanks", you say as you began scratching the back of your head. You were also looking away while trying not to blush. "So, I guess you're gonna be there tomorrow?"

Trixie chuckles a bit, "Heheh. If I'm not busy tomorrow." She looks down to your legs, chuckling again, "Heh. I knew your pants weren't big at all! It was just the muscles in your legs."

You grin at her, and then you hold out your right leg and gave both legs a good flex. They both rippled with great power. "Thanks. You're lucky to get an up close view.", you say with a smile.

Trixie feels your right flexed leg in return. "My... Heh. Well, I, better get going." Trixie starts to walk off, she then turns back to you before head out the door. "Oh and, thanks for the show."
114111211112112.title: Find Lance

1141112111121121.content:
It was hard for Hunter to sleep that night. With the party and gym opening in his head, Hunter barely slept because he was too excited. The next morning, he and Lance followed the address to the gym Lance was given by the owner. When they arrived, they found the "The Pegasus Gym" ginormous! It was three story building with balloon arches over the path towards the entrance and twin statues of winged horses by each side of the doors. Hunter and Lance stood in awe of the place. They had no idea the gym was going to be this big. It was the biggest one they have ever seen! Hunter turned to Lance. "You didn't tell me it was THIS big!' He told him. Lance just stood there as if he was facing the gates of Heaven. "I didn't know." He simply said. Lance pumped his arms failing to hold on to his enthusiasm and grabbed Hunter's shoulder. "Let's go!" Lance yelled. He practically ran while dragging Hunter.

Lance and Hunter went through the door and found the front desk center. The room had a series of doors that led to different areas of the gym. One led to a weightlifting room while another led downstairs to an underground pool. The sign in desk was at the dead center. Hunter was impressed. "This looks really cool!" He said. "Glad you think so!" a mysterious voice said coming from an "Employees only" room. The voice came from a lean yet muscular bear. "Mike!" Lance yelled to him. The bear responded, "Hey Lance! Glad you all could make it!" He pointed to Hunter. "You Hunter?" He asked. "Yes," Hunter replied, "Nice to meet you." "You too! I'm Mike, the owner of the new 'Pegasus Gym'! Thank you so much for helping me out with the grand opening. With you guys around, I'll bound to get customers!" Lance just flexed a bicep and said, "Happy to help people get in shape!" Hunter really wanted to roll his eyes for how Lance was acting but he couldn't blame him. The guy was excited, more than usual. Lance was ready to get started. He clapped his hands and asked Mike when do they start. Mike had a great idea for Lance and Hunter.

Opening time was getting closer and new customers were coming to wait for the doors to open. People of all shapes and sizes appeared, even some people from the party. The customers were ready and so were Mike, Lance, and Hunter. Mike opened the door to welcome the customers outside. "Ladies and gentlemen," Mike began, "thank you all for coming. I hope you all find this place both useful and fun. I know these guys do!" Mike got out of the way while Hunter and Lance came out of the building. The customers were stunned by their size and muscles and cheered as Lance and Hunter began posing. Each pose was bolder and more powerful than the last. Lance's bicep grew rippled and veined as Hunter's chest puffed up showing every definition. They were having a blast and the customers enjoyed watching them. Lance suddenly stopped and stepped forward to the crowd. "If you want to have guns like these," Lance yelled to them while flexing his arms downward and emphasizing his arms and chest, "then come on in and we'll show ya!" The crowd gave an ultimate cheer of agreement. Mike and Hunter came up next to Lance. "Without further ado," said Mike, "Let's open!" Mike then opened the gym door to the public.

The customers came in admiring the set up of the first room and starting exploring the room hoping for a good workout. Mike was thrilled with Hunter and Lance. "You guys were awesome! Thanks again!" Hunter's liking for the gym grew to the size of Lance's after their performance. "No problem!" Hunter told Mike. "How about you guys get a workout yourself?" Mike asked them. "It's on the house! Show our customers how really work out muscles!" Hunter and Lance smiled at each other like they couldn't agree more.
1141112111121121.title: You and Lance prepare for tomorrow

choices: Start working out a different part of your body.
11411121111211211.content:
The first floor of the building is basically the weightlifting room. Hunter and Lance were still in their posing shorts as they scoured the room around them. Watching people work out on different kinds of weightlifting equipment. Many of them in different shapes and sizes. There were a few who were nearly as big as Hunter and Lance. Lance sets his hands on his hips, "Well, where should we start?"

"I don't know about you, but I'm gonna start pumpin' my arms.", you say as you walked past Lance and towards a rack with various sizes of dumbbells.

Lance throws his arm at you, "Ah you go ahead. I'll be warmin' up my chest."

Lance walks off on his own, and then you chuckle to yourself as you grabbed a pair of 200-pound dumbbells. "Alright. Try not to get too carried away."

"I should be tellin' you the same thing!", Lance yells out.

You begin pumping one arm at a time. It wasn't too much to handle, but it was a workout. Your arms started to ripple out pretty well, becoming more pumped. You liked how your arms were feeling as you started to increase the pace of your reps. After pumping your arms a little more, you raise up your left arm in a flexing pose to watch your bicep swell out with a good vein on it. "Wow!" You turn your head to your left to notice a slim white-furred and black striped leopard standing beside you in a tank-top and shorts. He was really impressed with how much you've been repping. "That was awesome! I'm really impressed with how much you can rep."

You stared at the leopard, and then grinned after what he said. "Hey, thanks. Trust me though, you haven't even seen what I'm capable of." You continued on with your reps. You noticed the leopard grabbing a pair of dumbbells as well. "? 40 pounds? Is that it?"

"Hm? Oh, yeah." The leopard starts repping the same way as you, "I've been working out for the past two months now actually. But I haven't really gotten anywhere."

"Really? You planning to get into bodybuilding or weightlifting?", you ask.

"Nah. Nothin' like that. I just want to get big to try to impress this one girl I like.", he explains.

Hunter starts doing reps by raising both arms up and down, "I see. So has your routine been for reaching your goal?"

The leopard continued with his reps, "Well I've been working out 3 hours a day, 3 days a week."

You ask with an eyebrow cocked, "Is that it?"

The leopard looked at you, but then looked away, "Well, yeah..."

You stop with your reps as you lower your arms, "Sounds to me like you're not serious about impressing this girl."

"I am!" The leopard looks away again, "It's just, working to reach my goal is so hard..."

You yell in his face, "Well yeah! No one said it'd be easy! If you wanna get big, you have to REALLY commit to it."

The leopard stares at you for a moment. He then asks, "Well...then, what would you recommend?"

Hunter puts the dumbbells back on the rack, and then he sets a hand on his chin as he thinks to himself, "Hmm... Try going to the gym 5 days a week instead of just 3. Or 4 days, but you must work out more than 3 hours a day if you want to get big as soon as possible. Oh, and feel free to try out a few supplemental drinks too."

The leopard takes in what you said, "Wow... I guess it worked out well for you, huh?"

You flex up both of your arms to show him. And then you flex both your arms downwards with your chest, "Hnngh! Ya think?"

The leopard blinks his eyes, "Uh... Heh. Asked a silly question."

You part the leopard on his shoulder, "Remember what I told you.", you start to walk off, "And then you'll reach your goal."
11411121111211211.title: Go to weightlifting room

114111211112112111.content:
After the dumbbells, Hunter felt pumped and ready for more. He search the room looking for a challenging workout until he found a hanging bar at the corner of the room. Hunter decided to do some pulls ups. What better workout than to lift his own weight? He got under the bar, reached for it, and began to pull himself up. The pull ups were harder than the dumbbells. Hunter thought about using his powers to make himself stronger to make it easier but he decided not to because he wanted to see how well he can do. Every time Hunter reached his head over the bar, he saw how pumped his arms looked. More veins showed than dumbbells could. Each rep he did burned his arms and it felt really good to him. After several reps, Hunter dropped down sweating with his muscles feeling tingly.

Satisfied with his workout, Hunter thought he would check on Lance. He looked around the room until he noticed a small crowd surrounding in a particular spot. He couldn't see what was happening but Hunter knew it had to have been Lance. He slipped through a crowd only to have his jaw drop. Lance was also doing pull ups on a hanging bar but doing so with one hand while holding a 200 lbs dumbbell in the other hand and having heavy weights strapped to both legs. The workout was challenging for Lance, but he showed as much effort as Hunter did with his previous pull ups. "How is he doing this?" Hunter thought.

Lance dropped down and was congratulated with cheers and handshakes. He loved the attention but Hunter couldn't understand how Lance could perform such a feat. Hunter thought it was his imagination, but Lance looked more muscular and bigger. Hunter came up to him. "That was awesome!" He said. Lance slapped Hunter's shoulder and stood next to him. "Thanks!" Lance replied. "That really got me going. I'm going to change clothes and do something else." Hunter knew something was up. When they stood side by side, Lance was an inch or two taller than him. Hunter knew he was taller than Lance when they came into the gym. "I think I'll come too." Hunter told Lance. Lance agreed and both headed to the locker rooms.

The room was empty as Hunter and Lance came in. They showered and changed. As Lance was going out, Hunter stopped him. "Lance," he said, "Can I ask you something?" "Anything bro!" Lance answered. "What's up?" "I noticed how much bigger you are than me. I could have sworn that I was taller than you." Lance grinned and chuckled. "Come on," Lance said, "Nobody can grow big that fast." Hunter felt a sense of doubt crushing his suspicion. All of a sudden, he started to think and believe that Lance was always bigger than him. Hunter knew it wasn't true so he shook it off. The way that thought came into his head was strange. It felt as if Hunter was being brainwashed. Hunter finally understood what was going on with Lance.

"I get it now." said Hunter. "You're a god." "What?" said Lance nervously. "What are you talking about?" "It's okay." Hunter used his powers to reach the same size and strength as Lance. Lance was amazed seeing Hunter grow right in front of him. He then knew they had something in common. "I'm one too." Hunter said after he finished growing. After his shock, Lance replaced his nervousness with euphemism. "This is so cool!" said Lance. "I thought I was the only one! I can't believe it! My own bro a god too!" Hunter was happy too. It was really nice that there was someone who something in common with him. They gave each other high fives and laughed.
114111211112112111.title: Go check up on Lance.

1141112111121121111.content:
You crossed your arms while happily saying, "I always knew there was something up with you. Just can't believe it was this."

Lance crosses his arms as well, "Heh! And I was actually thinking about you a bit myself." Lance sets a hand under his chin as he concocted an idea, "Hmm..."

You were only more than willing to ask, "Hey, I know that look! What's on your mind?"

"I was just thinking... Why don't we try out our powers?", Lance thought.

You mimicked Lance, "I see. And how will we be doing this?"

Lance lowered his arms a bit, "Why don't we test out each other's strength? See how can lift the most?"

Your arms dropped, "What!? You wanna lift weights again? I mean, we just showered you know."

Lance throws a hand down, "Nah, not in here." Lance whispers to you as he closes in, "This place is practically child's play for us."

"Why are you whispering?"

Lance backs away, "Well isn't it?"

"..." You take a look around the entire floor you and Lance were in. Taking a closer look at all the gym equipment being used by the gym members and the ones not being used at all. You were actually thinking the same thing since you started with your arm-ups. You sigh, "Okay, yeah. I guess so. But seriously though, I just showered."

Lance elbows you in the stomach a few times, "Come on man, you can always shower again. Heck, you can just make yourself clean if you wanted to. Besides, I know a better place that may be worthy of trying out."

You cock an eyebrow, "Oh? And what place would that be?"

Lance points at one direction with his thumb, "At the rocky desert just out of town. There are plenty of giant boulders that we can test out and everything."

"Are you serious?" You shift a hand at him, "I'm not really interested."

Lance closens up to you, "Oh. Are you, scared? Afraid I'm gonna whoop you?"

You back your upper body away a bit, "Aw come on man. Don't be like that."

Lance only inches closer, pumping and flexing both of his arms downward in front of you, "Afraid these mighty pipes aren't as good as those?"

"Come on man, I said knock it off.", you say sounding a little more annoyed.

Lance relaxes his arms and shrugs his shoulders, "Alright. You know for a god, you sure like to weed out of things."

You sigh heavily as you give in, "Alright, alright! When do we start?"

"We can start right now!" Lance positions himself ready to run, "Betcha can't beat me there."

Lance quickly runs right out of the gym, getting a head start. "Hey!" You quickly dart out of the gym to run after him. It amazes you how fast Lance was running, even though it shouldn't. You and Lance were currently running twice the speed as the cars you were running beside. Lance looks back at you, and the starts gaining more speed, and then darts off like a lightning bolt. "Oh no you don't!" You immediately do the same thing. Within a minute you two made it to your destination. You both stood beside each other panting heavily for a bit. "Just so you know, you only won because I wouldn't have known where you were headed."

Lance catches his breath, "Heh. Right." Lance walks up to a large boulder and places a hand on it. "Alright, so we'll each start out with a small boulder, and then move on to a bigger one each time to see how much we can take." Lance grabs the bottom of the current boulder, and then flexes the muscles all over his upper body, lifting the boulder up and carrying it over his shoulder. Lance turns around to look at you, "Heh. Piece of cake."

This doesn't intimidate you. You just look towards the next bigger boulder and walk up to it. You reach under the boulder with just one hand, "Grrr...!" You growled as your bicep flexes up and out to twice its original size, ripping the fabric that once surrounded it into shreds. With one more growl, you manage to lift the boulder up and above your head. You turn towards Lance, "Top that. !!"

While still carrying the boulder from earlier with one arm, Lance goes right ahead and lifts another boulder larger than the one you were currently lifting with his other arm. He now had two large boulders being lifted above his head. With a simple but harder flex of his upper body, Lance manages to tear off his entire shirt into pieces. "Alright!"

"Hmph!" You turn your attention behind you, towards a small cliff made completely of solid rock. You set the boulder down, and then walk over to the cliff. Once you were standing right in front of it, you bend down and jab your fingers underneath. You flex hard, causing the shirt you were wearing to be stretched to its limit as you slowly start to pick the cliff up. You flex even harder, this time making the shirt you were wearing rip apart and pop right off your body. Once you lifted the cliff up to your hips, you quickly speed underneath to get to the center of the mountain. You were basically carrying the cliff on your back now. You growl loudly, using your massive legs to help lift up the cliff with your large back. Suddenly, the lower part of your pants were starting to strain, until your calves were blasted out and rip right out, "Yeauuugh!"

Lance stares at you impressed. "Wow. This guy ain't kiddin' around." He looks to his left to spot another rock cliff that was just as big as yours. He sets the boulders down and runs right towards it. He jabs his fingers in the bottom as well. he flexes hard and manages to carry the cliff up to his abdomen. With a quick jolt, he speeds right under the center also and carries it on his back. He flexes both his legs and his back to aid him in lifting the cliff. Lance's pants were on the verge of ripping apart as well. 'Riiip!' Lance's leg muscles push right out of his pants and rips his pants into shreds. You manage to lift the cliff over his head. "Haaaugh!" You and Lance look over to each other. You two then smile, "Let's just call his a draw."
1141112111121121111.title: They try their powers

11411121111211211112.content:
Hunter and Lance felt exhausted from their duel. Although Lance felt like he could keep going, Hunter suggested it would be best to call it a day while they still had their posing suit on. Lance agreed and he and Hunter decided to chill at Hunter's place. They both collapsed on the couch reflecting on each other's revelation. "I still can't believe you're a god." said Hunter. "I can't believe you're one too!" Lance replied. "How did you find out you were a god?" Hunter explained how a celestial being came to him when he was thirteen and how he used his powers to make himself muscular. "What about you?" Hunter asked Lance. Lance sat up. "Kinda the same as you." He told him. "I was fifteen when some random rhino guy told me my parents were gods and I had powers. I didn't believe it at first. Before, I was trying to get into shape without making a lot of progress. I wished to myself that I was bigger and I grew immediately! I ran to the bathroom to test it out again and it worked! Ever since then, I got into bodybuilding, competitions, girls, you name it. A few years later, I decided to go into major league bodybuilding and that's when I met you." Hunter was intrigued by Lance's story and how similar it was to his. He wondered, "Do you think there's a reason they told us now?" Lance shrugged. "I don't know." Lance replied. "If there is, I'm sure we'll know." Lance made a good point so Hunter stopped pondering on the thought.

Hunter sighed. "What now?" Lance chuckled. "I don't know. All this power and nothing to do with it. I guess I'll head over to my place." Hunter head perked up with an idea. He came to Lance before he got off the couch. "Hey man, since we have a lot in common, how about you move in with me? I got more than enough space." Lance eyes widened with hope. "Really?! That's awesome! Thanks!"
"But my place only has one bedroom and.."
"Say no more!"
Lance snapped his fingers and a door appeared right beside Hunter's bedroom door. "Let's take a look!" Lance told Hunter. As Lance opened the door, Hunter was amazed to find a luxurious bedroom with a massive bed, a walk-in closet, some gym equipment, and a personal hot tub! "I guess you don't need help settling in." said Hunter still bewildered. Lance laughed and said he was going to bed. Hunter left Lance's room and headed to his own. Compared to Lance's room, Hunter's room was nothing. However, Hunter liked the room as it was and decided not to redecorate. He simply lied on the bed and relaxed himself to sleep.

Hunter was awakened by loud laughter behind his wall. It was about time to get up but Hunter preferred to get up without an alarm. Knowing the noise was coming from Lance's room, Hunter went to Lance's door and knocked. Lance yelled behind the door telling Hunter to come in. Hunter came in and found Lance in his hot tub with a wolf girl and a cheetah girl lying their heads against Lance's bare pecs. "Hunter!" Lance yelled to him, "Come on in! Enjoy the ladies' company!" Hunter was once again bewildered. "Where did they come from?" Hunter asked Lance. "Something I just whipped up on my own. Come on in!" Hunter thought Lance was crazy but he thought the ladies looked fine. Since he was already in his boxers, Hunter joined the party. When he did, the cheetah girl swam from Lance to Hunter's protective arms. Regardless, Hunter needed to talk to Lance about room rules.

After a while, Lance grew bored and got out. Everyone followed after him. The girls said their thanks and goodbyes and Lance used his powers to disappear. With them gone, Hunter could talk to Lance. "As much fun as it was Lance, I would appreciate it if you could keep down a bit. I was asleep till you all started. If you are to use your powers, could you be more subtle with them while I'm sleeping?" Lance at first didn't understand what Hunter was talking about but then he realized he got carried away. The place was Hunter's place too and he need to respect his brother's space. "You're right dude," Lance said. "I'm sorry. I just got excited with all that happened yesterday." Hunter accepted his forgiveness. "By the way," Lance continued, "I just got a call from Mike. He said he wanted to meet us." "Why?" Asked Hunter. "He didn't say." "Better not keep him waiting then."
11411121111211211112.title: Call it a day.

114111211112112111121.content:
The next morning, you and Lance were ready and dressed once you both headed out of your house. It didn't take long for you two to head to the gym. It was also before opening hours, so the only people there were Mike and the gym employees. Hunter taps on the glass and Mike was the one to check who it was. Once he spotted you guys, Lance was waving at him and Mike waved back. He immediately opens the door and lets you two in. "Hey fellas! Glad you could make it! I'd really like to thank you two again for stopping by yesterday."

Lance holds up a hand, "Hey, no problem. It was a lot of fun."

"So what was it you needed us for?", Hunter asks.

"Well I just wanted to know if you two wanted to go on a trip?", Mike asks.

Lance jumped at the idea, "What kind of trip are we talking about?"

Mike holds up two plane tickets, "Well, a friend of mine said he won two plane tickets to a sunny beach just off of California, but he said he wasn't able to go because he was too busy with work to leave. So he offered to give them to me and I accepted them. But now, being that I currently own one of the hottest gyms in town, I've become too busy to go too. So, I was wondering if you two wanted to go instead? It's for 3 days at a resort and everything."

Hunter shifts a hand at Mike, "You're too kind..."

Lance steps up interrupting him, "We would love to!" Lance whispers to Hunter, "Come on man! It's to a sunny beach resort. Besides, we wouldn't want them to go to waste."

You sighed, but you knew that once Lance had his mind set on something, there would me a less likely chance of him forgetting about it. "Alright, we'll take 'em."

"Great!" Mike hands you the tickets, "It's good to know these tickets won't go waste after all." You glance at Lance, thinking he had something to do with what Mike just said. Lance glances at you, but he telekinetically told you he honestly had nothing to do with it. "The plane leaves tomorrow. So you best be getting ready." You and Lance stare at Mike with a pretty surprised look on your faces. Mike scratches the back of his head, "Guess I, should've told you guys that first, huh."

"Nah, don't worry about it. We can manage.", Lance assured.

You two thanked Mike for the tickets and decided to stay a bit for a workout. Afterwards, you two went to prepare for tomorrow. It didn't take very long for you two to get ready. Infact all you really did was stuff a couple things into a small backpack. While Lance said he would just teleport his stuff there. Suddenly, there was a knock at the door. You were the one to get up and answer it.
114111211112112111121.title: Meet Mike in the gym

1141112111121121111211.content:
Hunter opened to door to find a familiar yet lovely face. It was Trixie. Hunter's heart skipped a beat at the surprise. "Trixie." Hunter said with nothing better to say. "Hi Hunter!" said Trixie. Hunter let her in. "What brings you here?" "Lance invited me." said Trixie. "He said you wanted to talk to me about something." Hunter turned to Lance who was peeking at the edge of the hallway. "Excuse me." said Hunter to Trixie and he walked to Lance.

Lance was still chuckling when Hunter approached him. "What's the big idea?" Hunter asked. Lance's laughing subsided and told him, "Don't get mad but I was thinking maybe Trixie could come with us on our trip." What?!" said Hunter.
"Look, I can make a third ticket no problem. It's California bro! What girl wouldn't want to go?"
"Why her of all people?"
"Don't give me that man. I saw how you looked at her at the party. It doesn't have to take a god to see that you two really like each other."
Hunter blushed. "Well, yeah I do."
"Then let her come! You two will have a great time! Who knows? Maybe she'll be your goddess."
Hunter's red cheeks darkened at Lance's slight laughter. "Shut up!" Hunter told him.

Hunter couldn't really think of a comeback for Lance's cupid act. He really liked Trixie and would love it if she could come. So, he walked back to Trixie who was still standing where Hunter left her. "Sorry about that." said Hunter. "Is everything alright?" asked Trixie. "Yeah, yeah everything's fine." "So what's up?" Hunter was really nervous. What if she said no? He wanted her to go because she wanted to, not because of his powers. Hunter took a deep breath and went for it. "I hope this isn't too sudden," He started. "But Lance and I are headed to a fun California trip. Would you be interested in coming with us? I'll understand if you can't." Trixie gave a smile of excitement and joy. A trip with a nice, big, and strong guy like Hunter, how could she refuse. "I love to come!" She exclaimed. "I'll go and start packing!" "Ok, great!" said Hunter. "Thank you!" Trixie came up to Hunter on her toes and pecked him on the cheek. Trixie ran out yelling, "I'll see you tomorrow!"

Hunter sat on the couch relaxed and happy. She said yes! "That wasn't so bad now was it?" said Lance coming towards the couch. Hunter, still embarrassed about what Lance did, said "Thanks, but next time, let me know when you're going to play cupid. I'm going to pack more." As Hunter was walking to his room, Lance yelled to him, "Just call me the god of love!" Hunter slammed to door.
1141112111121121111211.title: It was Trixie

choices: You all exit out of the plane.
11411121111211211112111.content:
The next day, Hunter, Trixie, and Lance were walking through the airport. Hunter and Lance each had one luggage bag that they carried with them, while Trixie was carrying a backpack around her back. Trixie wraps her arms around your large left arm, "Ooh, I'm so excited! I never got to travel before. Though, I'm also a little afraid of planes."

"Oh, don't worry. I'm sure it's nothing to worry about.", Hunter assured. "But not to worry. If something does happen, this strong and muscular tiger'll be there to protect you."

You tense up the muscles in your left arm as Trixie still had her arms wrapped around it, "Oh you.", she said with a smile.

Hunter overhears a chuckle coming from Lance. Hunter just squints his eyes at Lance, "Mm..."

Once you three made it to the gate, you each handed your tickets to the female hyena flight attendant. "Thank you. You three have a great trip.", she said with a grin.

The plane takes off a couple minutes later. You were sitting in the middle of three seats. Trixie sat to your left against the window while Lance sat to your right. Trixie was astounded by how high up the plane was traveling as she stared out the window a couple times. As for Hunter and Lance, they were just on and off having conversations about random stuff. Later on into the trip, Hunter was now busy reading a magazine. Suddenly, Trixie leans her head against Hunter's shoulder. It turns out she was just asleep, using Hunter's large shoulder muscle as a pillow. Seeing her asleep like this puts a smile on Hunter's face. Suddenly, Lance's head leans against Hunter's other shoulder. Hunter turned his head towards Lance, who was also using his other shoulder muscle as a pillow. Only he was drooling. Hunter sighs heavily.

A bell rings, and the pilot says, "Attention everyone, we will be reaching our destination in about 15 minutes. Please remain seated and have your seatbelts kept on until we land. Thank you."

Hunter starts to wake Trixie up by shifting his shoulder a bit. "Hey, Trixie." Trixie starts to open her eyes. "We're almost there."

Trixie sits up straight, and then stretches a bit. "Mmm... Already?" Trixie looks out the window, "Wow..."

Lance suddenly speaks up in his sleep, "No mama. I don't that dress makes you look fat...zzz..."

Hunter starts shaking Lance's head, "Get off!"
11411121111211211112111.title: At the airport

114111211112112111121111.content:
Hunter, Trixie, and Lance walked out of the airport to get their first glimpse of California. They all heard the traffic, people talking, and ocean waves crashing. Hunter could smell the exhaust from the passing cars but there was a hint of freshness coming from the nearby beaches. Trixie was beside herself. She gasped in excitement and let herself go. "This place is amazing!" she said. "I know!" yelled Lance. "I can't wait to see the town!" Hunter shared their enthusiasm but wanted to take the trip one step at a time. He said to his friends, "First, we need to find a place to stay." Lance smiled at Hunter. "Don't worry," Lance said. "I got that covered!" Hunter talked to him telepathically, "What do you mean you got it covered?" Lance responded, "I mean I got it covered! Come on, man. Why not live it well while we're here?" Hunter knew he couldn't control Lance and he thought it would be nice to have some luxury while they were here. While Hunter and Lance were talking, Trixie called a cab and told them to get in.

Thanks to Lance's powers, the cab stopped at the nicest hotel in the city. Trixie was amazed that she was going to stay here and gave Lance and hug around his muscular arm. They checked in and made their way to the luxury floor of the hotel. Their room had three bedrooms, a massive couch and tv in the center, and a fine kitchen in the corner. Lance leaped onto the couch with a loud thump. "Couch's good!" he exclaimed. Trixie looked into the bedrooms and said, "the bedrooms look amazing!" Hunter really liked the room too. It was almost as good as his place. Lance got up and stretched. "Well," he said, "I'm going to their gym for a workout." Lance took off his shirt and Trixie help but admire the rippling abs and pecs on Lance. "You two have fun!" Lance went out.

Hunter sat on the couch and Trixie followed him. Trixie gave Hunter a hug around his abs. "Thank you so much for taking me. This is going to be fun." "No problem." said Hunter shyly as Trixie ran her hand on his abs. "I'm just glad you could come. I think we should take it easy today and start looking around tomorrow." Trixie agreed. "I'm going to take a nap." said Trixie. "How about you join Lance in the gym." Hunter nodded and waved goodbye to Trixie. Trixie closed her door while Hunter went out the door.

As he made his way to the gym, Hunter found Lance doing ridiculous feats with weights and went up to him. Lance noticed him. "So did you kiss her?" asked Lance. Hunter blushed. "No! I told her we should take it easy today and start exploring tomorrow." Lance stopped working out and looked towards Hunter. "Come on, man! Talk to her! You're a big strong tiger god! Surely you can talk to a girl!" Hunter fell deeper into embarrassment. "I can't, ok? I get all nervous and don't what to do! She's not like the girls I flex for; she's different!" Lance just smiled. "When the time comes, tell her what you just told me. Anyway, I'm calling it a day. You go ahead and workout if you want." Lance left the room with an embarrassed and confused Hunter. Hunter just sighed and started working out, hoping it will distract him for a while. Hunter was thinking that Lance was right. If he really liked Trixie, he needed to talk to her. Maybe he can try tomorrow, he thought.
114111211112112111121111.title: Head to the resort

1141112111121121111211111.content:
Hunter had continued working out for about half an hour. He's currently doing arm raises with a 250-pound dumbbell with his right arm while he rested his left hand and leg on a benching equipment. Upon doing his tenth rep, his head turned towards a window in the gym. Out on the other side was the beach. His workout didn't tire him much, so relaxing on the beach should be just fine. Outside, the sun was glaring from above over the many beach-goers. Hunter was one of them, as he sat on the sand with an arm resting on his knees. The cool air was blowing against his fur as he stared straight towards the ocean. He still couldn't stop thinking about what he said earlier to Lance. And about him and Trixie. "Why is it so hard for me to just tell her how I feel?", he thought to himself.

Suddenly, Hunter sees a rather large wave forming just ahead. He blinks in response, "!" The wave was pretty big, but what really caught his attention was what was surfing on the top. He raises his hand over his eyes as he takes a closer look. The person surfing turned out to be a white-horned dragon with blue scales all over and only wearing a pair of dark-blue shorts. As the wave was descending he performed a few interesting moves, which started to attract a small group of people's attention. As the dragon headed towards the sand, he jumped off his surfboard to land on the sand on his own two feet. He was soon greeted by a small group of people. They were telling him how great he was back there and applauded him for his moves.

He thanked everyone for their kind words, and then told them he had to get going. He walked off from the group as they disbanded with his surfboard in his left arm. As he was walking off, he just happen to be walking in Hunter's direction. As he walked up closer and closer, Hunter got a good view of how big and muscular the dragon really was. "!!"

The dragon stops to look down at Hunter, "Hm?" Hunter couldn't believe it. He was almost as big as him. The dragon greets you with a smile, "Hi there."

Hunter blinks, "Uh, hi."

The dragon plants his surfboard on the sand. "The name's Troy." He scratches the side of his head a bit, "Heh. Sorry if I'm bothering you. I'm always happy to meet a guy with a well-built body like yours."

"..." Hunter grins, "Heh. No. It's quite alright."
1141112111121121111211111.title: Go to the beach

choices: Hunter and friends go into town
Hunter and friends go to the beach
11411121111211211112111111.content:
Although Hunter was a nice guy, he had trouble making friends. When he met Troy, Hunter forgot he was more muscular than he was and acted shy towards Troy. He didn't know what to say. "Nice to meet you." said Hunter. "I'm Hunter." Troy offered a smile and a handshake. "Nice to meet you!" Troy replied. "Mind if I have a seat here?" "No, go right ahead." Troy thumped in the sand next to Hunter. "Seriously dude," said Troy, "you're probably the biggest guy I've seen! The girls must really like you!" Hunter chuckled shyly and said, "Yeah, you'd think so."

Troy gave a puzzling look to Hunter. "What do you mean?"
"Never mind, I don't want to put it out on you."
"Don't worry about it! Come on!"

Hunter let out a big sigh, thinking Troy wouldn't leave him alone unless he told him. Hunter began, "Well, there's this one girl that I really like, but I think she only likes me for my muscles. Not that there's anything wrong with that, but I kinda want to know her more but I just can't talk to her!" Troy chuckled out the side of his mouth. "Who would've thought that big tiger like you would be afraid of talking to a girl." Hunter began to get up and leave until Troy grabbed him by the arm. "Come on, man. I was just kidding." Hunter sat back down. Troy thought for a minute to come up with advice. "Listen, if Trixie really likes muscle guys, why don't you try charming her by doing something cool? When you do, there won't too much pressure and she'll already think you're cool!" Hunter thought that made sense. If he used his powers, may he could get her attention and try talking to her. "I guess that makes sense." said Hunter. He then paused. "Wait a minute, I never told you the girl's name. How did you know her name?"

Troy said "oops" in his head and put his hands on Hunter's shoulder. "Ok, ok, Lance asked me to talk to you about your girl problems. Believe it or not, I'm popular with the ladies!" Hunter was surprised to hear this. "How do you know Lance?" Hunter asked. "We just got here today." At that moment, Troy flexed and tensed his muscles. Hunter's eyes and mouth widened as Troy's muscles grew, stretched, and thickened to Hunter's size. Troy stopped growing and said smiling, "I'm a god too!"

"What?!" Hunter exclaimed. "Lance knows other gods besides me?!"
"Yeah, Lance and I met at a surfing contest a few years ago. We grew suspicious of each other after we tied for first place. Been buds ever since."
"Seriously?!"
"Yep!"
"I'm going to have a long talk with him!"
"Don't go too hard on him. He means well."
"I guess."

Hunter cooled down a little bit from the surprise and took a deep breath. Troy got up to stare into the ocean. "Besides the surprise, think you can use my advice?" Hunter nodded. "Good. I gotta go. Listen, if you need me or just want to hang out, let me know." Troy then ran into the ocean with his surfboard and caught a wave he created. Hunter just watched as Troy surfed into the nothingness of water. Hunter had enough surprises for the day so he made his back to the room and crashed for the night. Before he went to sleep, Hunter planned to talk to Trixie in the morning, starting by doing something that will catch her attention. Before he could think what that something was, Hunter fell asleep.
11411121111211211112111111.title: Get to know Troy.

114111211112112111121111111.content:
The next morning, Hunter awoke from his slumber. He let out a long yawn and rubs one of his eyes. He slowly sits up in bed, and that's when he feels something on his abs. It turned out to be Trixie's right hand. She was still sound asleep. You stared at her for a moment, but couldn't help but put on a warm smile at her as well. You slowly shift a large paw through Trixie's hair, when all of a sudden, the door of your guys' room slams wide open, scaring both of you wide awake. It turned out to be Lance. "Hey you two! Let's get going! We're gonna go walkin' around the town!" Both Hunter and Trixie stare smugly at Lance. "... Eh...I'll, wait outside."

Lance closes the door shut as a pillow was thrown at the door. The pillow was thrown by Hunter. Hunter sighs, and says as he scratches the side of his head, "Eh-heh... Sorry about my friend. He doesn't seem used to keeping quiet most of the time."

Trixie began rubbing one of her eyes, "No. It's okay. I'm actually glad he woke us up anyway. I'm not much of an earlybird myself." Trixie looks up at you so that you were staring at each other eye-to-eye. "Hee."

You just smile back at Trixie as you both stare at each other for a moment. Lance suddenly knocks on your door, "Hey! You guys comin' or not!?"

"Alright! We're getting up already!", Hunter yells out.

Later, Hunter, Lance, and Trixie were out and about walking through an outlet mall. You three were just starting to walk on through while Lance had a smoothie to drink. Hunter remembers about what he told himself last night. At this point, he wasn't very sure about Trixie's interests. Other than muscles of course. "What better place than an outlet mall, huh?", Lance telepathically tells Hunter.

Hunter glances at Lance, and then sighs in his head. "You know, part of me kinda saw this coming.", he tells Lance telepathically.

"Hey, let's stop by here!", Trixie calls out. Hunter looks at the place Trixie was pointing at. Maybe it's the place to find out more about her interests.
114111211112112111121111111.title: Hunter and friends go into town

1141112111121121111211111111.content:
Lance and Hunter followed Trixie to a clothing store. It was the type where people could get both casual and nice clothes. Hunter looked intrigued. "You sure you want to come in here?" asked Hunter. "Why not?" Trixie said. "Everyone deserves nice clothes. No offense Hunter, but you could use some proper clothes! I like you in your tank tops but you need some more suitable." Hunter and Lance looked at each other, shrugging their shoulders in a "what the heck" kind of gesture.

Trixie didn't know what to get for Hunter due to his size. Clothing that fits and looks good can be hard to find for muscular people. Although Trixie loved Hunter's muscles, she wanted to see if she could find something that could cover them up or slightly define them. She grabbed a green polo shirt and Hunter placed it in front of his chest. Trixie thought a polo would be tricky. They were nice shirts but they would emphasize his arms a lot; she wanted him to look a little slimming. She wasn't sure what to do. Trixie dragged Hunter to a fitting room with a series of mirrors around to corner. She stood next to him thinking of what to do. Lance was looking at tank tops meanwhile but knew what was going on thanks to his powers. Lance contacted Hunter telepathically, "So, she's a fashion expert at heart!" Hunter responded, "Yeah, I guess so. She had try on different shirts and pants to see if anything can slim my muscles. We found some pants but nothing for shirts." "Here's your chance, dude! Talk to her!" "What should I say?" "Anything!" "But what?" It was too late. Lance stopped talking and left Hunter alone with Trixie.

Trixie was still thinking while Hunter tried a lot of shirts. "I just don't know!" said Trixie. "I just can't think of slimming clothing. Do you have any ideas?" Hunter didn't know anything about fashion. He just put on what he thought was comfortable. He thought for a minute and just said, "What if I wore a second shirt?" Trixie looked at Hunter closely and widened her eyes and mouth. "That's it!" Trixie exclaimed. "That's perfect! I know just what to do! You stay here while I get some things. You're a genius!" Trixie ran off and Hunter felt proud of himself, even though he didn't mean to. This could be his chance to get close to Trixie.

Trixie came back with some singe colored shirts and plaid buttoned shirts. "Try these." Trixie asked Hunter. After putting them on, Hunter showed himself to Trixie. She thought he looked amazing. She ran to get Lance. When she returned with him, Lance shared her enthusiasm. Hunter had a pair of jeans with a red long sleeved shirt and a blue and green plaid shirt over it. Hunter slightly flexed his arm as a sign of approval. "I think I look awesome!" said Hunter. "Thanks, Trixie." Trixie couldn't hold it anymore. She ran up to Hunter and gave him a hug around his abs. "I can't believe how good you look!" she said to Hunter. "Thanks for helping me!" Hunter smiled and said, "Thank you." Lance knew this was a special moment for them, so he didn't say anything to embarrassing the both of them.
1141112111121121111211111111.title: A clothing store.

11411121111211211112111111111.content:
After paying for the new line of clothes you all exited out of the store. Trixie still couldn't help but keep looking up and down Hunter's large and covered frame. Hunter noticed her looking back at him as well. "Uh, is everything alright Trixie?"

Trixie looks up at Hunter, "Huh? Oh! Yeah, of course. Sorry, you're fine. I still just can't help it with the way you look." Trixie came to a stop, "Huh? Ooh!" Trixie ran off. Hunter and Lance both turned their heads to the place Trixie ran off to. "I'll be right back you two.", she says as she runs inside a perfume store.

Lance was about to walk off, "I'll, meet you two at the food court."

Hunter grabs Lance's shirt and drags him along to the store, "Come on. No one said you have to go inside." Hunter and Lance waited in front of the store for about ten minutes. At that time, they both turned their heads to see Trixie walking out of the store with a small bag. Hunter and Lance stood up, "Hey Trixie. All done?" Hunter began sniffing something in the air. "Whoa. You sure smell nice."

"Do you like it?", Trixie asked. "I smelt this earlier and just had to try it."

Hunter sniffs her one more time. "Hm. Well, it sure makes you smell ravishing."

Trixie chuckles a bit, and says as she holds Hunter's hands, "Thanks."

Lance was looking away. "Cheesy..."

Hunter turns his head to Lance, "There something you'd like to share with us, Lance?"

Lance looks back Hunter, "Huh? Oh no, no, I was looking at a poster at the food court. But seriously, can we go there? I really am hungry."

"Alright, alright." Hunter looks at Trixie, "That okay with you?"

"Yeah!", Trixie yells out. "I can go for some food."

As you three headed for the food court, Hunter was starting to think to himself some more about Trixie's interests. She seems to be interested in fancy clothing and fancy smelling perfumes. He was also starting to feel, maybe his muscles weren't the biggest part of her interests after all. He thought about talking to her about it, but, then again the food court might not be the best place to do so. "Hey, mind if I join you guys?"

The three of you turn your heads to see who it came from. It was Troy!
11411121111211211112111111111.title: Go somewhere else

choices: Hunter spends more time with Trixie
Hunter spends more time with Lance
114111211112112111121111111111.content:
"Troy!" Lance exclaimed, giving Troy a bone crushing hug. "What are you doing here?" "I thought I'd say hi after hearing you guys were in the neighborhood." Troy replied. "And I wanted to check on my favorite bud!" Trixie looked puzzled as to who Troy was but Lance explained. "I tell you, I thought for sure I was going to win that surfing contest!" Lance told Trixie while directing at Troy. Hunter didn't mind Troy. He seemed like a decent enough guy, despite his similarity with Lance. "How about we get some food?" said Hunter. Everyone nodded and went off to fine lunch.

Hunter, Lance, Trixie, and Troy found a table while waiting for their food. Hunter, Lance, and Troy led most of the ongoing conversation while Trixie just sat there. Troy noticed her silence. "I'm sorry," Troy said to Trixie. "Here we are going on. Tell me Trixie, what do you do for a living?" Trixie replied shyly, "I work as an assistant for a fashion designer." "Really?" said Hunter, finally understanding her interests. Trixie nodded. "Yeah, I really enjoy the fashion world. I even have my ideas for a clothing line." Troy looked intrigued. "Do you have a sketchbook?" Trixie said yes and handed a spiral notebook to Troy. Troy opened the notebook with Lance and Hunter looked over each of his shoulders. Trixie's designs looked very interesting. Most of them were women's clothing with bright colors but there were a few clothing ideas for muscular guys. Obviously, Hunter was her inspiration. "These look pretty good!" said Hunter. "I really like the colors you use." Trixie blushed. "Thanks. I think our food is ready. I'll be right back." Trixie left the table leaving the guys with her notebook.

As soon as Trixie was out of hearing, Troy huddled with Hunter and Lance. "I have an idea." He told them. "Let's get her clothing line set up! With our powers, we can make famous!" Lance, as expected, was excited about the idea while Hunter was reluctant. "I don't know, guys." said Hunter. "Come on, Hunter!" said Lance. "You can only make it through the fashion world by knowing people and Trixie just so happens to know a few gods!" Hunter made a point. Trixie couldn't achieve her dream unless she knew someone of high status. She was a nobody to fashion people. Hunter sighed. "Okay, let's do this." Lance and Troy gave each other high fives for having a plan. Trixie came back with a tray of food.

Trixie noticed the high five and a concealed smile on Lance's and Troy's face. "What's up?" asked Trixie. "Well, Trixie," Troy began, "I just so happen to know some designers in the area. I would really like to show your work to them if that's okay with you." Trixie simply lit up. "Seriously?!" Troy nodded. "I'll let them know about you and see what they say." Trixie came around the table to give Troy a big hug. "Thank you! Thank you so much! I can't believe this!" The group enjoyed the rest of their lunch and Troy made his leave shortly after. Hunter, Trixie, and Lance said their goodbyes to Troy. Before Troy left, Hunter asked him with telekinesis, "Do you really know fashion people?" Troy gave a thought chuckle and said, "Not yet." Hunter sighed and went back to Trixie and Lance.
114111211112112111121111111111.title: Let him join

1141112111121121111211111111111.content:
Lance, Hunter, and Trixie continued exploring the outlet mall some more. They all passed by one place, but then Lance ran right back. "Whoa! A fitness store! I'm gonna go lookin' around here. You two go ahead on your own."

"Okay", Trixie replied. "We'll both wait out here when you're done."

Lance thumbed up, "Right on."

Hunter says suddenly, "Uh-uh, I'll go with you Lance."

Lance yells into Hunter's head, "DUDE!? You seriously gonna leave Trixie all by herself?!"

Hunter replies aloud, "Uh, uh..." Hunter sighs. "N-nevermind. I can always go another time.", Hunter says as he scratches the back of his head.

"Alright! I'll be right back." Lance runs into the store.

Hunter watches as Lance ran inside, but then his ears perk up as Trixie was shaking his right arm. "Come on. Let's sit." Trixie pointed back at an empty park bench. They both then walked over to the bench and sat on it. Trixie then pulled out her sketchbook and began sketching. Hunter was starting to feel a little awkward since he hasn't actually said anything for time being. "I can not believe my life so far!!", Trixie suddenly yells out happily. I met the cutest and handsomest guy, got to travel with him to a sunny place like this, met two of his awesome friends, and my even get my own line of clothing sooner than I thought. It all seems to good to be true!"

"..." Hunter smiled, but then it goes away once he looked away. He says in his head, "Yeah. But it's really just us three guys who happen to be gods." Trixie puts her sketchbook down, and then she wraps her arms around Hunter's large right arm. "!"

Trixie smiles warmly, "But it's you I love most of all." Hunter's eyes widen out a bit. "If it was for meeting you in the first place, none of this would be happening."

Hunter smiles back at Trixie. "Heh. !" He overheard Lance telling him, "Do it already! Tell her how you feel!" telekinetically in his head. He glances over to the shop, spotting Lance looking Hunter back inside. "..."

Trixie speaks up, "Hunter?" Hunter looks back at Trixie. "You look like you've got something on your mind. What is it?"

Hunter stares at Trixie with an uncertain look on his face, and then he finally starts to speak up, "Trixie..."
1141112111121121111211111111111.title: Hunter spends more time with Trixie

choices: Go on a date with Trixie
11411121111211211112111111111111.content:
Still feeling like confessing his love to Trixie was a bad idea, Hunter decided to it was now or never. He took a deep breath, expanding and puffing his chest. "Trixie, I'm really glad I got to meet you. I really do. I hope you feel the same way." Hunter paused, trying to collect his thoughts. "I like being big and strong, but I think found something that I like more." Trixie looked confused. She tilted her head up to look at Hunter in the eyes. "Hunter, what are you trying to say?" Hunter took another breath, struggling to get those words out. He finally got the words to his mouth. "I like you, Trixie. I, like, really do. You're nice, smart, passionate, and beautiful. You are much more than that and I want to see more of you." Trixie looked a little surprised but Hunter could what looked like a content smirk at the corner of her mouth. "Well, what do you say?" asked Hunter. Trixie stood up, got in front of Hunter, and kissed him on the mouth. "I say, I like you too." Trixie said simply.

Hunter looked at Trixie with a smile of joy. He too got up and gave Trixie a hug that literally carried her off her feet. Trixie loved Hunter's hug because she was surrounded by comforting and protective muscles that belong to someone she could lean on. During the moment, Hunter and Trixie heard a repetitive clap in the background. They turned to see Lance clapping with plastic bags filling around his bumpy arms. "It's about time!" Lance exclaimed. "I was just about to give up on you two!" Trixie blushed and asked Lance, "Was it that obvious?" Lance nodded hard. Hunter put Trixie down and they gave one last smooch before resuming reality.

Hunter, Lance, and Trixie decided to head back to their hotel to relax. Trixie went to her room to take a nap, leaving Hunter and Lance on the couch. Lance slapped Hunter on his shoulder. "You see?! That wasn't so hard!" Hunter looked back at him. "You kidding?" replied Hunter. "I was completely nervous!" "You were fine! Besides, you got a girlfriend out of it!" Hunter smiled agreeing with Lance. "By the way," continued Lance, "Troy contacted me. Everything's set for Trixie, but he gave us, including him, a little something." "What's that?" "He got us all to model Trixie's larger clothing designs!" Hunter perked up. "Say what?" "Yeah man! Come on! We'll be in posing in great clothes and great guns!" Lance, at that moment, put his hands on the collar of his tank top and tore it in half to show off his 8-pack abs and pecs the size of bicycle wheels. Hunter shrugged and said "I suppose, but was ripping your shirt really necessary?" Lance made a jokingly made a face as if he was insulted. "Dude, it's a crime to hide these!" Lance flexed his chest and arms, growing them to mass proportions and pushing blood and adrenaline in his already showy veins.

Hunter, amused Lance's enthusiasm, asked, "When do we start?" "Troy didn't say. He said he'll let us know when it's time. Until then, maybe you should do something with Trixie huh?" Hunter blushed and wanted Lance to stop teasing him about Trixie, but Lance had a point. Maybe he should. Hunter put that idea at the corner of his mind until he knew what other plans might emerge.
11411121111211211112111111111111.title: Tell her now

choices: Go out to see a movie.
114111211112112111121111111111111.content:
Lance continued making a couple different flexes and poses, pumping his arms, chest, and even his legs. Hunter was off thinking to himself about him and Trixie. Lance's last pose was an upwards left arm flex and a downwards right arm flex. Lance looks down at Hunter while holding his pose. Hunter seemed to be staring at the floor the entire. Lance holds out a hand in front of Hunter's face and snaps his fingers to get Hunter's attention, "Huh-huh!?" Hunter looks up at Lance, "What?"

Lance throws his arms up, "Dude!? I've been flexing and posing for over a minute! What's it take to get some attention around here?"

"Oh. Sorry man.", Hunter responded. "I was just thinking about earlier."

Lance stares at Hunter, "Mm-hm. That explains it." Lance shrugs his shoulders, "Hey, I thought it was a little cheesy too, but, you know."

"That's not what I meant!", Hunter yells out. "I was just thinking, if, maybe me and her could..."

Lance interrupts, "Get married? Have a baby? Live together happily ever after?"

"G-...go out on a date!", Hunter finished.

"Oh.", Lance responded. "'Cause I was about to say you were gettin' too far ahead of yourself." Lance raises both his arms up in a flexing pose, "Well, you can think about that while I go out to the beach to show the ladies these big guns. Maybe even work out with Troy and show him who's the big guy around here."

Later that day, the sun was about to set. Lance was still gone and Hunter was still sitting on the couch and watching TV. He overhears the door of his and Trixie's room opens. Just as Trixie stepped out, Hunter was already standing in front of her. Trixie jumps up a bit once she spotted Hunter standing in front of her, "! Hunter! You...", she looks up and down Hunter's large frame to see he was in a what and black suit, "...fully dressed."

"Yeah." Hunter starts scratching the side of his cheek, "Hey, I was, sorta wondering...if you...would like too..."

Trixie chuckles, and then gives Hunter a big hug, "Ohhh, you're so shy and nervous, yet so cute and handsome. I'd love to go out with you."

Hunter's ears perk up, "Really? ... How, how did you know...?"

Trixie arches her hips a bit, "Come on Hunter. Who dresses up in a suit at this time of night. And jingles a pair of keys in his hands too?"

"Oh." Hunter holds out a hand from behind his back that had a pair of keys in it. "Right."

Trixie smiles, "Heheh." She walks up to Hunter to hold his hand, "I'll got get ready." She stands on her toes to give Hunter a kiss on his cheek.

Hunter blushes, "..."
114111211112112111121111111111111.title: Go on a date with Trixie

1141112111121121111211111111111111.content:
Hunter paced in front of Trixie's door rubbing his hands, arms, and neck. He made reservations for the city's best restaurant (thanks to his powers) but still wasn't sure how his date was going to turn out. He relaxed by thinking to himself that he can use his powers in case something went wrong. After about ten minutes later, Hunter's already anxious heart was beating faster. Trixie came out in a red silky and sleek dress that shaped her body perfectly. Her hips were slender and chest well shaped. Trixie added a smile to her look. "How do I look?" she asked Hunter. Looking at her made Hunter relax more. He couldn't believe how beautiful Trixie looked. She was truly the perfect image of a goddess. "You..you look amazing!" said Hunter, "like an angel!" Trixie blushed at the compliment. "So, shall we go?" Hunter took her hand and made their way to the front door of the hotel.

As Hunter and Trixie were walking down the stairs, Hunter used his powers to make a limo wait for the both of them at the front door. Trixie’s jaw fell to see the fancy limo waiting for her and Hunter to come in. They both got in (the limo was big enough for Hunter to get in no problem). Trixie lost her breath in the luxury. The seats were leather and a cooler of drinks were between her and her hulking date. “This is amazing, Hunter!” said Trixie. “How on earth did you afford it?” Hunter shrugged a giant shoulder and said, “I got my ways.” Trixie was suspicious, but the luxury of the limo distracted her mind into their date. She and Hunter were having a great time talking on their way to the restaurant and arrived before they knew it.

A white and finely dressed cat was waiting at the reservation desk as Trixie and Hunter got out of their ride. Hunter didn’t made reservations beforehand, but with a flick of a finger, Hunter and Trixie were on the VIP list. “We have a reservation,” said Hunter in a deep voice, trying to sound fancy. Trlxie giggled. The cat went through the list. “Ah, yes, here you are.” Said the cat. “Come this way.” Hunter and Trixie were led upstairs to a double door. As it opened, the room had tables full of people that seemed important and eating fancy food that looked incredibly expensive (a lot more than they’re worth). The VIP room bordered a glass-doored balcony that gave a remarkable view of the city.

Trixie and Hunter were placed at a table right next to the balcony. Hunter creaked his chair. He blushed as Trixie giggled. “I guess I’m a little too big.” He told Trixie. Trixie grabbed his hand over the table. “Don’t worry. I don’t mind.” As they were eating, Trixie couldn’t help but stare at Hunter’s muscles. Although his muscles were covered in Hunter’s suit, Trixie could still see their great definition and strength. Hunter began to relax as they were eating. He stopped jittering and muttered while he talked. Both of them were having a great time.

After dinner, Hunter and Trixie made their way to the balcony to admire the scene and each other’s company. Trixie hugged around Hunter’s arm feeling the pulsing and rippling tendons against her. Hunter enjoyed having a sweet, small, and innocent girl beside him despite his intimidating appearance. “This night truly was amazing,” said Trixie. Hunter nodded. “It really is.” Hunter then scooped Trixie off her feet and set her next to his protective chest. Trixie giggled and was met with a romantic kiss. This was the best night they ever had.
1141112111121121111211111111111111.title: Go out to dinner.

11411121111211211112111111111111111.content:
After their passionate kiss, Hunter notices Trixie unbuttoning a button on the right wrist part of his suit. She was about to slide his sleeve up over his massive forearm, "Uh, Trixie? What are you doing?"

Trixie looks up at Hunter, "!", she then lowers her head back down a bit while blushing a little, "Oh. Uh, sorry." She looks back up at Hunter, "I guess I got a little carried away there." Hunter still kept staring at her. "... It's just, whenever I'm with you and your fantastic body...I can't help but feel safe. Plus, feeling and caressing, let alone staring at your large forearm, it...it just feels nice."

Hunter blinks his eyes, blushing a tiny bit as well. He was happy with what Trixie said about him. He seemed even more happy with the feeling of Trixie's fingers slowly running along the muscles around his forearm. Hunter starts to blush a bit more as he says, "Actually, I meant what are you doing unbuttoning my sleeve, when you really should be unbuttoning my suit. At least then you'd be able to see more."

Trixie's eyes open a bit wider, her cheeks also turning redder. Hunter starts unbuttoning his suit. Once he was finished, he slipped his suit coat off and sets it on the railing of the balcony. Hunter now was in his white shirt coat that was underneath, which he starts unbuttoning next. Hunter starts unbuttoning his white shirt this time. "You know...you, you really don't have to...", Trixie adds.

Hunter slips off this white shirt and tosses it on the railing over his black suit. "Yeah. I don't have to...", Now in a tank-top, Hunter walks up to Trixie, wrapping his strong arms around Trixie's sides, "...but I just wanted to.", Hunter says with a smile. Trixie stares smiling at Hunter. Hunter smiles back. She then rests her head against Hunter's chest. She could hear Hunter lightly purring right in front of her. Trixie couldn't help but do the same thing, brushing her right hand over Hunter's exposed left arm. Hunter in turn tightened up the muscles in his arm. Trixie's arm was shifting around Hunter's forearm for a bit, and then made its way upon Hunter's large bicep. Hunter than raises his left arm a bit to flex his bicep while Trixie's hand was still caressing it. Hunter blushes a little again, "So, how does it feel?"

Trixie started to blush as well as she had a firm grasp on Hunter's towering arm and shoulder, "Honestly...you're...you're built like a tank! A soft, firm tank. You're a real powerhouse, that's for sure."

Trixie starts feeling the puffy part of Hunter's chest with her left hand. Hunter then tenses his chest a bit as he lowered his arms against his sides. He even bounced his pecs a few times, making Trixie chuckle. "Heh. Is there, a certain part that you like?"

Trixie fingered around Hunter's enormous chest a bit with her left hand while feeling his rock-hard 8-pack with her right. "... It's...actually kind of hard to choose. I'll just say, that I like every part of you."

Hunter suddenly tenses up all the muscles on his upper body even more than before. Trixie's eyes widened as she looked up at you. "If you say so.", Hunter said proudly. Hunter just kept on tensing and flexing his muscles, making every muscle and tendon in his body ripple and shred with great feeling. Hunter grasps Trixie's left hand with his left hand and places it over his right bicep. He flexes his bicep up and down a few times, making sure she got a great feel of what was underneath. "Feels nice, doesn't it?"

Hunter flexes his arm once more, flexing his muscles as hard as he could this time. He was even flexing all the muscles on his body in the process. Trixie could even feel a good vein pulsating from underneath his palm as Hunter held his flex. "Oh my..."

Hunter relaxes his muscles a bit as he lets go of Trixie's hand. He takes a step back and then does a double bicep flex for her. "Nothin' but solid steel.", he says proudly once again. Hunter's tank-top seemed to be getting stretched to its limit. Hunter does one more pose, which was a downward double bicep pose. He flexes hard once more for her, when suddenly, 'RRRIIIP!' his shirt ends up ripping right off of his body. Hunter blushes again, "Huh. I, actually kinda expected this. Didn't really think this tank-top was a match for me."

Trixie suddenly walks up to Hunter. Hunter looked down at her as she was wrapping her arms around his large waist and rests her head on his chest. "I didn't think so either. Still though, thanks for the wonderful show."
11411121111211211112111111111111111.title: Hunter shows off muscles

114111211112112111121111111111111112.content:
Trixie and Hunter held their position for a few minutes, but it felt like forever. Hunter pawed through Trixie's hair and back; Trixie rubbed her hands up and down Hunter's back, feeling every muscle she could sense. They were lost in each other's emotions until the cat interrupted them. He told them that Hunter's shirtless appearance was distracting the other guests and had to leave. Hunter and Trixie were offended but quickly forgot about it because they were together. They returned to their limo heading for the hotel room.

As they were driving, Hunter and Trixie began to come back to Earth. "I can't believe that guy kicked us out," said Trixie, "especially during a moment like that!" "Don't worry about it," responded Hunter flexing his chest. "They were just jealous!" They both giggled when the limo swerved suddenly. Trixie screamed. With no other thought, Hunter launched to Trixie, wrapping her in his protective arms until the limo came to a complete halt. "You okay?" asked Hunter. Trixie, still shocked, nodded. "What in the world happened?" He asked. Hunter got out of the car, Trixie right behind him. The limo's hood was smoking right in front of a dented road rail. They waded to the end of their ride to find the back right tire shredded. "A flat?" said Trixie. "How did that happen?" Hunter had no idea but he was freaking out on the inside. His date was going along perfectly until this happened. It just had to happen on a perfect night.

"What do we do now?" asked Trixie. "Nobody else is on the road and if we wait traffic will back up because of this!" Hunter smirked to himself. This night was just about to get even better. "I got an idea," said Hunter. "Stand back." Trixie did as she was told as Hunter squatted to the side of the car and placed his hands under it. Trixie knew what Hunter was trying to do. "Hunter, I know you're strong and all but I don't think..." The car began to squeak. Hunter's arms swelled and rippled more than ever before; it was as if his strength was trying to jump out of his fur. With all his strength (and a little bit of his powers), Hunter raised the limo over his head. Trixie was amazed! Her boyfriend could lift a limo as if it was a toy! Her emotions became a mix of pride and passion. Hunter charmed her even more by letting one hand go to flex a bicep. "Where should I put this?" Hunter asked Trixie with a smile. Trixie spotted and pointed to an opening in the rail leading to a pack of gravel. Hunter effortlessly carried the limo to the patch and let go with a loud thump. Hunter was circling his shoulders relieving the stress while Trixie wrapped herself in his abs. "That was amazing!" Hunter blushed.

Hunter and Trixie turned to see a small and deserted beach just below the road. Trixie bent over to remove her shoes and tore off the end of her dress to give her more room to move her legs. Hunter looked at her puzzled. "You wanna take a closer look at the beach?" Without answering, Hunter also took off his shoes and ripped the legs of his pants, revealing well sculpted calves. They both ran down to the sand. Hunter chased Trixie playfully and scooped her up his arms. He twirled her around as he was laughing joyfully. His muscles may have been hard, but they were comforting to Trixie. Trixie then got on Hunter's back for a piggy-back ride and Hunter ran as fast as he could. The wind blew Trixie's fine hair to ruins but she didn't care. After a while, Hunter sat down with Trixie on his meaty chest. Trixie was soothed by Hunter's pounding heart, which was still pumping from the lifting and playing. "That was amazing." Trixie said smoothly. "You really know how to make fun dates!" Hunter at this point was full of passion for Trixie. "It was my pleasure." said Hunter. "I just really wanted to make you happy." They then tilted their heads to each other and kissed as the waves of the ocean were crashing.
114111211112112111121111111111111112.title: Do something else tonight

1141112111121121111211111111111111121.content:
After their kiss, Trixie decided to lie on Hunter's chest. Hunter didn't mind of course. He wrapped his strong protective arms around Trixie's back. Trixie loved the feeling of Hunter's tight chest heaving up and down with each breath he took. She also rests her left hand on Hunter's right bicep, slowly shifting it up and down a bit. Hunter smirks a bit, pumping his bicep under her palm in return. All of a sudden, a fairly large wave washes up on shore, soaking up Hunter and Trixie both. Trixie sits up on Hunter's stomach to shake her hair dry while Hunter spits out some water from his mouth. Trixie gets up on her feet, "Well, that kinda stunk."

Hunter sits up, "Heh. Probably shouldn't have lied so close to the water."

A voice calls out, "Hey! Hunter!"

Hunter and Trixie look behind them. The person who yelled out turned out to be Lance, who was waving an arm at them as he and Troy were walking their way. Trixie waves back to them, "Oh! Hey Lance! Hey Troy!"

Hunter gets up, "He-hey you guys. I see you two are still here,", Hunter puts an irritated look on his face, "and still awake."

Lance and Troy stop in front of them both, "Yeah. This guy just won't leave me alone. He thinks he's all that and everything.", Troy replied.

"Look who's talkin'!", Lance exclaimed.

"I was just hangin' around the beach getting ready to surf. When all of a sudden, this guy stops me in my tracks to challenge me to a surf off. We surfed for hours, but he still can't get over the fact that I'm just better than him.", Troy explained.

"Well, aren't we the narcissistic one.", Lance added.

Troy points at himself, "Trust me. I've surfed much longer than you ever have."

Lance shifts a hand at Troy, "Whatever. So hey, what have you two been up to?"

"I was told you two were on a date. How romantic!", Troy added.

"We did! Hunter and I went to dinner, and the food was fantastic. After that, we just decided to stop by here.", Trixie explained happily.

"So uh, what happened to your clothes?", Lance asks.

Trixie and Hunter look at each other eye-to-eye, realizing how much less clothed they were. Trixie starts to blush, "Um... Well..."

Hunter blushes a bit too, scratching the back of his head as he glances away, "Funny story..."

"Eh, nevermind.", Troy interrupted. "Anyways, it's nice to see you two had fun." Troy does a bit of stretching. "Well, I'm gonna turn in tonight."

"Alright. Same time tomorrow?", Lance asks.

Troy starts walking away, "Oh boy, here we go?"

"What?" Lance follows along, "I'm just asking for a friendly competitive, weight-involving game tomorrow."

Troy and Lance continue playfully fighting at each other as they were walking off. Hunter sighs. "Man. It seems like those two are a handful."

"Uh, Hunter...?"

Hunter turns his head towards Trixie, "Hm?"

Trixie walks up to him, holding his large right hand, "... Thanks again for the wonderful night. Shall we, do it again sometime?"

Hunter stares at Trixie, and then brightly smiles. He leans his head in to nuzzle with Trixie's nose, "You know it."
1141112111121121111211111111111111121.title: Lance and Troy show up

choices: They look and can't find Zack
11411121111211211112111111111111111211.content:
Hunter got out of bed feeling completely refreshed. A good night sleep from a great day was exactly what he needed. He got dressed in a tight red t-shirt and jeans and made his way to the living room. Hunter saw Trixie's bedroom door was closed; she must still be asleep after a long and pleasant night. Lance and Troy were sitting on the couch talking when Hunter walked in. "Rise and shine, Romeo!" said Lance. "You looked like you were having a good time with Trixie last night!" Hunter was a little annoyed that Lance and Troy interrupted them at the beach. "Yeah, key words: were having." said Hunter. Troy shrugged the bitter comment. "Come on, man. You should be thanking us! If it weren't for us, you would not have had Trixie on your chest at the beach to begin with!" What did Troy mean by that? Anger started stirring in Hunter. "Wait a sec," said Hunter, "you mean you had something to do with our flat tire?" Lance nodded and said, "and the beach. We added that too!" Hunter walked to the couch and stared them down. "Are you guys nuts?! We could have gotten killed!" "Relax, bro!" said Lance. "It was just a flat tire. Besides, I'm sure you would have done something in case something went wrong." "That's not the point!" Hunter exclaimed.

Lance got up and placed a hand on Hunter's shoulder. "Ok, bro, we're sorry. Come on; let us make it up to you." "How?" Before Lance and Troy could answer, they and Hunter noticed their surroundings disappeared without warning. They found themselves in a plain and deserted white area. “What did you guys do?” “We didn’t anything; I swear!” exclaimed Lance. “He’s right.” Said a cloaked figure who appeared out of nowhere.
