He took off his hood and Hunter recognized him instantly: it was the tiger person who told Hunter he was a god in the first place. “You all have been summoned by the request of the tiger deities, Hunter’s parents.” Hunter’s heart sunk to his back, making his spine shiver. “What?” replied Hunter. “My mom and dad want to us?” The servant nodded. “I will take you to them.”

The white limbo area took the shape of a luxurious throne room. Walls and columns were encrusted with gold and fine jewels. Right in front of Hunter, Lance, and Troy were a male and female tiger dressed as royalty. “Mom?” Hunter, still figuring out what’s happening, “Dad?” “Hello, Hunter.” Said Hunter’s mother. “It’s very good to see you.” “You certainly have grown.” Said Hunter’s dad. “With those muscles, you look like a god.” Hunter blushed and was grabbed by the shoulder. “I taught him everything he needed to know to stay in shape!” exclaimed Lance. Hunter’s parents didn’t believe Lance, but they acknowledge his comment with a nod. “Son, Lance, Troy,” began Hunter’s dad, “We need your help with something.” “Of course,” said Hunter, “Anything.” He literally meant anything. After seeing his parents for the very first time, Hunter was willing to do anything for them. He was so joyful to see a reflection of himself right in front of him. “Before we tell you, there is something you should know, Hunter.” Said Hunter’s mom. “You have a brother.” Hunter felt like dropping to the floor but resisted. “I-I have a brother?!” Lance and Troy looked surprised by this fact. Hunter never mentioned a brother. “Yes.” Said Hunter’s dad. “He is your little brother. His name is Zack. He does not know he is a god. We would like the three of you to approach Zack, tell him of his heritage, and watch over him.”

Hunter felt a ton of pressure falling on him every second. His parents want him and his friends to take care of a brother he never knew he had! How was he suppose to do that? Hunter asked, “Why can’t you let your servant approach him like he did with me?” Hunter’s parents stared down to floor as if they were ashamed. His mother answered, “Zack is more ‘troubled’ than you are. Our servant approached you because we knew you could handle it. It may not be the same case for Zack.” “We fear he may discover his powers too soon and abuses them.” Said Hunter’s dad. “Please, talking to someone similar to him may help him.”

Hunter was still absorbing it all. How was he suppose to take care of kid? He was always by himself until he became a god. Before he said anything, Troy interrupted, “Don’t worry about it! We’ll find him and lead him on the right path! You can count on us!” Hunter’s parents thanked Troy and looked at Hunter. “Will you help us, son?” asked his mom. “Yes.” Hunter responded reluctantly. “Thank you.” She said. “You’re dismissed.” Hunter, Lance, and Troy saw the throne room melt away with their room on Earth showing underneath. They were right back where they started. “So,” began Lance, “Where is this long lost brother of yours?”
11411121111211211112111111111111111211.title: The next morning...

choices: Zack seems like an okay guy.
Zack seems like a troubled guy.
114111211112112111121111111111111112111.content:
"I never knew...I had a brother...", Hunter softly says aloud.

Lance suddenly slaps Hunter on the cheek, "Snap out of it!"

"What the heck!?", Hunter exclaims.

"Sorry, you, just look like you zoned out for a moment there.", Lance replies.

"Well, whenever you two stop foolin' around...", Troy stood at the door way and swings the front door wide open, "...let's go and find Zack!"

Troy walks out the door, and then Lance says, "Do you even know where Zack lives?"

Troy soon walks right back in. "No, I don't."

"Zack actually lives just a few blocks away from here." All three turn their heads at the tiger figure who first greeted them, standing beside the couch Hunter and Lance were still sitting on. "I can help show you three the way. My name is Herman by the way."

Hunter and Lance stand up, Lance speaking up, "Herman huh? Well alright then!"

"Wait, just a few blocks away?", Hunter asks. He thinks a bit to himself, and then says, "Did, us having to come here have anything to do with this?"

"Not really.", Herman replied with a grin. "If you actually decided not to come here, we would have just summoned you three whether you met or not. It was just a good thing since it saves time on the introductions."

Hunter and friends stare blankly at Herman for a moment, Hunter replying, "Oookay..."

All of a sudden, the door to Trixie's room opens. Trixie entered out in her nightgown, her hair a little messy from her sleep as she rubs one of her eyes. Trixie raises her head, "Oh. You three are up already? Heh. Guess you can tell I'm not much of an early riser."

Hunter says to himself, "Huh? Did she just say the 'three' of us?"

"Yup", Herman replies. "Normal beings like her can't hear or see angels like me."

"Are you guys heading out?" Hunter blinks as his attention turns to her. "I'm actually planning to attend a convention soon, so I'll probably be gone most of the day. Is that alright?"

"..." Hunter thought about it for a moment, but this actually seems like a good thing. He, Lance, and Troy'll probably be gone for a while too. Hunter smiles at her, "Yeah. That's alright. You have fun." Trixie smiles back at him.

A couple minutes later, with the help of Herman and their powers, they found themselves walking along a pretty clean and sane neighborhood. The three were just walking by the gated community, watching kids run around and play on the streets, parents and their kids playing in a large pool area, and a park that was populated by kids and parents having fun and just lying around together. "This place seems nice.", Lance replies. "Maybe I should get a place here."

"NO!!", Hunter and Troy yelled.

"Though, about what you said...", Hunter added, "...this place is nice. I'd find it hard to believe Zack would be a troubled guy coming from these surroundings."

"Zack, hasn't been having as good a life as your parents had hoped. Your parents felt meeting him and telling him about his powers will make his life, a little more manageable.", Herman explained.

"I say we should get to know the kid first.", Troy suggested. "If he does sound, bad, I wouldn't want him abusing his powers once we tell him either."

"We're here.", Herman says. The three turn their heads towards a two-story house that lay in front of them. "He will be able to see me, but I'm not going to reveal myself to him, yet. You three go ahead and...how do you say...'break the ice'."

Hunter and friends stare blankly at Herman again like before, "Mm..."
114111211112112111121111111111111112111.title: They look and find Zack

choices: Get to know Zack more, enough to tell him.
Get to know Zack more, enough to not tell him.
1141112111121121111211111111111111121111.content:
Hunter, Lance, and Troy walked up to the doorway, Hunter standing at the front. Hunter goes ahead and rings the doorbell, then looks behind him to see Herman standing at a safe distance away from them. The three wait patiently for a moment, but no answer. Hunter rings the doorbell again, then waits patiently. Suddenly, Hunter turns back to Lance and Troy, "Just promise you two won't change anything about him once we meet him."

"Dude, he's a god. He just doesn't know it. You should know better than that.", Lance replied.

"Eheh, Sorry. Force of habit.", Hunter said, scratching the back of his head.

Suddenly, they all hear a lock click. They all turn around and await as the door opens slowly. As the door opens they each caught their first glimpse of the figure, that was Hunter's brother. Their eyes widen out a bit more as, the tall and slender figure leaning against the doorway with his arms crossed. He was wearing a red shirt coat with the sleeves ripped off, black jeans, and black sneakers. His built was muscular all over his tall body. People would find it hard to believe if HE were the younger brother and Hunter was his normal self. "Can I, help you guys?", he asks in a pretty aggravated tone.

Hunter blinks his eyes, "Uh! Hi. Um, are you Zack by any chance?"

Zack stares at Hunter when an eyebrow cocked, then says, "Yeah. Who wants to know?"

"Oh. Well, my name's Hunter, and..."

Zack interrupts, "Let me guess. You're another one of guys who are out to hunt for blood?"

Hunter stares at black, "...What?"

Zack sighs, then places a hand on his forehead, "Sorry. It's, been a long life." Zack looks up. "And who are those guys?"

Gesturing a hand at Lance and then at Troy, "Oh uh, this is Lance. And this is Troy."

"Yo!"

"Hi there."

Zack glares at the three, "Hmph. So what? This is your crew? You all here to beat me up or somethin'?"

"What!? No!", Hunter exclaims. "I came here because, well, to tell you that you're my brother."

Zack stares blankly at Hunter. "...... What?"

"Yeah I'm, your brother." Hunter starts rubbing the back of his head, "I actually found out about this recently myself."

"...... Is this some kind of joke!?", Zack questioned.

"..."

"You're here thirty seconds and you suddenly tell me you're my brother? I find that hard to believe! I mean, how did you even find me?", Zack questions.

Hunter didn't really know how to reply to that. "On the...internet?" Lance, Troy, and even Herman facepalm themselves.

"Riiight. Well, nice knowin' ya.", Zack says as he was about to shut the door.

Hunter quickly slams a hand against the door just before Zack shuts it. "Look, I really am your brother okay? I'm pretty I have something on me that'll prove it to you." Hunter reaches into his back pocket and pulls out his wallet. He begins reaching into it to find something of use. That was until he pulled out a photo. "!!"

Hunter holds out the picture to Zack. "!!" It was a picture of Zack and Hunter, back when they were young kids. "I...remember this moment... I mean, I remember it vaguely but, I can tell this is me and this is...you..." Zack chin shrivels up just a bit, and then he gestures a hand at Hunter and his friends, "Alright. You got me. Come on in."
1141112111121121111211111111111111121111.title: Zack seems like an okay guy.

choices: Lance and Troy show off their powers
1141112111121121111211111111111111121111.content:
Hunter, Lance, and Troy followed Zack into a very nice looking living room. It had a long and very comfortable couch fit for 5 people side by side, a glass coffee table in front of it, and a big flat screen tv on the wall. "Whoa!" exclaimed Lance, "You must be living the dream here!" Zack gave a little scoff from his mouth. "Yeah, I guess." "So," Hunter started, "Where are your folks?" "I don't know." answered Zack. "If I had to guess, probably in Hawaii." Troy perked his face to Zack. "Seriously?! And they didn't take you?" "That's what they do." said Zack. "They're always away at work. I haven't seen them for about five months now. They just leave me cash to live by and I call them when I need more." Zack's story saddened Hunter. Although Hunter had a rough step dad, his step dad at least acknowledged his existence. "That's sounds pretty tough." said Hunter. "Not really." said Zack. "I got everything I need here. What else do I need?"

Hunter then looked into Zack's mind with his powers. Hunter saw that Zack had a very lonely life. His parents were never around, even when he was a kid and he didn't have any friends. Zack didn't have anyone in his life. "What about friends, family?" Hunter brought up. Zack tried brushing it off by saying, "Why would I need people? They never needed me." "Everyone needs someone." Zack couldn't hold it in any longer. Tears leaked from his eyes. He always covered up his feelings with apathy. If nobody cared about him, why should he? Hunter got off the couch and wrapped his overly muscular arms around his tall baby brother. "I'm so sorry." Hunter told him. "I'm so sorry I wasn't there for you when you needed me. I'm here now. We all are." Lance and Troy followed Hunter to a group hug.

After Zack calmed down a little bit, they all sat down and talked about each other's life. Hunter told Zack about his life with his step dad and how bad things were with him. Lance told his life story about coming from a big family of seven in a small trailer park and Troy about living in a beach house with only his mom. They all were having a great time and Zack felt as if he was part of the group. "So how did you guys find out about me?" asked Zack. Then there was a pause. "Umm, we had some help." said Hunter. Zack didn't understand; his new brother and friends were so open to him and now they were hiding something. "What kind of help?" pressured Zack. "Come on, tell me." Hunter gave in. "We came across our real mom and dad. They told us about you and wanted us to see you." "It's true." Herman came into the room out of nowhere. Zack jumped. "Who the heck are you?" "My name is Herman; I am a loyal servant of your mother and father, the tiger gods." "What?" "Our parents are gods, Zack." said Hunter. "You're a god with supernatural powers. Lance and Troy are gods too." Lance and Troy shook their heads agreeing the truth.

Zack was beginning to be annoyed with the group. "Are you kidding me? You expect me to believe a ridiculous story like that?" Hunter, Lance, Troy, and Herman understood they needed to convince him through their powers. Hunter spoke up. "I'll show you." Hunter then took a pose and then tensed his muscles. Lance and Troy thought he was going to grow more muscular. Actually, Hunter's fur changed color from orange with black stripes to pale gold. His tail then followed the changing color and added a furry tip. Then hair grew from the sides Hunter's neck, turning into a mane. Zack, Lance, and Troy was surprised to see Hunter as a lion! Hunter himself was impressed because he never did a species change before. He then changed back into a tiger. "You believe us now?" Hunter asked Zack. Zack simply nodded in amazement.
1141112111121121111211111111111111121111.title: Get to know Zack more, enough to tell him.

choices: ...pumps himself up. (But later takes advantage of it.)
...pumps himself up. (But later uses it for evil.)
1141112111121121111211111111111111121111.content:
Zack takes a look down to stare at his hands. He clenches his fists a bit, but then looks up at Hunter. "Um...I don't know if I can do what you just did."

"Oh you don't have to do that.", Hunter replied happily.

Lance pops out from behind Hunter, "Yeah!" Lance starts making a pumped up pose, "Why not buff yourself up and become a bodybuilder?"

Troy pops out from behind Hunter as well, "Or, you can turn yourself into something easier? Perhaps a snow leopard?"

"Actually, I was thinking about something simple." Hunter points at something on the table, "Like picking up that pencil."

Lance and Troy stare down at it. Lance then responds, "What!?"

Zack glances towards it, "Um, okay."

Zack was about to reach for it with his left hand, "No no!", Zack turns to Hunter. Hunter starts tapping his head with his finger, "With your mind."

Zack looks back at the pencil, and then imagines the pencil being picked up on it own. To his surprise, that's exactly what happens. "!!" He starts moving his head around, the pencil also followed sue. "No way... This is unbelievable!" Zack grabs the pencil, and then looks down at the table. With a simple thought, he manages to pick it up with ease only using his mind! "Hah! This is incredible!" Zack sets the table back down, and then stands up looking at his hands again, "I can do anything!"

Herman places a hand on Zack's shoulder. Zack looks at Herman. "Just remember Zack. With great power, comes great responsibility."

Zack stares at Herman, and then nods his head. Lance whispers to Troy, "Heh. Haven't heard that one before." Troy slaps Lance on the back of his head, "Ow!"

Zack thinks to himself, remembering what Hunter did earlier. He wanted to try something like that. He turns to Herman, "Mind if I tried something?"

Herman holds a hand up, "Hey, I said you shouldn't go maniacal with it. I didn't say you could live a secondary life." They stare at Herman for a moment, each with the same expression on their faces from earlier. "What?"

"Alright." Zack throws his arms out, "Here I go." Zack closes his eyes, and then the fur all over his body was starting to change. Zack's orange and black fur was starting to turn white on his chin, chest, and abdomen changed to white, and the rest of his fur started to turn red. His ears started to change and become more pointed like fox ears. His tail also became a little shorter in length but more puffy. Hunter and the others were now in view of Zack, the red and white-furred fox. Zack starts checking himself all over, "Whoa... This is so awesome!" Zack looks up at Hunter with a smile on his face. Hunter smiles back, and then Zack runs over to him to try to give him a hug. "Eheh... You sure are big. Or, is that..."

"Yeah. It kinda is.", Hunter replied.

Zack backs up from their hug, "Hmm...in that case, let me try that again." Zack changes back to his tiger self. And then...
1141112111121121111211111111111111121111.title: Zack tries his powers

1141112111121121111211111111111111121111.content:
Zack stepped back, giving himself room to use his powers more. He pictured himself as big and powerful as Hunter, Lance, and Troy. All of a sudden, Zack's muscles felt knotted and tense; he held his breath to see the muscle knots push against his fur. Every muscle from arm to leg was being fueled with power and rippling to massive proportions. When Zack stopped transforming, he met Hunter, Lance, and Troy at eye level. At first, he had to look up to see them. Zack then looked down to see his new body. His clothes were still intact but clearly defined his new improved pecs and 8-pack abs. Zack put his hand under his shirt to feel his chest; he loved the feeling of his chest thickening as he stroked upwards. Zack loved the new him.

"You look awesome!" yelled Lance. "You almost look like you can take us!" Zack looked at Lance skeptically. "Almost?" Zack focused his powers again. This time, his muscles grew more massively and powerful than before. The sensation that came with the growth was almost unbearable to Zack. He kept growing until his fur erupted out of his shirt and lower part of his pants, making them both tear. He also grew a few inches taller than the trio. Zack stopped growing and flexed his arms into beachballs down at Lance. "I can take you guys easily!" said Zack in a deeper voice. Hunter was happy that Zack was enjoying his powers. "Let's see what you can do with those." said Hunter. Zack was way ahead of him. Zack already had the unnecessarily big couch in one giant paw over his head. "I think I'm going to enjoy this!" said Zack laying the couch with a loud thump.

"Say guys," said Zack, "I just came up with a great idea! I heard there's going to be a beach party tonight and it can't start without us giants being there!" Troy loved the sound of Zack's idea. "I'd say we go!" Troy exclaimed. "I'm pumped! Let's do it!" said Lance. "You up for it, Hunter?" "Absolutely," answered Hunter, "but is it okay if I invite someone?" Lance knew where Hunter was implying. "I'm sure Trixie would love to go with you. She'll die if you don't." He teased. Hunter slapped him at the back of the head. "Who's Trixie?" asked Zack. "Hunter's hot new girlfriend." said Troy. Zack knew he had to tease Hunter about it later because it was obvious Hunter was shy about his love life. Zack also began to think maybe he could find someone with his muscles. "Come on, Hunter, bring Trixie!" said Zack. "I'd love to meet her!" Hunter nodded. "Okay, I'll ask her."

"Awesome!" said Zack. "How about we pump ourselves up before we go?" "You have a gym in this place?" asked Troy. Zack opened the nearest door to show the a giant room with shelves of dumbbells, weight benches, treadmills, and other exercise materials for a good workout. There was also a refreshment bar on the left of the room. "There is now." said Zack implying he used his powers again.
1141112111121121111211111111111111121111.title: ...pumps himself up. (But later takes advantage...

1141112111121121111211111111111111121111.content:
Later that night, Hunter, Zack, and friends were already at the party. Lance was out talking and flirting to some girls while making a few muscular poses, the girls chuckling and giggling in reaction. Troy also had a small group of people standing in front of him and his surfboard. The group was a mix of guys and gals as he chatted with them a bit about surfing techniques and a few other things. Upon chatting he takes notice of one of the girls in the group, who was a white-furred lemur in a pink two-piece. He gives a wink at her, and she took notice, blushing a bit in response. Hunter and Zack were sitting on their own out near the shore, chatting a bit as they got to know more about each other. Zack was also back to his normal self. "So, you don't know very much about our parents?", Zack asks.

"Unfortunately no.", Hunter replies. "That was actually the first time I ever got to meet them."

Zack looks down, "Mm..." He then elbows Hunter against his massive shoulder, "Hey, maybe we should stop by and visit them sometime."

Hunter smiles back at Zack, "Heh. Yeah. Maybe we should." Hunter takes notice of Zack's current form. "You, sure you don't want to pump yourself up like before?"

Zack shrugs his shoulders, "Eh. I'm more into agility than strength." Zack holds out his right arm, then uses his powers to expand all of the muscles in his arm to large proportions, flexing his enormous bicep in response. "I do like the option though."

"Hi Hunter!", a female voice calls out.

They both turn their heads, Hunter responding back, "Oh! Hey Trixie!" Hunter and Zack stand up as Trixie walks up to them both wearing a red T-shirt that curved over her upper nicely, and blue short jean shorts, "I'm so glad you're here. This is Zack. My, little brother."

Trixie gasps. "You're little brother? I had no idea you had a little brother."

"Yeah. Eheh... Neither did I.", Hunter replied.

"..." Trixie looks at Zack, then back Hunter, then back at Zack. "Oh my gosh! You two do look alike!" Trixie runs up to Hunter to give him a hug, "I'm so happy for you two!" Trixie walks up to Zack. "Hi. I'm Trixie. It's so nice to meet you Zack."

Zack smiles warmly, "Heh. It's nice meeting you too."

Trixie smiles back. "Oh! I gotta head to the changing room real quick. I'll be right back."

"Take your time.", Hunter replies, waving back to her as she runs off. Zack watches as she runs off, but then the expression on his face slowly dwindles. Hunter turns to Zack, and then notices the expression on Zack's face. "Zack? Is something wrong?"

Zack sighs. "Must be nice to have been with someone who cares about you a lot."
1141112111121121111211111111111111121111.title: At the party

1141112111121121111211111111111111121111.content:
Zack's past memories came back to him. He went back to the time when he was five years old andhis parents ran around the house working while he wanted them to play with him. He also remembered when they first left him alone for a month at eight years old. A tear dripped from Zack's eyes. Hunter noticed it and gave Zack another hug. "You do have someone who cares about you." Hunter told Zack. "I care. I know we just met but your my brother and I care about you as much a brother can and should." Zack allowed every word to touch him. He grabbed his brother and buried his face into his chest to cry openly. Luckily nobody noticed them. Zack's heart was healing, but it was still sore.

Zack settled down after a few minutes. Hunter broke up the hug. "You okay?" Hunter asked. Zack nodded. "Yeah, I'm sorry." "Don't be. If you need to let it out, do it." Zack nodded again. "Oh, Hunter!" Zack and Hunter turned to find Trixie in a red two piece bikini. It shaped her curves and body perfectly. Hunter was awestruck; he couldn't resist picking her up and kissing her. "You look beautiful as always." Hunter told her. Trixie kissed him back. "And you look strong as ever." she said. Hunter put Trixie down. "Hey, Zack," said Trixie, "I met a girl in the dressing rooms. She seems nice and I think you'll like her." Zack's spirits went up instantly. "Really?!" Zack asked. "Yeah." answered Trixie. "She'll be out in a minute." Hunter was really happy to hear that. "Trixie, go on ahead to the party, I'll help Zack get ready to meet this lady." said Hunter. "Okay, but don't go flirting with her!" She teased and went off.

Hunter and Zack shared a grin. "See?" said Hunter. "Things are looking better already!" "Yeah," said Zack, "I guess you're right!" Hunter and Zack waited a little while for Zack's mystery girl until Hunter said, "Do you want to pump up for her? I know you said you prefer to be agile but a lady always loves a big strong man!" Zack chuckled. "Maybe; I think I'll pump up just a little bit." With a thought, Zack strengthened his whole body at once. He wasn't massive like Hunter and his friends, but he wasn't lean and svelte either. Zack's muscles were cleanly sculpted and obviously powerful despite their smaller size. Zack looked like the ideal model. "You look awesome!" said Hunter. "Thanks." Zack replied.

Then, there she was. A slender and beautiful lioness came out of the dressing rooms. Zack was struck by her. The moonlight reflected off her fur, making her look like a golden goddess. "Wow." said Zack simply. Hunter pushed him slightly to her direction. "Go get her, bro!" Zack nervously made his way toward her. The lioness saw Zack and was charmed instantly. She loved Zack's well defined 6-pack abs, powerful arms, and reliable legs. He wasn't too big and wasn't too small. The lioness thought he was just right. "Well, hello." said the lioness. "You must be the guy that Trixie mentioned in the changing room." Still anxious, Zack said, "Uh, yeah, th-that's me." "Well," she said, "She was wrong about one thing." Zack's heart dropped. Does she not like him? Why? He didn't want to be alone; he couldn't. "What do you mean?" Zack asked. The lioness placed her hand against Zack's cheek, making Zack blush. "You're cuter than Trixie said you were." Zack felt relieved right then. "Thanks. I'm Zack." "Cristina." "Would you like to hang out with me a bit?" Zack asked Cristina. "Sure." She responded. They both walked across the sand hugging each other's side. Cristina loved Zack's chest and rubbed it with her hand as they walked. "They're going to love each other." said Hunter making his way to Trixie.
1141112111121121111211111111111111121111.title: Zack starts feeling lonely.

1141112111121121111211111111111111121111.content:
Zack's spirits were finally uplifted after what seemed to be a very long time. He was walking along the sand with a gorgeous woman beside him who seemed to like him a lot. The old, lonely Zack was gone, gone forever. "So, Zack," began Cristina, "Are you some kind of model?" Zack blushed a little bit. "No, I just keep in shape any way I can," he said. "Well, you just keep on doing what you're doing," Cristina said while rubbing Zack's chest. "I would love to see bigger and stronger muscles from you." Zack was completely charmed by Cristina. Despite his first thoughts of keeping lean muscle to stay agile, he agreed to pump up more for her.

Music began to play and everyone was getting together to dance. "Come on," said Cristina, "Let's dance!" She grabbed Zack by the hand and dragged him towards the music. At first, Zack was nervous; he didn't know how to dance in front of a hot girl like Cristina. "Come on, don't be shy! You don't have to be good." said Cristina. Zack and Cristina got into the crowd of party dancers. Cristina started to move wildly and randomly while Zack just moved a little not really trying. "Put your hips into it!" Cristina yelled to Zack and smacked his hip. Zack jumped and danced a little more. As he danced, he began to appreciate the company of Cristina. Her smile and sense of adventure made Zack want to melt into the sand. He began to relax and dance loosely. "That's it, Zack!" said Cristina. "You got it!" Zack commented with a grin.

They danced what felt like hours. Zack and Cristina lied down on the sand cuddling each other. "That was really fun." said Zack. "Thanks." Cristina blushed slightly. "I should be thanking you!" she said. "I would never have had a good time like this without you! You just need to let loose!" After relaxing a little bit in the sand, Zack thought it was time to break the ice. "So, what do you do for a living?" Zack asked. "I'm a photographer!" Cristina answered. She then had a thought; all those muscles on Zack would look good on paper. "I brought my camera, want to have a posing session?" Zack beamed with excitement. "Yeah, sure!" Cristina ran back to her car and grabbed her camera. While she was gone, Zack flex an arm in joy, seeing it swell with power and have veins running across it. Zack was so distracted, he didn't see Cristina taking a picture of him admiring his arm. "That was really good!" Cristina said. "Show me more!" Zack then did a double arm pose, thickened his chest, and rippled his legs. Cristina got every detail Zack was offering. As she was taking photos, Cristina began to feel affectionate towards Zack.

Cristina gave Zack a hug. "You are amazing!" she told him. "Were they really that good?" Zack asked. Cristina nodded. "Just wait till I get them developed. You're going to love them!" They sat down again and settled down. "Zack," Cristina began, "Tonight was great. I would love to see you around, if you want." Zack couldn't believe what he was hearing. Somebody wanted to be with him for once. "I would love to." replied Zack. At that moment, they kissed passionately. Zack knew he was never going to be alone ever again.
1141112111121121111211111111111111121111.title: Follow Zack

choices: They find Zack. He can't control himself.
They find Zack. He's turning evil.
1141112111121121111211111111111111121111.content:
Zack was still pumped from having to meet his first girlfriend and spend time with her. It had been about an two hours since him and Cristina have spent time together, so maybe Hunter and the others were still around, he thought. Zack starts looking around for Hunter and friends, but he ended up walking through what seemed like a deserted part of the beach. It all seemed kinda off to him, but he just kept pacing on. After five minutes of walking and no spotting of life, Zack started feeling a little scared. His feelings of being alone seem to be coming back to haunt him again. "... What's...going on...?" His paces were starting to get faster and faster. It was as if he was running through an endless path that lead to nowhere, and Zack didn't know why. "What's going on?!", he screams to himself, "Where am I even going?! Where is everyone?! Lance?! Troy?! Hunterrr!!"

"Is he okay?", asked a female arctic fox. It turns out Zack had been lying on his side on the sand, shaking an shivering. It was as if Zack was going through some sort of weird funk. Accompanying the fox was a male orange and white-furred fox, who the arctic fox places a hand on, "Why don't you go check on him."

"..." The male fox crouches down on one knee, placing a hand on Zack's shoulder, "Hey buddy, wake up. You okay?"

"Get away from me...", Zack suddenly says in a deep and threatening tone."

"Huh? Hey, wake up.", the orange fox calls out.

Zack's eyes open wide, his eyes emitting a bright-red color in them. Zack got up on his knees. His left arm pumps right up as veins then slithered around it, and then he punches the male fox right out of the way. "Jimmy!!!", the white fox yelled out.

Hunter, Lance, and Troy each overheard her scream at once, "!!"

Hunter was lying on a beach towel on the shore next to Trixie. He immediately jumps up, "What was that?"

"Mm... Hm?" Trixie gets up a bit, "Is, something the matter Hunter?"

"Uh, no. Actually I just remembered something. I'll be right back, okay?" Trixie nods her head, and then lies back down. Hunter then gets up and casually walks off to not attract too much attention from her. As soon as he was far enough, he immediately zips off and runs over to where the scream came from. As he was running, Herman suddenly flies down beside Hunter with his wings. "Herman, what's going on!?"

"It's Zack! It seems he's in a bad state.", Herman replied.

"What?! What do you mean?"

"Remember what your parents said about him being a little, troubled?", Herman asks.

"Oh no...", Hunter thought to himself.

Hunter was soon joined by Lance and Troy, who were running alongside him. "Hey, what's goin' on?", Lance asks.

"It's Zack. He's in trouble.", Hunter replied.

"Sure hope the kid is okay...", Troy added.
1141112111121121111211111111111111121111.title: Find Hunter

1141112111121121111211111111111111122.content:
Hunter lied in the sand with Trixie's head on his chest, covering her entire torso with a giant bicep. His love and passion for Trixie overwhelmed Hunter's mind. He cared for her so much and would do anything to protect her. Hunter felt tightness around his abs as Trixie hugged him. "Hunter," she said, "I hope this doesn't sound too much, but, I love you." Hunter lifted her from his chest and kissed her. "I love you too." It was official. If things were to go well for him and Trixie, Trixie needed to know all that there was to know about him. It was time to tell her.

"Trixie," Hunter started, "There's something I gotta to tell you." Trixie sat up to meet his eyes. "What?" she asked. Hunter took a deep breath. "First, do you trust me?"

"Of course, I do!"
"Do you promise to take me seriously and not laugh?"
"Yeah, what is it?"

Hunter paused for a few seconds and took another deep breath. "I'm a god." he finally says. Trixie laughed and said, "I know you are. With those muscles , you look like a.." "No." Hunter interrupted. "I'm really a god. I'm a being with supernatural powers and I can literally do anything with a single thought." Trixie looked skeptical. "Really?" she said. Hunter knew exactly what to do to prove it to her.

Hunter got up to a random spot on the beach. He raised his right massive leg and stomped on the sand as hard as he could. A tiny earthquake followed and a mount of sand in the shape of a modeling Trixie emerged. Hunter then opened his hands towards the sand sculpture. Beams of flames shot out of his palms and began to burn the sand into glass. Finally, Hunter waved his arm towards to ocean. A ball of water came out of the waves and levitated directly over the heated glass. With another wave, Hunter made the water pour onto the sculpture. The natural beach breeze began to dry off the love monument Hunter proudly made for Trixie. When Hunter turned to Trixie, Trixie looked scared and had no idea as to what she saw. Hunter sighed. "Trixie, I know this is a lot to take in. I'm sorry for keeping this from you. But I'm telling you now because I love you." Trixie remained silent. "Well," Hunter continued, "What do you say?"
1141112111121121111211111111111111122.title: Hunter confesses being a god

choices: Hunter was actually still pretty big. Bigger than usual.

11411121111211211112111111111111111221.content:
Trixie just sat there for a moment with her hands on her lap, looking pretty calm. Hunter and Trixie stare right at each other for a short time, but then Hunter looks away scratching the back of his head, "Mm..."

Trixie stares down at the ground, and then looks back up at Hunter. "...Well. That certainly blew my mind."

Hunter still felt very skeptical about what Trixie said. "..." Hunter raises his arms and starts tapping his pointing fingers against each other in front of his chest and says while he glances away, "Um, in a, good way? Or a bad way?"

All of a sudden, Trixie runs up to him to wrap her arms around Hunter's large abdomen and gave him a big hug. "In a good way silly!"

Hunter was pretty surprised with her reaction. "Huh? You...you mean..."

Trixie backs up a bit to look up at Hunter, "Okay I'll admit. I still am a little shocked, but mostly surprised and amazed."

"Oh... I see...", Hunter replies skeptically still.

"Though I do have one question."

Hunter's ears perk up, "Hm? What is it?"

Trixie says as she swirls a finger over your large chest, "Your...size. Does it have anything to do with you being a god?"

"..." A small part of Hunter wanted him to lie about that, but what would be the point of that anyway? "Mm... Actually, yes. I'm normally not this big."

"I see. So then, how do you normally look?", Trixie asked.

"I... !" Hunter just remembered. He has no idea HOW he normally looks! He sped up time 20 years ahead, so this would actually be a good question for him as well. Hunter looked back down at Trixie. He felt worried at first, but looking at his love's calming expression seems to just be melting them away. Hunter grins at her, "Well, I guess I'll just have to show you." Trixie smiles back at him, and then steps back a bit to watch. Hunter closes his eyes, and then gulps his throat once before he starts turning back to normal. "Just hope I don't look too bad...", he thinks to himself.
11411121111211211112111111111111111221.title: Trixie is amazed

114111211112112111121111111111111112212.content:
As Hunter was using his powers, he felt his muscles shrinking and losing their raw power. But he didn't feel any shorter. Hunter could hear Trixie gasping as he was transforming. When he finally opened his eyes, Hunter saw little muscle on his body. He flexed an arm but it barley moved. Hunter looked up to Trixie. "Well," Hunter said, "What do you think?" Trixie kissed him on the cheek. "I think you look so cute!" she said. "Not as cute when you're big but still very cute!" Trixie hugged Hunter as tightly as she could. She almost wrapped her arms around his chest but failed because he was still fairly big. "You think so?" Hunter asked her. "I don't look as big and strong." Trixie then let go of him and looked at him the eyes. "Hunter, I don't care if you're big or small. I love you, just the way you are." Hunter's love for Trixie then overwhelmingly grew. He never met someone who liked him for himself. It was always him and his father, who was mean to him at the time. Hunter shed a couple tears. Trixie saw his crying and asked, "Are you okay?" Hunter smiled at her. "Yes." he answered. "I am. Thank you. Thank you for being there for me." Trixie and Hunter kissed again with more passion than before.

Hunter and Trixie then ran into the ocean to play in the waves. They splashed each other and swam as fast as they could towards the horizon. Then Hunter came up with a fun idea. He swam close to Trixie and focused his powers on the water. The water began to push underneath them. It pushed them so hard Hunter and Trixie felt like they were going to jump out. The next thing they knew, they were floating on a pillar of water above the ocean. Trixie was scared at first but she relaxed after seeing the view of the beach and Hunter. She began to love her god-like boyfriend even more. Hunter impressed her more by picking her up and walking on the water towards the shore.

"That was amazing!" said Trixie when she and Hunter made it back to shore. Hunter just blushed. "So I guess you're cool with all this?" "I more than cool! I love it!" Trixie kissed Hunter again. "Just out of curiosity," said Hunter, "I know you said you like big or small but what would you prefer?" "BIG!" said Trixie instantly. Hunter chuckled. "You better stand back then." he told her. Hunter tensed his muscles and began to focus. The sense of heat and power flowed in his muscles and Hunter loved that feeling. Hunter could feel his skin and fur stretching as his muscle grew back. Trixie was mesmerized by Hunter's growing muscles. It was as if she was seeing power being poured on Hunter. In an instant, Hunter was the giant he and Trixie loved. Hunter flexed a bicep to Trixie. "Better?" he asked her. "Much." Trixie replied.
114111211112112111121111111111111112212.title: Hunter was actually pretty big, but still fairl...

1141112111121121111211111111111111122121.content:
Later on, Hunter and Trixie were making your way back to their hotel. You opened the door, but then Trixie suddenly leans her head in on his large forearm, "Hm? Is something the matter Trixie?"

Trixie yawns, and then says as she starts rubbing her eye, "Oh no. I'm just a little tired."

Hunter blinks his eyes, and then grins, "Heh." Hunter leans in and picks Trixie up with ease so that she cradled on his massive arms. "I'll carry you to bed." Trixie just smiled back at Hunter, and then gave him a hug to show her thanks. Upon entering inside, the room was quiet and almost completely dark. But it surely wasn't anything Hunter couldn't navigate through. Hunter navigates his way to their room, using his tail to open the door. He walks inside and lays Trixie on their bed, tucking her in afterwards. Hunter then lies down next to her, lying on their bed with his arms folded behind his head and one leg crossed on top of the other. He reminisces about the time they had together for a moment, but then suddenly he feels Trixie's hand lying on his hard and fluffy abs. Hunter looked down to see Trixie's hand on his abdomen, "? Heh."

Hunter places a hand on top of Trixie's, and then flexing and tensing his abs in return. He then feels Trixie's hand shift up on to his powerful chest while his hand followed. Hunter then flexes and thickens his pecs a bit while Trixie's hand feels nearly every inch of them. Hunter overheard Trixie giggle a bit in return, which made him grin back at her. Hunter then moved Trixie's hand down his left shoulder and over his enormous left bicep. He slowly flex his 25-inch hill and let her feel his bicep ripple and raise through the whole thing. Hunter did this a few more times, then he realizes he was doing most of the moving of Trixie's hand. Hunter waited patiently for a moment to hear and/or get a response from Trixie, but that's when he realizes she had just fallen asleep. "Heh." Hunter kisses Trixie on her forehead. "Good night."

Hunter sets Trixie's hand down, and then stares back at the ceiling. He slowly shuts his eyes all the way, but then suddenly...'BANG!' "Woohoo!"

Hunter's eyelids jolted back up. He then sits up on their bed and sighs. "Well, sounds like Lance is finally back." Hunter turns to look at Trixie, who was still fast asleep. Hunter sighs once again. "At least he didn't wake Trixie up."

Hunter gets up and out of bed. Out in the living room, Lance was out in his usual gym shorts and shoes proudly making random flexing poses with his sweaty body. "Hah! That, felt, great!"

"I see you're home." Lance looked over at Hunter, who was standing in the hallway with his arms crossed.

"Hunter! You're back!", Lance yells out. "Hey, care to join me for a quick flex off?"

"Not right now.", Hunter replied. He then walks up to Lance, keeping his distance, "Hey, remember what I said about yelling?"

Lance does a double-bicep flex while looking at Hunter, "Oh. Sorry man. NGH! Guess I just got a little carried away."

"So what have you been up to?", Hunter asks.

Lance then watches as he raises his left arm to flex his bicep a few times, "Just some training with Troy. You may not notice, but that guy's a REAL competitor. Oh! And I heard you told Trixie about you being a God."

"This doesn't surprise me.", Hunter replied.

"All I have to say is...
1141112111121121111211111111111111122121.title: Head home

1141112111121121111211111111111111122121.content:
"Are you sure about this?" Lance stepped away from the mirror and walked towards Hunter. "What if she tells someone?" Hunter began to question that himself. Did he tell her because he got carried away? He then thought back to their magical night. Love and trust replaced his worries. "I don't think she will tell." Hunter told Lance. "I trust her. I wouldn't have told her if I didn't. Besides, I can just use my powers to erase her memories." Lance relaxed a bit after hearing the memory erasing idea. "That's true." "If it makes you feel better, I didn't tell her about you and Troy," Hunter commented. "Good. Let's keep it that way, for now," said Lance. "One more thing." Hunter looked at his friend puzzled. "Do I always look this good or is it just me?" Lance asked jokingly. Hunter sighed. "You and Troy look fine. I'm going to bed." Lance still flexed every muscle he could find in the mirror as Hunter entered his room to sleep.

The next morning, Hunter found Lance and Troy talking on the couch. "Hunter!" exclaimed Lance. "Come here, we got a plan!" "What is it?" asked Hunter. Troy gave him the details. "Get this: yesterday Lance and I work out at the gym and compete who's the strongest. We're having a good time until this jerk hyena shows up and calls us amateurs! AMATEURS! He called a couple of gods AMATEURS! We really wanted to teach this guy a lesson but we'd raise suspicion with our powers. We challenged him to a strength contest and we want you to help us!"

Hunter wasn't sure about this. He never used his powers like that before and didn't want to. "I don't know guys," said Hunter. "I don't want to hurt this guy, even if he is a jerk." "Don't worry man," said Lance. "We're just going to tease him, not grow 50 feet tall and squish him...even though we could." Hunter was still unconvinced. He knew he, Lance, and Troy could take him no problem, but Hunter just didn't know if he should. It would be interesting to see how he could use his powers. "I still don't know." Hunter said. "Can I get back to you on that?" Lance slapped Hunter's back. "Absolutely!" he said. "But make it fast. We're meeting him today." Troy got up towards the door and Lance followed him. "We're heading to the gym to warm up." Troy told Hunter. "Meet us there if you want to." Then they left.

Hunter lied down on the couch debating whether to join his friends or not until Trixie came into the room. Hunter's mood lightened immediately. "Hey, gorgeous." said Hunter. "Morning, handsome." Trixie replied. "Did the almighty god sleep well last night?" Hunter chuckled. "You know I did." He then flexed a bicep that made her cheeks glow. "You have any plans for today?" Hunter asked Trixie. "Well, I was thinking about exploring the town more," she said. "Would you like to come with me and show me what else you can do besides from last night?" Trixie placed a smile on her face and her hand on Hunter's bumpy chest which made his cheeks glow. "Umm.." Hunter stuttered, "I don't know. Lance and Troy invited me to do something with them but I'm not sure if I want to." Trixie kept her smile. "Do what you want. You don't have to go with me if you don't want to. I know even a strong god like you needs some guy time. If you want to join me, great. If not, that's fine. I won't get mad." Hunter blushed more because he was so thankful for having a very understanding girlfriend. But what should he do?
1141112111121121111211111111111111122121.title: ...you sure about this?"

1141112111121121111211111111111111122121.content:
"Well, I guess I kinda wanna join the guys.", Hunter said scratching the fur on the back of his head.

Suddenly, Trixie runs up to Hunter to give him a big hug, which makes his cheeks red a bit. "It's okay then. Hope you guys have a good time."

Hunter smiles at Trixie, and then wraps his massive arms around her to hug her back. "Thanks. We will." Later, Hunter was making his way towards the gym where Lance and Troy normally go to. Hunter was also wearing a blue T-shirt and black gym shorts on the way there, which he had fit snug over his muscular body. He was about to enter inside, until he noticed what looked like a disturbance through the window. Inside, Lance and Troy appeared to be getting yelled at by said hyena, who really got his attention. The guy was really buff! Actually, just a tad buffer than them both and you, "Who is this guy?!", you thought to yourself.

It looked like Lance and Troy were keeping their cool, letting the guy mouth off to them both. Hunter slowly opened the door, but Lance's and Troy's super sensitive hearing overheard you come it. Lance yells out while holding out an arm and interrupting the hyena, "Hunter! Ya made it!"

Hunter slowly walks up to the three. "Hey--", the hyena turns his attention towards him, glaring at him with what felt like blazing eyes, "--Uhhh...", Hunter just sidesteps up beside Lance. "So, this the guy?", Hunter whispers to Lance.

"Uh, I think he heard you.", Lance replied.

"Yeah, I can hear you.", the hyena added gruntingly. "So, this the other amateur you guys mentioned as being part of your posse?"

"Amateur?", Hunter said in his head.

Troy shows his hand to Hunter, "This is Hunter. Hunter, this is Rhet"

Rhet says as he folds his large arms over his chiseled chest, "Didn't really want to give him my name."

"Well he certainly would've learned it sooner or later.", Troy replied with a modest tone.

"So, what exactly are we gonna do?", Hunter asks.

Lance raises his right arm to flex the hardened peak that was his bicep, "We're gonna teach this guy some manners! That's what we're gonna do!"

"I know that.", Hunter replied, "I meant what is it exactly we're going to be doing?"

Rhet walks up to the different euipment and then points out,
1141112111121121111211111111111111122121.title: Which One is the Big Guy Now?

choices: Show off with Lance and Troy
1141112111121121111211111111111111122121.content:
Rhet started pumping the bar. His arms and chest thickened and relaxed between each rep. Hunter was impressed how big the hyena was. Rhet looked more like a god than actual gods. "I have an idea!" said Lance. "This guy thinks he's all that with his muscles. I bet he'd think differently with them gone." "What are you getting at?" asked Hunter. Lance grinned. "I say we take away his muscles and split his strength between us!"

"That's sounds cool!" said Troy. "I'm in!" Hunter wasn't sure. He liked the idea of getting bigger but making someone smaller? Hunter didn't know if Rhet deserved that. "I don't know, guys." said Hunter. "Don't you think that's a little harsh?"

"In a way, I guess." said Lance. "But Hunter, this guy's a JERK! And not just to me and Troy." "What do you mean?" asked Hunter. "We read his mind." explained Troy. "Rhet just got big because he wanted to push people around! He finds punching the blood out of people more fun than showing off his muscles."

With this in mind, Hunter thought more. Maybe it would be safer for everyone if Rhet did lose his muscles, if he was really that bad. And Trixie always loved seeing bigger muscles on Hunter. "Okay, but let's not make a big deal out of this." Lance clapped his hands in joy. "Alright! Let's do this!"

Rhet was still at the bench doing his hundreth rep. Hunter, Lance, and Troy hid in a corner from the locker rooms. Lance began by thinking of a scrawnier Rhet. Hunter looked at Rhet very closely. He could see the hyena's muscles growing smaller! It wasn't much but he saw it! "Oh, that feels good!" said Lance as his chest began to fill his tank top till it looked like it couldn't hold him. His gray arms and legs looked more defined too! Hunter was amazed what was going on.

Rhet could feel getting tired. It was weird. This was usually an easy lift for him and he could do two hundred reps no problem. "Must be more tired than usual." Rhet thought. "I'll go to the locker room and get my protein shake. That always makes me feel better!" Rhet did so. He put the weights down and trodded to the locker room. The godly trio followed him.

Hunter, Lance, and Troy hid behind the next row of lockers from Rhet. Luckily, the place was deserted. Troy was next. The dragon took off his shirt to be safe from the growth. He showed a ten pack with bowling ball pecs. Troy then did what Lance did before: imagined Rhet's strength away and claiming it his own. Rhet felt dizzy. "Wh..What's going on with me?" Rhet felt weaker and weaker while Troy felt stronger and stronger. Rhet noticed his gym clothes being loose. How's that possible? They were skin tight when he came in! Troy's muscles became more defined and gave Troy some height. His head peaked over a weakening hyena. Troy grinned and looked down at Lance and Hunter. "This is awesome! Hunter, you're next. Finish it off!"

Hunter did as he was encouraged. He took a deep breath while Rhet's muscles continued to shrink. Hunter felt warmth in his muscles and they pushed against his fur to grow. He too grew some height, a little more than Troy and swelled his already rippling body. His arms literally shredded in front of his eyes and looked like they could bend a car. His chest widened to a slight shirt tear between his pecs and his legs pumped to great power and speed.

"What's happening to me?!" Hunter turned his already peering head to see a scrawny hyeana. It was hard to believe that it was actually Rhet. To avoid suspicion, Hunter altered Rhet's memories so it appeared Rhet was always small. "What am I doing here?" asked Rhet to himself. In confusion, Rhet left.

Lance and Troy were amazed by how they and Rhet looked. "You know what you remind me of, Hunter?" asked Lance. "A god!"
1141112111121121111211111111111111122121.title: The muscle absorption

1141112111121121111211111111111111122121.content:
After their encounter with Rhet, they decided to show-off a bit in front of the mirror. It's not like they wouldn't mind doing this before, but seeing how big they had gotten after sapping the muscle from him, they might as well. Troy was the first up, flexing his arms down and against his chest. He then holds his hands behind his back and sticks his left leg out and stretches his thigh and calf muscles and doing a pose that showed his deltoids the most. Lance steps up in front of Troy, raising his arms up high to perform a high and wide double-bicep flex. His pecs stretched out impressively as well. Troy sticks his head out from behind Lance, "Hey, do you mind?"

"Sorry, couldn't let you hog the mirror all to yourself.", Lance said while turning around and raising his left arm up and sticking his right arm down, flexing his enormous back proudly.

"Really? Even though this isn't a full-length mirror?", Troy asks, standing in front of a mirro wall.

"Yep!"

As for Hunter, he took a moment to look around his entire body to see and feel just how big he had gotten. He stuck his right arm down like Lance did, feeling around his shredded forearm and pumped bicep with his left hand. He then starts feeling his immense chest, which actually stuck out past his chin a bit. Just before Hunter continued, he had just received an idea into his head. "Hey guys?" Turns out the two had been fussing around, looking at Hunter in a weird pose. "Uh... I guess I'm gonna go head back to the hotel."

"You sure?", Troy asks.

"Come on man! You barely spent any time with us!", Lance exclaimed.

Hunter grabs his gym bag, and then raises his left arm up to flex his grown bicep, "Don't worry. I'll have more time for you guys later on.", he said with a big grin.

Lance crosses his large arms, "Alright. Return to your little girly friend.", he pouted. Troy slaps Lance on the back of his head. "Ow! I'm just say--", Lance starts rubbing the back of his head, "--Owww! That really hurt this time ya know!"

Hunter chuckles at them both, and then heads off and out of the gym. Back at the hotel, Trixie was sitting at the table while watching some daytime television. She also had a cup of strawberry yogurt set in front of her, taking a spoonful and eating it up. "Mmm! I swear, this hotel should recieve 10 stars instead of 5!" She suddenly hears a knock at the door, and the door swinging open. "Oh! Hi Hun-...-ter?"

Hunter sets his gym bag down on the floor. The first thing Trixie noticed was his size, which she started looking up Hunter's body just to see how much bigger he had gotten. In Trixie's eyes, Hunter was actually more pumped up in muscle than height. "Hey, Trixie.", Hunter says in a manly tone.

"Uh...it's Trixie." She covers her mouth, "Oh! I, thought you called me 'honey'."

Hunter walks up to Trixie, kneeling down on one thick leg so he was head-to-head with her. Speaking in a manly tone still, "Oh? And what if I did?"

Trixie turns away, blushing, "I'd, I'd pop you on the cheek. Because I don't really like being called anything else than my first name." She overhears Hunter chuckle. "So, what's with the sudden muscle growth?"

Hunter holds his hands together in front of his abs, tensing his pecs enough so Trixie heard the shirt thread start to stretch, "Just had to teach someone a lesson."

Trixie folds her arms in front of her chest, still blushing but trying to keep her composure, "Really? You didn't beat him up or anything did you?"

Hunter brings his head in closer to Trixie's, wrapping his rippling arms around Trixie's well-toned back and giving her a lick on her snout, "Come on. You know I'm not that kind of guy deep down."

The lick Hunter had given her actually made her body tremble a bit. She smiles at him, and then wraps her arms around Hunter's magnificent trap and neck muscles to give him a kiss, "I know."
1141112111121121111211111111111111122121.title: Manlier Tiger

1141112111121121111211111111111111122121.content:
Hunter felt amazing! He felt bigger and stronger than ever before. He truly felt like a god! Hunter, Lance, and Troy make their way to full mirror in the locker room. Lance grinned with his new flexing muscles. The trio wasted no time admiring themselves. They thickened each improved muscle peaking them to perfection.

Lance flexed his arms downward tensing his already defined arms while Troy thickened the muscles in his wings. Troy figured he could fly even faster now. Hunter noticed his pecs expanded past his chin slightly. He tensed his torso slightly and heard a slight tear in his shirt. As much as he would love to shred it, Hunter wanted to keep it on, for now.

"This is awesome!" exclaimed Lance. "I never felt so powerful!" "I know what you mean!" said Troy. "I bet I can crush bottles with my wings! What do you think Hunter?" "I'm still at a loss of words!" answered Hunter. I feel awesome!"

"Yeah!" yelled Lance. "We GOTTA do something with these guns!" Hunter couldn't agree more. Then, he came up with an idea. "I know just what to do!" said Hunter. With a snap of his fingers, Hunter transported himself, Lance, and Troy to a rocky mountain terrain.

Troy and Lance looked around the giant boulders and rocks around. Lance cracked his knuckles and neck. "This'll do just fine." Lance waddled to the nearest boulder. He squatted, tensing his massive legs and back, and slid his fingers underneath it. Lance put little pushing pressure on the boulder and he threw it over his head instantly. Troy and Hunter clapped happily for Lance, especially when he flexed a bicep while holding the boulder with one hand. Lance dropped it with an earth quaking thud.

"That was so cool!" said Lance. "Your turn, Troy!" Troy looked around. What would beat Lance's feat? Troy grinned. He walked over to the boulder Lance lifted. He then spread his wings and flew to the air. Hunter and Lance wasn't sure what Troy was doing until Troy floated over the boulder and began lifting it. Troy heaved the boulder up and threw it up in the air. As the boulder was coming down, Troy curled his fingers together and thickened the muscles in his arm and claw. Veins squirmed through trying to push power through Troy hard muscles. Troy swung his fist at the oncoming boulder and it shattered!

Hunter and Lance were very impressed. Troy landed leaving clawed feet indentations in stone. "Not bad!" said Hunter. "That was amazing!" Lance told Troy. "I know, I know." commented Troy unmodestly. "Your turn, Hunter!"

Hunter walked up to the boulder not knowing what to do. What can top Troy's feat? He perked his ears with an idea. Hunter grabbed hold of the boulder and raised it above his head no problem.Then, he began to squeeze it. The boulder was hard but Hunter's muscles were harder. Pressure thickened Hunter's tendons and muscles strips in his arms. Hunter then heard a crack from the boulder. That encouraged him to push harder until the boulder scattered into large pieces. Lance and Troy clapped thinking Hunter was done. Hunter wasn't finished yet. He crushed every piece with flexes! Hunter place a piece of rock on his arm and crushed it with a simple bicep flex. Another placed between Hunter legs and crushed by their power. Lance and Troy cheered for joy! "Now THAT was awesome!" said Hunter flexing his chest ripping the shirt he wanted to keep.
1141112111121121111211111111111111122121.title: Show off with Lance and Troy

choices: Do something with the fallen trees.
1141112111121121111211111111111111122121.content:
Hunter looks down towards the ground as remnants of his shirt floated to the ground. "Huh."

Lance and Troy walk up to him, Lance giving Hunter a slap on his back, "Hey, don't worry man! It's not like that was the first time you've ever done that."

"It's not that. I just caught me off guard.", Hunter says while raising his arms inward towards his chest to flex them. "So what should we do now?"

Troy puts a hand under his chin, "Hmm... I got it!" With a snap of his finger, the three of them appeared in a vast forest land populated by dozens of of of large and tall trees. "Here we go."

"Ma-han! Lookit all the trees!" Lance tenses up his right arm, "I like where this is going."

Troy takes a first crack at it, walking up to one of the many large trees. "Alright. Rules are simple. See how we can take down these bad boys." Troy grabs a hold of the tree with both his massive arms. He grunts, tensing and flexing out the muscles that stuck out the most on his arms. With a little effort, Troy was already using enough strength to get the tree to shake. Troy then shows a little more teeth, flexing the shredded muscles on his chest and back. The tree was starting to get pulled off from its roots, as Troy then exerted even more strength muscle to start pulling it out. "Hnnng...!"

Hunter and Lance stood back, Lance staring with arms crossed. See the amount of muscle being used in this feat was really an impressive sight for them. After another thrust of with his immense arms, he finally rips the tree out from it roots, holding up the ripped-out out tree for Lance and Hunter to see, who applauded in the background. Troy smiles back at the two, and then tosses the tree, which landed behind him. Troy then strikes a pose for the two, which was a simple but impressive double-bicep flex, "Hah! Whatcha guys think?"

"That was great!", Hunter commented.

"That was, pretty good.", Lance added. "But I think I can do better."

"Ah shut up and just do it already.", Troy replies blantly.

"Alright.", Lance says walking up to another tree. He places his hands firmly on the tree, and then flexes his arms as he starting pusing against the tree. The immense power being exerted really grabbed Hunter and Troy's attention. Lance's forearms started to swell up, his biceps and triceps started pushing out even more, and his shoulders became broader. "Come on...!" Lance's chest and back were starting to become affected, as his pecs only pushed outward some more and his abs started to harden out underneath. His back and lats started to stretch out some, becoming more shriveled and rippled with strength. Lastly were his legs, his quads just crowded out firmly above while his diamondhead calves flexed out below. Lance grins in anticipation, "Heh!"

Troy puts on a frowny face, "Show-off."

Hunter chuckles at Troy, "Heh."

In a matter of seconds, the tree starts to tear from its roots and fall forward towards the ground, "TIMBER!!", Lance cries out. The tree topples to the grassy field with a loud thud. Lance then turns around toward the two of them, wiping the sweat from his forehead. He looks up to Hunter, "Alright Hunter. It's finally your turn."

Hunter tenses the muscles all over his body in anticipation, "Alrighty!" Hunter walks right up to another tree, pressing a hand against it to feel it's texture. "This should do." All of a sudden, Hunter sits himself on the ground in front of the tree, Troy and Lance staring at him with confused looks on their faces. Hunter then raises his legs and plants his feet firmly onto the tree. "Just gonna turn it up a notch."

Hunter wastes no time in getting himself ready for the tree. He immediately flexes his calves and thighs as he pushes hard against the tree. Hunter's continental legs started showing their stuff as his quads and hamstrings really started to take the tree down. His thighs were swelling out so much his shorts didn't seem to last much longer over them, stretching out to their limit as well. With one hard push, Hunter uses his chest and abs to aid him in this feat, flexing and hardening out said muscles with great definition it causes the tree to start ripping apart from its roots. Hunter's pal's eyes stared widely at his legs that really showed their stuff, until the tree was pushed out of its roots enough to fall to the ground. Hunter quickly leaps back up on his feet. "TIMBER!!" The tree falls to the ground, causing the forest around it to shake. Hunter turns to the two of them, "How was that?"

"Dude...that was amazing!!", Lance exclaimed.

"Yeah, no question.", Troy added. "You really put a lot on those shorts of yours."

Hunter looks down, seeing that more of his immense thighs were exposed over his ripped shorts. Hunter blushes a bit, "Eh heh..."
1141112111121121111211111111111111122121.title: Takin' Down Some Trees.

1141112111121121111211111111111111122121.content:
"Alright!" said Hunter clapping his hands, "Let's make a cabin!" Hunter grabbed a root from a fallen tree and pulled outward. As Hunter pulled, the root tore up the tree to make a long pole of wood. "Let's make smaller pieces of wood for the cabin." Lance and Troy nodded in agreement.

Lance and Troy did what Hunter was doing. With their powers and muscles, Hunter, Lance, and Troy made a pile of wood worthy for a cabin.

The godly trio looked at the pile with pride. Lance interuppted the prideful silence. "So, what do we do now?" "We built a cabin!" Hunter exclaimed enthusiastically. "But how?" asked Lance. "I don't know the first thing about building cabins." "Me neither." commented Troy. Hunter chuckled and smiled. "I guess we'll just do this the easy way!" Hunter snapped his fingers that sparked a flash of light on the pile of wood. In an instant, a finely built cabin stood.

Evenly cut out logs made perfectly even walls. There was even a second floor with windows! Lance sighed in relief. "Oh, I love being a god!" They all chuckled and went back to the feline.
"Sir," said Hunter, "We're done with your cabin." The feline turned with a skeptic face. "Seriously?" he asked them. "I know you guys are big and strong and all but even...WHAT THE???"

The feline was amazed with the beautiful cabin. He felt like he could live there forever. "It's amazing!" he implied. "How the heck did you do it?" "With some luck and muscle!" said Troy flexing his arm and wings, literally showing all the power he stored in his powerhouse body. "Thank you so much!" said the feline. "How can I ever thank you?"

"Dad! Is everything ok?" They all turned to see a gorgeous yellow feline girl walking towards them. "Hey honey!" said the male feline. "You won't believe it, these guys finished our cabin!" The female feline looked at the cabin in amazement. It looked so luxurious and so did the guys who made it. "Gentlemen," said the male feline, "This is my daughter, Mary."

Lance and Troy's hearts beated faster than ever before at the sight of Mary. She was so lean and sexy with her lumberjack outfit she wore to help her dad with the cabin. Hunter also found her attractive but tried to remember Trixie. "Thanks for helping my dad." said Mary. "Yeah, n..no problem." stuttered Lance. "I..it was our pleasure." said Troy. Not knowing what else to do, the flexed their arms hoping to charm Mary. Mary laughed a little. "No need to be shy." Mary said knowing what they were thinking. "I like big guys!" She then walk to the cabin to see the insides.

Lance walked to Mary's father and said, "If you want to owe us, you can start by giving us Mary's phone number!"
1141112111121121111211111111111111122121.title: Falling trees and falling love

choices: Lance goes out on a date with Mary.
Lance goes on a date, but with a lot of show-offing.
1141112111121121111211111111111111122121.content:
"Hang on, you both want her number.", asks the feline skeptically.

Lance and Troy turn their heads to look at each other, "Uhhh..."

"Look, I like ya both, but I don't want her havin' two big boyfriends.", the feline added.

"No way! I was the one who wanted her number first!", Lance yells out.

"In your dreams!", Troy added.

Hunter walks up to them, "Hey, calm down you two. Why don't we just let Mary decide?"

Mary finishes up looking at the interior of the house. She walks outside and immediately gets called by her father. "Mary!"

Mary runs up to the four of them, "Uh, yeah dad?"

Mary's dad holds out a hand beside Lance and Troy, "It seems these two gentlemen, Lance and Troy, would like your number but, I'm afraid you're gonna have to choose which one you want to give it to."

"Huh?" Mary looks at Lance, who smiles back at her while he lowers his arms down and tenses up all the shredded tendons in his arms, and even his chest. She then looks at Troy, who smiles while raising up both his rippling arms in a magnificent double-bicep pose. She looks back at Lance, and then back at Troy again, and then she places her hands on her cheeks, "Oh dear... I love them both, but, I'm afraid I just can't choose."

"Hmm...", her father thinks to himself. "This does seem a bit rushed. Perhaps she would have to spend some time with both of you in order to get to know each other better. Maybe then she'll be able to choose."

"That sounds like a great idea.", Hunter replies.

"I suppose I can meet Lance first." She turns to Troy, "If that's okay Troy."

"Oh, yeah! No problem.", Troy replies with a bright look on his face.

"So, Lance, I'm available tomorrow if you are.", Mary explains.

Lance winks at her while smiling, "I'll see ya then."

Troy whispers to Lance, "Just, promise you'll be easy on her."

Lance glares at Troy, and says in a low-grumbling voice and with his teeth clenched, "What's that supposed ta mean!?"

Mary and her dad were already off to their old home, while Hunter stares at Lance and Troy, who appeared to be banging heads against each other. Literally... Hunter sighs, "Oh boy."
1141112111121121111211111111111111122121.title: Big Rhino, or Big Dragon?

1141112111121121111211111111111111122121.content:
The next night, Lance walked proudly into a local carnival in town with Mary hugging his beefy arm. This was going to be a great night. Lance going to make sure of it. "Thank you so much for taking to the carnival, Lance." said Mary hugging the tough rhino's arm tighter. "No problem!" replied Lance while tensing the bicep under Mary's twiggy arms.

Mary couldn't keep her eyes of Lance and his muscles. How could some like him be so nice and so big? She had to ask him. "So, Lance, how strong are you?" Before he answered he noticed the classic carnival strength game where you hit a button with a hammer and ring the bell. Lance grinned and said to Mary, "I'll show you!"

They walked up to the stand and were greeted by a little crocodile running it. "My," said the crocodile, "You sure are a big one! You think you can ring the bell? Then pick up that hammer and slam it down as hard as you can!" The hammer looked giant and heavy to lift for the average person. Lance was no ordinary person. He cracked his knuckles and stepped forward. Lance grabbed the hammer with one hand and heaved it over his shoulder. Mary and the worker were amazed by this feat. Nobody ever lifted the hammer over their head. The level of astonishment doubled as Lance slung the hammer down and rang the bell loudly.

"Wow!" said Mary. "That was amazing!" "Indeed it was!" said the crocodile. "Very well done, sir! Now pick your prize on left side here!" Lance turned to see a wide variety of prizes from squirt guns to giant stuffed animals. Lance picked out the giant panda. "Here ya go!" said Lance offering the panda to Mary. "Oh, Lance, this is so sweet! Thank you!" Mary then hugged around his bumpy chest.

As the night went by, Lance and Mary had a great night of rides and games. They laughed until they approached what appeared to be a wrestling ring. Inside the ring was a HUGE bear. The bear's muscles made Lance's looked like pebbles in a stream. This wrestler did not look normal.The bear huffed and puffed while pounding his chest. He then flexed his arms and chest, making his whole body look like a mountain range. "Is there anyone worthy of my time?" said the bear. "Is there anyone challenging?" Lance had to take this opportunity. "I'll fight you!"

The bear saw the big rhino peaking over the crowd surrounding the ring. "You?" said the bear. "You look like you couldn't stand a minute in here!" This guy was starting to annoy Lance. Lance started walking towards the ring until Mary grabbed his hand. "Lance, you don't have to fight him." said Mary. "I know." said Lance, "But I can't let this guy think I'm a wimp." Mary understood what Lance needed to do. "Just be careful." she said and released Lance hand.

Lance jumped into the ring and looked up to bear straight in the eye. "I'll try not to send to the hospital." said the bear. "Me neither." replied Lance. Both competitors walked to opposite corners of the ring to begin the match. The fight bell rung. Without hesitation, the bear ran to Lance and tried to body slam the rhino to the ground. When the bear jumped under Lance, there was no impact or screams of pain. He just felt what appeared to be hands holding him midair. The bear, Mary, and crowd cheered wildly for Lance, especially when Lance flexed a rippled bicep while holding the bear with one hand.

The bear had no idea what was happening. Nobody ever did this to him before. They couldn't. However, Lance did. Lance put both hands back on the massive bear above him and slammed him to the ground. The bear was unconscious instantly. Mary cheered for another amazing feat performed by the amazing rhino. Lance turned back to her in the ring and flexed his arms downward towards, signifying all that was for her.
1141112111121121111211111111111111122121.title: Muscle Carnival

choices: Troy starts cooking, and shows-off a bit of course.
1141112111121121111211111111111111122121.content:
Later that night, Mary and Lance were standing at the entrance of the carnival, holding each other's hands. "I had a great time tonight!", Mary says.

"I had a great time too.", Lance added. "Well, I guess you'll be heading home?"

"He-yeah. I promised Troy I'll meet him tomorrow." Mary hugs her prize, "Oh and, thanks for winning me the stuffed animal."

"No problem.", Lance replies. "Just try not to let the big dragon scare ya."

Mary chuckles. "I'll try not to." Mary walks off home. Lance stares at her walking off for a short time, and then walks home the opposite direction.

-THE NEXT NIGHT-

Troy awaited for Mary on a park bench. He checked his watch for the time, but then hears footsteps coming his way. It was Mary. "Mary!"

"Hi Troy!", Mary calls out.

"Glad ya made it." Mary grabs Troy's hands, "Uh..."

"So, where we going?", Mary asks with anticipation.

"I was thinking we got out to get something to eat.", Troy replies.

"Okay. Where to?"

Troy raises up Mary's hands, "My place."

"Oh. You can cook?", Mary asks.

"Yep. My place is just down the street." After walking and talking for a couple minutes, they both made it to Troy's place, which was a two-story home. And it wasn't one he thought up either. Troy walks right up to his door, unlocks it, and then opens it for Mary. "Right this way. Sorry if the place is a tad messy."

Once inside, Mary took a moment to take a closer look at the place. It was actually mostly clean, and spacey. There was a couch, a flat-screen, a dining table, what you would normally expect in a middle-class home. Only with some pricey furniture. "Wow... Your decor looks nice."

"Care to take a seat?", Troy asks patting the sofa.

"Uh, sure. Thank you." Mary goes ahead and settles in.

"You stay right there, while I get ready to cook dinner." Troy heads upstairs to his room.

A couple minutes later, Mary waited patiently until Troy was heard coming downstairs. Mary turns her head towards Troy, and then her cheeks blush up a bit. "Oh my..."

Troy was wearing black shoes and black pants that would normally be worn by chefs, but nothing over the top. He was indeed shirtless, his scaley upperbody muscles practically glowing from the chandelier above. "Oh. Yeah, I normally cook better without a shirt. I don't wanna end up getting sweat all over it while cooking."

"Uh, no.", Mary says. "It's quite alright."

Troy smiles back at her, and then holds out a hand to raise her up from her seat, which she does. Troy then walks her over to the dining table, so she'd get a good view of Troy while he was cooking. Troy walks into the kitchen and then grabs an apron that he wore around the front and tied it on his muscley back. "I was thinking of cooking some fish and steak. That alright?"

Mary wasn't completely able to not stare at Troy's outstanding muscles from around the apron, but then she shook her head, "Mm! Yeah! That's fine."

Troy stares at Mary, and then smiles. "Heh. Don't worry. Feel free to enjoy the view while the man cooks."

Mary blushes, and then chuckles.
1141112111121121111211111111111111122121.title: At-home Meal

1141112111121121111211111111111111122121.content:
As Mary sat next to the table, she could hear meat sizzling on the stove. She peeked into the kitchen to see a shirtless Troy flipping steak and fish. The heat was getting to him as sweat speckled his torso. Thanks to his scales, Troy's muscles seemed like they were sparkling. Mary's cheeks turned a deep red from the sight and heat in the room.

Troy returned with two steaming plates in both hands. The food looked delicious to Mary. As she took a bite from her steak, her eyes beamed. "This is really good!" she said to him. "Seriously, this is like the best steak I've ever tasted." Troy rubbed the back of his head blushing, shifting his bulging shoulder and arm muscles. "Wow," said Troy, "Thanks."

Troy and Mary had a great dinner. They talked about each other's lives (without Troy mentioning his being a god), music, movies, etc. Before they knew it, their plates were empty. "Well," said Mary, "What next?" Troy smirked to himself. "How about this?" Troy raised his arms stretching and thickening them and his chest. The lighting in the room made his scaley flesh shine. Veins also pushed against Troy's scales, twitching to squeeze all Troy's power into them. Mary gasped at the sight. A strong dragon that cooks; what's better than that. For the final touch, Troy expanded his wings and swelled the muscles in them and his back.

"That's...really amazing, Troy." said Mary. "Glad you liked the show." replied Troy. Troy then came up with another idea that would win the feline's heart. "Actually, I have another show for you." "Really?" said Mary excitedly. "What is it?" "Meet me on the balcony upstairs and I'll show you."
