Troy disappeared into the kitchen and Mary walked upstairs to the balcony. Mary loved the night outside as she waited for Troy. What was he planning? Troy came back still shirtless. "So, what's your show?" asked Mary. Without saying a word, Troy picked up Mary and cradled her in his bumpy chest. "This!" Troy squatted down and spread his wings. He leaped into the air but didn't come back down. Troy's spread out wings drifted him and Mary into the winds.

Mary was scared at first. She was never a fan of hights. But being with Troy gave her some sense of security that she couldn't explain. Troy flew over downtown to enjoy the lights of the city below them. Mary was amazed by the sight. The whole district looked a giant Christmas tree and the people didn't realize. "This is awesome!" exclaimed Mary. Troy winked at her. "Yeah, this city is beautiful but not as beautiful as you."
1141112111121121111211111111111111122121.title: Troy starts cooking, and shows-off a bit of cou...

choices: The next day. (Troy's or Hunter's point-of-view)
1141112111121121111211111111111111122121.content:
The next morning, Lance and Troy stood back at Mary's place, awaiting for Mary's arrival. Lance and Troy were actually staring each othe down. Not angrily or anything, just staring at each other. Hunter was also there, standing in between them both and so he would see who Mary chose. After a couple more minutes of waiting, Mary walked outside, her father standing behind her as she walks up to them both. Mary stares at the ground while Lance and Troy's eyes were locked right on her. "......"

"Hey Mary, it's okay." Mary looks up at Lance. "Don't worry about it too much. It's not like we'll stay mad at you."

"Yeah." Mary looks at Troy. "We'll still be glad you at least spent some time with us."

Mary looks back down, "Heh. Oh-okay." Mary takes a deep breath. "Lance, I really like the time we had at the carnival. We had fun, and I'm still happy with the prize you got me so, thanks for that. And Troy, I really like the dinner you cooked for me and the time we spent, flying, together. So, after thinking about it for a long time...", Lance, Troy, Hunter, and her father stare at her. And then she says, "...I'm going to have to with Troy."

There was moment of silence. Lance's expression seems to have dipped, a lot. But he tried his best not to show it. Hunter and Troy stare at Lance, Mary did the same. "What? Hey, it's fine with me." Lance starts scratching the side of his cheek, "Just uh, what made you choose him?"

Mary walks up to Lance, holding his right hand, "Lance, I really liked the time we spent at the carnival. Really, I did. It's just, with Troy, he seems to know how to take care of himself and others. Plus, Troy really respected me and, I kinda saw more of it in him." Lance's expression seemed pretty down still. Mary holds up Lance's hand. "Look, you're an awesome and outsanding guy. I'm sure you'll find someone who's more, active, than steady. It's kinda how I've been since living in the forest." Mary then gives Lance a quick kiss on his cheek. "I promise I'll hold on to the prize you got me."

Lance still looked pretty down, but then his face brightens for her, "Hey, I get it. Like I said, don't worry about it too much. I'm happy for you guys."

Lance pulls Mary in for one more hug, before they let go. Mary walks over to Troy, who then walks her over to her house. Hunter and Lance stare as the two and Mary's father walk off. Hunter walks up beside Lance. "Hey, you doin' okay bud?" Hunter stared at Lance for a short time, but then saw what looked like a tear running down Lance's right cheek. Hunter sets a hand on Lance's shoulder to comfort him, "Hey, you holding out okay?"

"!" Lance quickly rubs his eye. "Y-yeah. Yeah! Heh. Aw well. Guess you can't win them all huh?"

Hunter stares at Lance with a worried look on his face, "... Yeah..." Lance was staring down at the ground again. Hunter then wraps his thick right arm around Lance's wide back to pull him in for a hug. "It's alright man."
1141112111121121111211111111111111122121.title: Mary's Choice

1141112111121121111211111111111111122121.content:
The next day, Hunter met with Trixie who admired his new size. After playfully flexing for her, Hunter told Trixie what happened with Lance. "I'm really worried about Lance." said Hunter to Trixie. "I've never seen him so bummed before. He even cried!" Trixie became concerned as well. She always like Lance for being so enthusiastically optimistic. She couldn't imagine Lance without his smile. "Romance is a very complicated thing, Hunter." said Trixie. "And its ending is never easy."

"But what should I do?" asked Hunter.

"Try giving him some space for now. Right now, this is something he needs to deal with on his own. If he's still depressed after a while try talking to him again."

"Okay. I'll do that."

"Speaking of Lance, where is he?"

"He said he going to the gym. I guess he just wants to let some aggression out."

Troy and Mary snuggled together on the couch of Troy's home. Mary had a concerned look that Troy couldn't help notice. "You okay, Mary?" asked Troy. Mary nodded. "Yeah, I'm just still thinking about Lance. I could tell just by looking at him that I broke his heart." Troy shared the same concern. "I noticed that too." he said. "I'll try talking to him if he's still feeling down." Troy continued. "After that, I feel like I owe you an apology." Mary looked up. "For what?" she asked. "Lance and I put you in an unfair position. Choosing either me or him. I'm sorry for putting you in that position. Besides, if it were the other way around, I would feel the same way." Mary pecked Troy on the cheek. "It's okay. I really liked you both and I was really interested in the both of you when I first met you two. And after hearing that apology, I know I made a good choice." Troy was touched by Mary's response and kissed her back.
1141112111121121111211111111111111122121.title: The next day. (Troy's or Hunter's point...

choices: Talk to him. Try to cheer him up.
1141112111121121111211111111111111122121.content:
Hunter and Trixie were out sitting at a table while having some ice cream. Normally they both would be chatting about their day and such, but after hearing about Lance, they just didn't seem to have much to talk about. At one point, they both just stop licking the vanilla ice cream from their ice cream cones. "......" They both said each other's name at the same time.

"You go first.", Trixie replied.

"Um...guess you can't stop thinking about Lance too?", Hunter asks.

Trixie takes a quick lick of her ice cream. "How'd you figure that out? You reading my mind again?"

"Uh... Well..."

Trixie pats Hunter on his massive shoulder, "I-i'm kidding. But yes. I just can't stop thinking about him. Maybe you and Troy should go check on to see if he's okay."

Hunter nods his head, "Yeah. It would be nice to at least see his smiling attitude again." Hunter gets up from his seat. "You gonna be okay?"

"Of course.", Trixie responded. "Just go to him."

Hunter smiles back at her, and then he walks off. He eats up the ice cream cone in one gulp, and then contacts Troy telepathically. "Troy, you available?"

"Yeah. What's up?", Troy replies telepatically.

"You mind coming with me to the gym? Just to check up on Lance?", Hunter asks.

"Actually, I'm there now.", Troy responded.

"Really? ..." Troy started to worry, "So, how's he doin'?"

There was a slight pause, until he says, "Nnnot so well."

"!" Hunter starts picking up the pace, "Alright. I'll be there." In a second, Hunter was there now. "Alright, I'm here.", Hunter says aloud.

"Oh. Wait did you say...? Nevermind." Troy and Hunter stare into a window of the gym, staring at Lance, who appeared to only be doing arm curls with his right arm while sitting on a bench and staring at the ground. "Man... That guy's not lookin' so good."

"Yeah...", Hunter responded worringly. "I don't even think Lance does any arm curls anymore."

"I know you guys are out there.", Lance replies telepathically, which caught you both by surprise.

They both stared at Lance, then make it so that he wouldn't be able to hear or think of what you guys are saying. "So, what should we do?", Hunter asks.
1141112111121121111211111111111111122121.title: Still Thinking About Lance

1141112111121121111211111111111111122121.content:
Hunter and Troy came up to Lance. "We were getting worried about you and wanted to see if you were okay." Lance gave away a big sigh. "Still a bit bummed but I'm okay." "Really?" asked Hunter. "I don't know." said Lance. "I..I really thought Mary and I could really have something. I guess I wanted what you and Trixie had. I was always jealous of you, Hunter."

Hunter was shocked to hear that. How could an overconfident rhino like Lance be jealous of him? "Really?" Hunter asked. Lance nodded. "Yeah, I really like the relationship you had with Trixie and I never had something like that before. Sure, I flirted with some girls at beach but it's not the same. Maybe I shouldn't have showed off too much to Mary."

Troy heard enough. "Lance, Mary didn't want to hurt you. She felt really bad about it. Man, I know there is someone out there for you. I don't know who but you'll be the greatest thing that ever happened to her. Everything's going to be fine."

Lance took another breath and said, "You're right. I'm sorry for making you guys worry." "Don't worry about it." said Hunter. "How about we do something fun and try to forget this whole thing." Lance nodded in agreement. "You got any ideas?" asked Lance. Troy turned to see a poster on the wall next to the dumbbell racks. "Guys, look at this! There's going to be a bodybuilding competition in this gym next week!" Hunter turned to Lance. "How about that, man? Nothing cheers you up more than people cheering for you!" Lance began to feel excited and his signature opimistic smile returned to his face. "Let's do it!" he said clapping his hands. "There's the rhino I know and love!" commented Troy.
1141112111121121111211111111111111122121.title: Talk to him. Try to cheer him up.

1141112111121121111211111111111111122121.content:
Lance was taking a closer look at the poster to skim through the details of the competition. Lance looks up at Hunter and Troy after reading, "Hey, you guys should join in too. Whatcha think?"

Hunter and Troy shrug their shoulders, Hunter being the first to say, "Eh. Why not."

"Yeah. Haven't been in one of those in a while.", Troy added.

Lance raises his right arm in a flexing pose, "You guys care to train a bit with me while you're here?"

"Actually, I was thinking we spend some time together. Out of the gym.", Hunter suggested.

Lance lowers his arm, "Huh? Why?"

Hunter and Troy chuckle at each other, and then Troy walks up behind Lance and pushes him towards the entrance, "Because, you've done nothing but arm curls in here all morning. You should get some fresh air." The three of them are now out of the gym, walking in one direction. Troy wraps an arm around Lance's wide back. "Let's go to the mall. Maybe we can grab a bite to eat while we're there."

"Uhhh...", Lance replies uncertainly.

Hunter comes around the other side to wrap an arm around Lance's back as well. "Yeah. Maybe even go shopping."

Lance sighs. "You guys..." After a few minutes of walking, they were finally there. The first thing they did was eat. Hunter was eating a slice of pepperoni pizza, Troy eating a salad, and Lance eating a corndog. They even chatted a lot about what they've been up to, trying their best not to bring Mary into the conversation. At least, maybe not yet. Just so it doesn't bring up any bad memories. After a couple minutes of chatting and eating, the three just lied back on their seats, letting the food settle. Lance lets out a loud belch, "Excuse me. So what did you guys want to do now?"

"We could go clothes shoppin'.", Hunter replied happily.

"What!?", Lance replies loudly.

"Yeah! You can use some new duds. I mean, you've pretty much only been wearing shirts and shorts lately.", Troy added.

"Shut up!", Lance exclaimed.
1141112111121121111211111111111111122121.title: Hany Out Now, Train Later

1141112111121121111211111111111111122121.content:
Hunter walked into the clothing store with Troy and Lance. Lance dragged his feet into the entrance. "Come on, man!" said Troy. "It's not going to be that bad. Who knows? You might find a look you like." "I don't know." said Lance. "I just pick clothes that fit me. I don't pay attention to how I look." "But it's very important you do." said Hunter. "Shopping for big clothes can be difficult but not impossible." Troy smiled at Hunter. "Trixie told you that, didn't she?" "Shut up!" said Hunter blushing.

Hunter and Troy skimmed through while Lance was waiting to get out of there next to the dressing roomm. The trip distracted him from Mary but the rhino was going from sad to impatient. Hunter and Troy made a pile of clothes for Lance to try on. The pile composed of jeans, t-shirts, and everything else that might look good on Lance.

"I really don't know about this, guys." said Lance. Troy picked out jeans and a shirt and pushed them to the rhino's chest. "Just shut up and put them on." said Troy. Lance did as he was told and walked into the dressing rooms. A few minutes later, Lance walked out in jeans that clearly defined his legs and a shirt that was close to shredding against his massive chest. "I'm thinking to small." said Hunter. "You think?" said Lance. Troy picked up a bigger pair of jeans and a red polo shirt. "Try these." he told Lance.

The next few minutes Lance walked out again. His jeans actually fitted him. They still defined his thighs a bit but not as if they were about to be torn. The red polo looked great on him. It actually made him look a little bigger and more intimidating. Troy smiled at Lance. "I like this look. Totally you!" "I agree!" said Hunter. "What do you think, Lance?" The rhino turned to the mirror. He slowly smiled at the new him. He especially liked the polo. It was definitely not worth shredding with his muscles. "I like it." said Lance. "I really do!" "See?" said Hunter. "All you needed was a new look for you and everyone to see!"

The trio left the store with bags at hand. "Any more ideas?" asked Lance to Hunter and Troy.

"Hmmm..."
1141112111121121111211111111111111122121.title: Lance dresses more casually.

choices: Hang out some more with the cougar.
Hand out some more without the cougar.
1141112111121121111211111111111111122121.content:
Hunter holds up a finger, "How about the bookstore?"

Lance sighs heavily. "You're not gonna make me read to are you?"

"Nah. We're just gonna check something.", Troy says as he and Hunter entered the store.

Lance on the other hand stayed outside. "Look, why don't you two go ahead. I'll just stay out here."

Troy says shrugging his shoulders and entering inside, "Well, okay."

Hunter followed Troy inside, "Just keep a good watch on our stuff."

Lance was already sitting on a bench in front of the store. "Yeah, yeah." Lance sits patiently on the bench for a while, propping his head up with his arms. He glances around a few times, just watching people walk by, minding their own business, shopping, etc. Lance even took notice of what looked like a young couple holding hands: A male white-furred wolf, and a female red fox. He stared at them for a short time, which caused him to think of Mary, but not making him feel as bad as he used to, thankfully.

He just turns his head back, and sighs. All of a sudden, someone walks out of the bookstore, her eyes stuck to a book she had just bought. Without noticing, she sits down right next to Lance, which nearly caught him by surprise. "Uh..." Lance stares at the tall and slender cougar for the time being as her eyes lay fixiated in that book of hers. It had actually been about five minutes since she sat there, Lance waiting patiently to respond the whole time. "Um, hi."

This time, she actually took notice. "Oh! Uh, I'm, I'm sorry. I didn't know anyone was sittin' there."

Lance holds a hand up, "No, it's alright. You seemed really interested in that book so I didn't want to bother you." Lance took a closer look at the book she was reading. "So, you into novels?"

"Oh, yes.", she says bookmarking the page she was left on. She then wraps her arms around the book to hug against her chest, "I simply love romance novels. Been readin' up on 'em since I was a young lady."

"Wow.", Lance replies.

Hunter and Troy entered out of the bookstore a few minutes later. The first thing they noticed was Lance talking with the cougar. This however got them worried.
1141112111121121111211111111111111122121.title: To the Bookstore

1141112111121121111211111111111111122121.content:
Lance thought this cougar was amazing. Smart and beautiful. Lance didn't know much about books personally because he's been pumping his body than his mind. However, nothing that god powers can't fix. With a thought, Lance became knowledgable in books. He and the cougar then had a friendly conversation. Lance even made her laugh a little.

"I don't know about this, Hunter," said Troy. "What if Lance gets serious with this girl and it doesn't work out? I can't stand Lance being sad again." Hunter was worried about this too. It scared him to see such a happy guy like Lance to be so depressed. Then again, Lance looked happy with the cougar. "Let's give him a moment." said Hunter. "This might just be what Lance needs." Troy was skeptic but agreed with Hunter's advice.

"So," said the cougar, "What do you do for fun?" Lance smiled and flexed his arms to her. "I'm a bodybuilder! I lift heavy weights and meet nice girls like you for fun." The cougar giggled and blushed a little bit by Lance's words and muscles. She had a thing for big guys. "I'm Lance, by the way." said Lance offering his meaty hand to the cougar. "Alecia." responded the cougar shaking Lance's hand.

Alecia felt connected to Lance. She couldn't explain why but she grew to like the giant rhino. "So," started Lance, "You going anywhere?" "Well, it's silly." said Alecia. "No, come on, tell me. I won't laugh." Alecia still felt shy but told him anyway. "I was going to go into the new candle shop that just opened." she said. Lance raised his brow in interest. That was the first time a girl showed interest in candles. "Would you like to come along?" Alecia asked. Lance answered almost instantly. "Yeah, sure. That sounds like fun."

Lance turned around to see Troy and Hunter looking at him and Alecia. He felt embarrassed now but he knew they cared about him when it came to girls. "Say," said Lance, "I'm with some friends. Would it be okay if they came with us?"
1141112111121121111211111111111111122121.title: Hang out some more with the cougar.

choices: "Yeah. We'll see how it goes once Alecia leaves."
"Nah. Maybe we should leave them be once they're finished here."
1141112111121121111211111111111111122121.content:
"Yes. It's okay.", Alecia replies. Alecia starts tapping Lance's chest, "But just so you know, I'm a one-man girl."

Lance throws his hands into the air, "Uh, no! It's, nothing like that--"

"I-hi'm kidding!", Alecia replies with a chuckle. "Course whether or not they feel comfortable going inside is up to them."

"Course they do!", Lance replies brightly. "After all, it's just a candle--"

"No." Hunter and Troy replied blantly.

Lance turns to the two of them, "Alright, fine." He hands one of them his bag, "Then you two watch my stuff while me and Alecia go inside."

"Before we go, you never introduced them.", Alecia added.

"Oh, yes." Lance holds a hand out in front of Hunter, "This big tiger is Hunter." He then shifts his hand in front of Troy, "And this burly reptile is Troy. They're good workout buddies o' mine."

"Nice to meet you two. Come on, let's go inside.", Alecia says tugging Lance's massive arm.

"Be right back.", Lance replies to his pals while he walks off into the store.

Hunter and Troy take a seat over at a nearby bench, setting their belongings on the floor. They both watched as Lance has a good time with Alecia, taking a look at different scented candles, but mostly chatting with each other. Hunter was the first to break the silence, "Hey Troy, do you think Lance seems normal to you? I mean, would he normally enter a candle store for a girl?"

"Heh. Maybe you don't know him enough.", Troy replies. "Lance would do anything for chicks. He'd even put on a balarina suit if he was asked to."

Hunter raises his eyelids at Troy, "Really?"

"NO!", Troy replies laughing.

Hunter couldn't get the thought of Lance being in something like that out of his head. "Great. Thanks for putting that thought into my head..."

"But yeah, he would definitely do something like this for a lady.", Troy continues. "Heck, I would even go if Mary wanted me to come along."

Hunter chuckles. "And me with Trixie." Hunter looks back to Lance and Alecia, who were currently at the checkout, taking care of their stuff. "You think we should still keep an eye on him?"
1141112111121121111211111111111111122121.title: Candle Shopping

1141112111121121111211111111111111122121.content:
"I guess it wouldn't hurt to keep an eye on him." said Hunter. "Just in case." Troy nodded in agreement. Anything to help out his friend.

Lance was surprised in the candle shop. It was full of aromas that smelled great and interesting at the same time. It was actually nice to smell something different from the stench of sweat. Alecia picked a candle to another to sniff while Lance was still taking it all in. "Hey, Lance," said Alecia, "What do you think of this one?" She held a purple shaded candle up to his chest. "It's called 'Lavender Mountains.'"

Lance still wasn't sure about candle shops. Who would name their candles 'Lavender Mountains?' Regardless, for Alecia, Lance bended over the candle and sniffed. Surprisingly, it wasn't that bad. It smelled very fresh and relaxing. Lance couldn't explain how or why though. Maybe there was more to candles than he first thought.

"Wow," said Lance, "I didn't expect that." "I know!" said Alecia. "Me neither! I think I'm going to get it." As they continued browsing, Lance and Alecia continued talking. "This is a really interesting place," said Lance. "It's kinda nice to be in a place that doesn't smell like sweat and feet." Alecia laughed. "I think you need to get out of the gym more often." she said.
"Maybe. But I don't really know what else to do besides working out."
"Don't worry, I'll show you how to have a good time if you show me."
"Deal!"

Lance and Alecia finally walked out of the candle shop. "Thanks for going in with me, Lance," said Alecia. "I had a really good time." "Me too." said Lance. "Alecia, would you, um, like, to get together again sometime?" "I would love to!" Alecia gave Lance his number and walked away.

Lance walked back to Hunter and Troy. "So, how did it go?" asked Hunter. "It was awesome!" said Lance. "I never thought I'd have fun in a candle shop with a girl like Alecia. She's really cool!" "Are you going to see her again?" asked Troy. "You bet!" answered Lance. "She gave me her number so we can hang out again!"

Hunter took a deep breath. "Lance, I'm great you met Alecia, I really am. I'm just a little worried you're getting carried away with her. I just don't want you to get crushed by her like Mary." Lance shrugged a shoulder. "Yeah, I'm a little worried about that. But I can't let that stop me. I want what you and Troy have and Alecia could be the one for me. I can't just let her go after today." Hunter understood how Lance felt. If he was in his shoes with Trixie, Hunter would have done the same thing. "Okay," said Hunter. "Just be careful."
1141112111121121111211111111111111122121.title: Wait and See

choices: Hunter joins Trixie for the show.
1141112111121121111211111111111111122121.content:
Troy walks up beside Hunter and Lance, wrapping his lengthy arms around their broad shoulders, "Alright, so what say head back to the gym?"

Lance pats a fist against his other hand, "Oh yeah, the competition! I completely forgot about that. I would've invited Alecia to that too. Ah it's alright. I'll just let her know tomorrow."

Withing a couple minutes, Hunter and friends made it back to the gym. They each headed to the locker room, putting their stuff away and dressing into their own pair of tank-tops and gym shorts. For the next hour, they basically spent it working out together. Pumping iron, flexing muscle, gaining mass, etc. One thing was off though the entire time. It didn't smell like sweat at all. Troy and Hunter sniffed out what smelt like...lavendar mountains. Taking a look at a nearby bench, one of the candles Alecia was looking at before was lit on top of it. Troy and Hunter also noticed Lance, minding his own business while working out right next to the candle, and the looked back at each other, chuckling in response.

But for Hunter and Troy, it was nice to see Lance happy once again. Working his heart out, even being competitive with each them. At one point during their workout, Lance went ahead and checked himself out in front of the mirror wall. He started flexing various muscle groups on his body, seeing the progress he was making yet again. After showing off for a bit, he rips his tank top clean off, and then challenged the two of them to a flex off. Troy was more than happy to go up against him first, pulling his tank top right off and flexing along side his buff buddy.

Hunter just worked out on his own, keeping watch over the two of them while they competed to see who's muscles were best. It always seemed like a tie though, but it was also great practice for the competition next week. Suddenly, Hunter's phone rings. He puts down a 500-pound barbell he was lifting to answer it. "Hello? Oh, hey Trixie. Lance? Yeah, he's doing great. Much much better as a matter of fact. What? You did? Wow, I'd love to. Alright. I'll see ya there." Hunter hangs up, and then turns to the flexing two, "Trixie got tickets for a show. I'm gonna take off and meet her there."

Troy walks over to his gym bag and grabs a towel, wiping his face. "Yeah, I think it's time I get going too. Oh and Lance, you take care, alright?"

Lance finally relaxes his muscles. "Hey, I'll be alright. That's why I've got you guys to keep me sane."

Hunter and Troy grin back at lance. "Didn't like the candle, but it was nice working out with ya anyway.", Troy added.

"Hey, least it's better than sweat!", Lance remarked.
1141112111121121111211111111111111122121.title: Quick Workout

1141112111121121111211111111111111122121.content:
Hunter went back to the room to shower the sweat off of him and changed to decent clothes. He then made his way to the theatre Trixie told him to meet her. When he entered the lobby, Hunter found Trixie in a sexy red dress. "Trixie," said Hunter trying to get her attention. "Hunter!" she replied. "I'm so glad you could make it!" "And miss my girl?" said Hunter. "No way! You look great in that dress." "Thanks. You too in that suit. Just try not to rip it." Hunter blushed and chuckled in embarrassment. "Well, let's get seats before they're filled." He said.

Hunter and Trixie entered a giant theatre. hundreds of seats spread across the floor and balconies on the walls. "What seats would you like?" asked Trixie. Hunter looked around trying to find the perfect spot for them. "I know just the spot." said Hunter. With a snap of his fingers, Hunter and Trixie found themselves on the center balcony facing directly at the stage. "I think you're VIP material." said Hunter flirtfully. Trixie was amazed by their seats and Hunter. Trixie kissed her tiger god. "I'm so glad I'm dating a god." she said. Hunter chuckled. "Well I'm glad I'm dating a goddess."

Hunter and Trixie enjoyed the show in their seats. They spent the night holding hands and Trixie lying on Hunter's chest. Since they were in the VIP section, it was deserted. They had the whole balcony to themselves. "This is really nice." whispered Trixie. "I know." said Hunter. "I really like the show there and here." "Oh, Hunter, stop it!" Trixie said jokingly.

The couple stretched out once the play reached intermission. "That play is getting really interesting." said Trixie. "I really like the idea of the main character turning into a different species." Hunter agreed. "Yeah, that is interesting." "Say, Hunter," began Trixie, "I was just wondering, um, could you turn into another species? That is, if you wanted to?" "I think so." answered Hunter. "But I never tried. You wanna see?" Trixie nodded excitedly.

Since Trixie was a vixen, Hunter thought he would try turning himself into a fox. Hunter closed his eyes and pictured himself as a fox. Right before Trixie's eyes, Hunter's fur turned into a darker orange and his stripes disappeared. His tail became thicker and bushier while his muzzle grew longer. Hunter still kept his muscles when he finished changing. When he opened his eyes, Hunter saw Trixie with her mouth open. "How do I look?" asked Hunter. "You look amazing!" They hugged and Trixie loved the feel of Hunter fur softer than before while keeping the sturdiness of his muscles.

During their moment, the lights of the theatre darkened. "Looks like the show's about to start again." said Hunter. "Let's enjoy the show!"
1141112111121121111211111111111111122121.title: Fox God

1141112111121121111211111111111111122121.content:
As the show continued, Hunter and Trixie sat together in their seat. The whole time, Trixie had her arms wrapped around Hunter's thick and foxy chest. Hunter takes notice of this, "Uh, Trixie? Are you cold or something?"

"O-hof course not!", Trixie replies a little happier than usual. "It's just, you being a fox now, I guess I still can't get over it." Trixie starts brushing her hand along Hunter's now bushy tail, making his entire body shutter a bit. "And, even as a fox, you're still a really big guy."

Hunter smiles warmly at her. "Well yeah. Why wouldn't I be?" Hunter wanted to show off a bit to her, but he felt he didn't want to keep her attention from the play. Even with her wrapping her arms around him, she still kept her eyes locked on to the play. Hunter didn't want to worry about it too much. The play wasn't gonna last that long anyway. But for the time being, he would go ahead and tense his muscles under his large suit. Not enough to rip it of course, but enough for her to take notice of it while still hugging you.

As for the last part of the play, the main character, which was a dragon, reveals himself to his love as originally being a mule. But his love, still takes him for being who he was, and of course being truthful to her. The scene even makes Trixie tear up a little. Hunter watches his love crying a bit onto your suit. He was okay with it of course. "You know, this scene seems familiar, doesn't it."

Trixie looks up into Hunter's eyes, a tear running down her cheek. Hunter uses his hand to wipe it away. "It does...", Trixie replies tearfully.

Hunter pulls his love in for a big fox hug. This moment was so sweet for the two of them. "Thanks for taking me for who I am.", Hunter added warmly, Trixie crying a bit more in his thick arms.

A few minutes later, the two lovebirds were out and about walking from the play. Luckily no one notices Hunter coming in as a tiger from the beginning. Trixie was still tearing a bit from the show. "That play was great. Thanks for coming along with me."

"Of course.", Hunter replies happily. "It's only 5 o'clock. Wanna head home? Or would you like to head out someplace else? It's getting a little stuffy being in this suit anyway."

Trixie knew where this was going, blushing a bit at the thought of it. It would be nice to see how Hunter looks under there, as a fox.
1141112111121121111211111111111111122121.title: Back to the Show.

1141112111121121111211111111111111122121.content:
Hunter had to show off his foxy form to Trixie in a way unlike any other before. "I have an idea." Hunter picked up Trixie to his chest and leaped over the theatre building. Trixie gave a small yelp in fear but disappeared as they landed. The top of the theatre was pretty with the lights flashing inwards and out. Hunter posed and asked Trixie, "You ready for another show?"

Hunter grabbed both sleeves and ripped them at the same time. He then flexed and shredded his thickened and tensed arms. Hunter's biceps looked bigger from his fur's thickness. He then ripped his shirt to show his bumpy bare chest. He joked with Trixie by making his pecs bounce. Hunter then ripped the bottoms of his pants revealing strong and firm legs. Trixie was amazed by Hunter's muscles. She thought Hunter looked better as a fox because his fur really made his muscles look bigger.

Hunter's muscles got even bigger as he posed. He tensed his arms upwards and downwards, shredded his abs and pecs making them more define, and flexed his legs to make them look like tree trunks. Trixie truly thought Hunter looked more like a god as a fox.

"What do you think?" said Hunter. "I think you look fabulous!" answered Trixie excitedly. "Seriously, you look great as a fox! I suggest you keep this look." Hunter wasn't sure about that. Stay as a fox? Become a fox god rather than a tiger god? "I don't know about that." replied Hunter. "Well, you think about it." said Trixie. "Right now, let's head home. I'm ready for bed. Without hesitation, Hunter picked Trixie up again and leaped building to building home.

They finally made it back to the room. "Thanks again for the date," said Trixie. "Good night." She closed the door to her room. Hunter also thought it was time for bed. He got into his room and stripped to his boxers. He paused to see himself in the mirror. Hunter was still a fox. Should he stay as a fox? His thick fur really did make his muscles look bigger than as a tiger but Hunter felt like that would be like giving up a part of himself. Hunter was sure Trixie would understand if he stayed as a tiger. But what to do?
1141112111121121111211111111111111122121.title: To Be or Not to Be

1141112111121121111211111111111111122121.content:
Hunter thought it long and hard. He decided to go back to being a tiger. With a quick snap of his fingers, black stripes stretched his body, his muzzle grew smaller, and thick fur thinned. Hunter was back to his normal self. He was sure Trixie would understand. He then got into his boxers and headed straight for bed.

The next morning, Hunter found Trixie in the kitchen. Trixie noticed Hunter as a tiger again. "I see you're back into your stripes!" she said. "That okay?" asked Hunter. "Of course!" answered Trixie. "It was great seeing you as a fox but I like you just the way you are!" She gave Hunter a quick kiss on the muzzle.

"Hunter!" Lance stomped his way across the room to the godly tiger. "Hey Lance!" said Hunter. "How was your date with Alecia?" "Dude, she loves the muscle rhino!" exclaimed Lance. "We had a great dinner at this very nice coffee house and I got to show off some guns at the gym afterwords! She is so awesome!" Hunter was thrilled to hear such great news from Lance. "Great! I'm so happy for you!" "I'm happy for me too!" said Lance. "Well, I think I'm going to pump some more iron. See you guys later!"

"Lance seems to be in a better mood." commented Trixie. "Yep. I think Alecia's going to be good for him." said Hunter. "Say, I just had an idea." said Trixie. "Since you, Lance, and Troy have girlfriends, you want to try doing a triple date?" "A triple date?" said Hunter. "I suppose we could. Where would we go?" Trixie thought about it for a few seconds. "How about a picnic on the beach? There will plenty of space for us and plenty of space for you all to show off for us!" Hunter chuckled at the idea of showing off with Lance and Troy for their girls. "I think that does sound like fun." said Hunter. "Let's do it!"

Hunter walked into the gym to tell Lance the beach picnic plan. Lance was working out with Troy and they were really focused on it. "Hey guys," said Hunter getting their attention, "I know what we're going to do later!" "What?" asked Troy. "How would you guys feel about a triple date on a beach?" "That sounds awesome!" said Lance. "You know I'm all about the beach!" Troy nodded agreeing with his friend. "Great!" said Hunter. "Trixie and I were thinking about having it this evening when the beach is less crowded. Is there anything you guys want to do until then?"

Lance and Troy thought for a minute.
1141112111121121111211111111111111122121.title: Happy Couples

1141112111121121111211111111111111122121.content:
"Hmm...", Lance thought. "Hey, since we're all already here, why don't we work out a bit. Maybe, pump ourselves up a some more that way we'd look good on the beach."

Hunter and Troy looked at each other. They agreed upon the working out part, but weren't sure of Lance's interpretation of 'pumping up'. Hunter stood up straight and tensed his chest a bit, "I, think we're good just the way we are."

"Yeah.", Troy added. "I wouldn't want to overwhelm Mary too much." Troy chuckles.

"Ah you two are killjoys. But I'm okay with that." Lance picks up the previous dumbbell he was repping with. Troy was previously lifting a 500-pound barbell, which he continues lifting to himself. Lance looks over to Hunter, "Hey, aren't you gonna join in?"

Hunter waves a hand at them, "Yeah, yeah. Just give me a moment while I head into the locker..." Lance and Troy stared intently at him, not impressed. "On second thought..." With a snap of Hunter's finger, Hunter was now in his usual workout clothes.

"Now you're gettin' it.", Lance replied proudly.

For the next hour or so, Hunter and friends were busy lifting weights, pumping iron, even flexing and showing off a few times while the few people who were in the gym watched part of the time. Afterwards, the three were drenched in sweat. Troy wipes his head with a small towel. "Alright. Let's all take a quick shower. Then I guess we'll all meet on the beach."

Lance jumps up, giving his arms a hard-earned flex. "Alright! An evening on the beach with us and our gals! Can't wait to show Alecia these big guns!" Lance stretches his chest and lats, giving his pecs a quick bounce, "And of course these bad boys."

Hunter and Troy looked at each other. "..." They each then set a hand on Lance's shoulder, "Lance..."

"Hey, you know I can't help myself." Lance looks at Hunter and Troy, who didn't look interested in Lance's response. Lance then slaps their hands off, "Alright, alright."
1141112111121121111211111111111111122121.title: Pump Up to Show Off

1141112111121121111211111111111111122121.content:
Hunter walked on the cool sand with Trixie hugging on his huge bicep. "I'm really excited about this!" said Trixie. "Aren't you?" "Of course!" answered Hunter. "I just hope it doesn't get too awkward. I've seen enough tv shows to know that these sort of things don't always end well." Trixie giggled. "Don't worry. It'll be fine. This isn't a tv show, Hunter." "You got a god for a boyfriend. I think we're not that far from one."

"Hey guys!" Hunter and Trixie saw the rest of the group already at the picnic spot. Lance, Alecia, Troy, and Mary were sitting next to a fire while wearing their swim suits. Troy was sitting on a log with a guitar in his hands while Lance and Alecia were dancing to the music he was making. "Hey, you all!" replied Hunter. "Troy, I didn't know you played the guitar!" "I did as of a few minutes ago." Troy answered telepathically. "Oh, nevermind." said Hunter.

Trixie was getting aquainted with Alecia and Mary. They all seemed to like each other fine. Maybe this won't be a disaster triple date. The overall group chatted while holding on their according mates. "This is doing great!" said Lance telepathically to Hunter and Troy. "I know!" answered Hunter. "I was a little worried."

"Hey, Hunter!" said Trixie. "How about you guys throw a show for this dinner?" "That's a great idea!" said Lance enthusiastically standing on his feet. "We got muscles, why not show them to those who really appreciate them?" Troy and Hunter chuckled at Lance response. This is what they get for having a meathead for a friend. But their giant rhino friend made an excellent point.

Hunter, Lance, and Troy got up in a row getting ready for a muscle show. Hunter raised his arms upward while Lance downward. They both tensed and defined their biceps and triceps while Troy puffed up his already rippled chest. Alecia could see a giant grin on Lance's face to match his giant muscles. Lance went so far to impress by stretching out his legs and flexing them until veins popped out of them. Hunter curled his arm towards Trixie with a sexy smile and Troy tensed his wings to Mary. For the grand finale, the muscle trio flexed all the muscles in their bodies all at once. The girls were madly impressed by such an amazing feat that they clapped and cheered for their men.

"That was great!" said Alecia. "You were great, Lance!" Mary responded by smooching on Troy's cheek and Trixie jumped into Hunter's arms. "Thanks, girls!" said Lance. "Hey guys, could I talk to you all for a sec?" It was a bit random but Hunter and Troy agreed and followed Lance until the girls were out of sight. "What's up?" asked Troy. "Getting nervous?" "No!" said Lance. "I'm doing great! I just had a thought." "Hope it didn't hurt!" said Hunter jokingly. Lance slapped him in the back of the head. "It's serious!" Lance insisted. "Well, you how Trixie knows about Hunter being a god? Well, what if we told Alecia and Mary about us?"

Hunter and Troy were surprised to hear what Lance just said. "I don't know, man." said Troy. "What if they can't handle it? What if they freak out?" "We can always erase their memories so they won't know." said Lance. "But if you want to have a serious relationship with Alecia, Lance, she's bound to know sooner or later." said Hunter. "I didn't mean to start anything." replied Lance. "It's just a thought. I feel like I can really trust Alecia and I know you guys feel the same way about Trixie and Mary. What do you guys think?"

"I don't know," expressed Troy. "Sounds pretty risky. What do you think, Hunter?"
1141112111121121111211111111111111122121.title: Awkward Date?

1141112111121121111211111111111111122121.content:
Mary, Trixie, and Alecia all sat together chatting while their boyfriends were away. They each had their own stick with a marshmallow jabbed on top while roasting them over a fire they had just started between them. "So Alecia, are you from the U.K.?", asks Mary.

"No, I was born here.", Alecia responds. "I got there yearly to meet up with family though."

"Wow. That sounds great!", Trixie replies happily. "So, what're your thoughts about Lance?"

Alecia blows off some of the smoke from her marshmallow. "I think he's a really interesting guy. I never thought such a big fellow like him would be so into books." Alecia takes a quick bite.

"Really?", Mary responded. "I had no idea."

"Yeah. Me neither.", Trixie adds. "You mean like fitness magazines and all that?"

Alecia nods her head, "Nope. I mean like novels and articles and stuff like that."

Trixie and Mary looked at each other and chuckled. "I guess we're gettin' to know more about them everyday.", Trixie replies.

Back over to Hunter and friends, they were still chatting to each other about revealing themselves to their gals. Hunter and Troy were still very unsure about it. Troy had his arms crossed over his chest while leaning back against a tree thinking to himself. "Hmm... I can't do it." Hunter and Lance look at him. "I don't think you should tell her either Lance."

"Really?", Lance responds with an eyebrow cocked. "I'm not gonna complain, but Hunter told Trixie about it."

"I know." Troy looks at Hunter, "Which to this day I'm still skeptical about." Hunter scratches the back of his head, and then Troy looks back at Lance, "But that's because Hunter knew Trixie for over a month. And got to know her very well until know."

"Yeah...", Hunter adds. "And, how long have you known Alecia? Like, two days? Barely?"

Lance holds out his hands a them, "Alright, alright."

"And...", Troy adds, "...Alecia might not be the one too."

"..." Lance turns away, "Okay. I got it." Lance lets out a sigh.
1141112111121121111211111111111111122121.title: Hold on There...

1141112111121121111211111111111111122121.content:
The muscle gods walked their way back to the girls. Lance was still down about not telling Alecia but he knew that Hunter and Troy were right. Lance needed to know Alecia more before doing something drastic. Hunter, Lance, and Troy noticed their girls sitting in a small circle talking and giggling to each other. They wondered what was going on.

"What's going on?" asked Hunter. "Oh nothing," said Trixie, "Just playing a little game of truth or dare." Lance was thinking, "Aren't they a little old to play that?" until Troy elbowed him in the abs. "You guys want to join us?" asked Mary. "Unless you guys want to do something more manly that is." "No, not at all!" said Lance. "We'd love to join you!" "Are you serious, Lance?" said Hunter telepathically. "Truth or dare?"

"Hey, you told me I need to get to know Alecia more. What better way than a game about honesty?"

"Good point."

The girls scooted some extra space for the men to sit. As the men sat down, they saw a glass bottle lying on a stone slab. "Are you guys ready?" said Alecia. Lance nodded enthusiastically as Hunter and Troy nodded with less excitement. Alecia spun the bottle as hard as she could and the bottle spun into a circle until it slowed to Hunter.

"Okay, Hunter," said Trixie, "Truth or dare?"

"Truth." said Hunter not wanting to do anything regrettable.

"Okay, have you ever fell in love with someone besides me?"

Hunter was going to say no at first but then he looked back at his old life. Before he knew he was a god, Hunter crushed on a tigress that went to his school. He thought she was absolutely amazing. Top of her class, popular, everything a guy could ask for. "Well," shrugged Hunter, "There was this one other girl before I met Trixie." The crowd gasped in response. "What was her name?" asked Mary.

"Tanya. She went to the same school as I did. I thought she was great! But she was the type of girl that was way out of my league! I didn't stand a chance!"

"Even with your muscles?" asked Alecia

"I didn't start working out till high school." lied Hunter. "But I bet I'd have a chance with her now!" He then flexed a bicep playfully. Trixie tugged him by the ear harshly. Hunter winced in pain as Trixie leveled his eyes with hers."But you're not thinking about finding her, are you, hun?"

"N..No! Of Course not! I love you very much, dear!" said Hunter under the domestic pain. "Please let go!"

Trixie did so and everyone laughed at Hunter. Hunter rubbed his ear with his the fur on his cheeks red. "Anyway," said Hunter trying to change the subject, "Who's next?"
1141112111121121111211111111111111122121.title: Honest Game

1141112111121121111211111111111111122121.content:
Mary holds up the bottle, "Let's see where the bottle takes us." Mary places the bottle on the slab and spins it. Ironically, it pointed to her. "Oh..."

"Alright.", Troy replies enthusiastically. "Truth, or dare?"

Mary thinks to herself, "Mmm... Dare."

Trixie and Alecia pat her on her shoulders. Alecia cheering her on, "You go gal!"

Troy sets his hands on his knees, "Alright then." Troy thinks to himself for a bit, sctratching his chin. He then notices a smaller log laying behind the girls. "Mary, I dare you to chop that log in half."

Trixie sets her hands on her hips. "Whaaat?"

Alecia shared the same expression. "Are you serious?"

"Okay."

Hunter and Lance joined them, "WHAT!?"

Mary then walks up to head toward the log. "Dude, is she seriously gonna do this!?", Hunter cried.

"How could you make her do such a thing!?", Lance added.

Hunter talks to Troy telepathically, "You ARE gonna make this easy for her. Right?"

"Nope.", Troy replies to them both in their heads.

"WHAT?!", Hunter and Lance thought loudly.

"Mary! You don't have to do this!", Trixie yells out. "I'll even take your turn if you want me to."

Mary stands behind the log, waving out to them. "Don't worry. I totally got this.", she replies calmly.

Alecia covers her eyes, "Oh man... I can't bloody look..."

"You're gonna miss it.", Troy replies with anticipation.

Mary starts by rubbing her hands together, and then holds them together as if she was praying while standing. She lifts up her left arm, and then... "Hee-YAH!" Her arm slices through the log, as if it were butter. "There you go.", she replies with a happy face.

Hunter, Lance, Trixie, and Alecia stared with their mouths agape in awe of what they had just seen. They all then slowly look back at Troy, still keeping the same look on their faces. "What?", Troy asks as if it were no big deal. "Didn't any of you know she mastered karate?"

"NO!", they all screamed.

Mary was standing right beside them all, still with her happy face. She holds up a finger, "You gotta protect yourself somehow when out in the forest."
1141112111121121111211111111111111122121.title: There's Something About Mary

1141112111121121111211111111111111122121.content:
"Next up!" yelled Alecia as she spun the bottle. The bottle landed on Lance. Without given the choice, Lance said, "Dare!" Alecia knew her boyfriend would do anything for a dare. What would be a very good one.

"Hmm...What should you do?" contemplated Alecia.

"I'll totally eat a live crab!" said Lance. Hunter and Troy winced at the thought.

"I got it! Dive into the ocean and catch a fish with your bare hands!"

"What?!" said Trixie and Mary. "That's a little too much, wouldn't you say?" asked Mary. Lance got up and said, "Not at all! Be right back!"

As Lance was walking to the shore, Hunter and Troy followed him. "Lance," started Hunter, "Are you sure you want to do this? Remember our talk about not telling Alecia?"

"This isn't about letting Alecia know." said Lance. "I was dared, therefore, I must do!"

"Okay, just be careful."

"Hunter, it's going to take a lot more than puny fish to stop this rhino god!"

Lance looked back to the girls, pounded his pecs, and dived into the water. No one saw him come back for air for several minutes. "You think he's okay?" asked Alecia. "I'm sure he is." said Trixie. "This is Lance we're talking about here! He can do whatever he puts his mind to!" Hunter and Troy weren't worried about their friend but he better hurry up before the girls begin to seriously worry.

The group then heard water crashing and a massive rhino emerging with two handfull of fish. Lance held them by the tails as he raised them up and yelled, "Fish fry!" Alecia and the girls clapped and cheered for Lance and his another amazing feat. The boys put the fish on sticks to let them cook by the fire. They all stopped their game to relax by the fire and see their fish crisp. They all sat by their according mates. Alecia wrapped herself around her rhino's chest feeling all the strength he could possibly hold. She pecked him on the cheek. "Is there anything you can't do?" Alecia asked Lance softly. "Not yet." Lance answered. They then kissed passionately and didn't care everyone was watching them.
1141112111121121111211111111111111122121.title: Go Fish!

1141112111121121111211111111111111122121.content:
Lance and Alecia's kiss did seem to last a little longer than normal. The rest of the gang didn't really take notice for long, keeping to themselves afterwards. Still, it was a cute site. As for their fish, it seemed crispy enough to eat. Troy clears his throat, purprosely loud enough so the two lovebirds would take notice. The two broke from their kiss and then looked over to Troy, who holds out two fish on a stick to them. "Fish is done."

"Oh! Uh...", Alecia blushes, then grabs the fish, "...thanks."

Lance also grabs his, sharing the same expression, "Eh, yeah. Thanks pal."

Troy also hands Hunter and Trixie their fish. As for his and Mary's, they didn't really look that crisp yet. Troy then puffs out his muscular chest, and spits fire right out all over the fish as he held them in his hand. Afterwards, the fish looked nice and crispy now. Troy hands one to Mary. "Thanks!", Mary replied happily.

Some smoke was still bellowing out from Troy's nostrils. "No problem." Mary chuckles at his smokey face.

After a couple minutes of eating and chatting, they each tossed their sticks in one pile one-by-one. Troy then pulls out his guitar and starts singing and playing to everyone. Mary even joined Troy in a duet for one song. This went on for another half hour or so, the night starting to become very late. Seems there's still time to do one more thing. Hunter looks up to the group, "Is there anything else you guys had planned for the night?"

Everyone else looked to each other, and then started to think to themselves. Trixie raises a hand, "We could play another game perhaps?"

Troy raises an arm to flex for the group, "Or, perhaps we could do a little something for you gals."

The whole group chuckles at him. Though that would be a nice thought.
1141112111121121111211111111111111122121.title: Fish-on-a-Stick

choices: Go home with one of the guys and girls.
1141112111121121111211111111111111122121.content:
Troy was thinking of ways on how impress the girls one last time. It had to be something big, something bigger than flexing their gigantic muscles. A lightbulb lit up in his head. "Hey guys," he said to Lance and Hunter. "I got a plan! Follow me!" Troy got up from the sand and Lance and Hunter followed him. The girls got together wondering what their boyfriends were planning.

"What's up?" asked Hunter. "You're going to think I'm crazy," said Troy. Troy whispered to his friends and Hunter jumped up. "You're right. You ARE crazy! No way I'm doing that!" "Well I think that's kinda cool!" said Lance. "Come on, Hunter," said Troy. "This could really impress Trixie and you can always use your powers to protect yourself." Troy made a good point and Hunter was always up for impressing his foxy girl. "Okay," said Hunter. "Let's do it."

The boys were gone for about ten minutes and the girls began to wonder what was keeping them so long. Troy suddenly walked out of night to the girls. "Ladies, we have one more special performance for you this evening. If you would please follow me?" The girls agreed and followed Troy to the corner of a boulder. They were surprised to see Hunter in a mount of sand with only his head sticking out. Lance was standing next to the great mount. Trixie, Mary, and Alecia laughed at this sight and Hunter responded with a look of great distain.

"This is what you wanted us to see?" asked Trixie. Troy gave a slight chuckle. "Not yet! Ready, Hunter?"
"Not really!"
"Too bad!"

Troy sucked in gulps of air making his rippled chest thicker. He then spewed fire from his scaly lips directly at Hunter! The girls, Lance, and Hunter gasped in fear at the great flames. "Are you crazy?!" asked Trixie. "You're going to barbaque my boyfriend!" "Don't worry, Trixie," said Lance. "Troy knows what he's doing." After about a minute, Troy spat out his last drops of fire and Hunter went from a heap of sand to a block of glass! Troy melted the sand around Hunter to make glass!

The girls were amazed but Trixie was still horrified. "You okay, Hunter?" asked Troy. "Yeah, I'm fine," Hunter answered. "You wanted to show us putting my boyfriend in glass?" said Trixie. Troy winked. "Yep! Give them the grand finale, Hunter!"

Hunter knew what to do next. He gritted his teeth and tried to move his frozen limbs in the glass. At first, there was nothing. Then Hunter heard faint glass cracking and it got louder for everyone to hear. The glass exploded as Hunter stretched out his arms and legs in a sexy pose. Everyone cheered for Hunter and Troy for the neat trick and Trixie apologized to Troy for doubting him. "I gotta admit, Troy," said Hunter telepathically, "This was a pretty cool trick!" "Yep!" Troy responded. "I know what the ladies love best!"

Trixie hugged Hunter around his huge waist. "I'm so glad you're okay." she said. Hunter picked her up to his thick pecs. "Of course, I am!" he said while flexing a veiny bicep. "It's going to take more than a little fire to stop this tiger god!"
1141112111121121111211111111111111122121.title: Through the Looking Glass

1141112111121121111211111111111111122121.content:
It was starting to get pretty late now. Much later than usual. Even the fire in between them was starting to dim out. They all looked at each other, and then got up so that they all were standing. Hunter was the first to speak, "Well, looks like it's time we should start heading home."

Trixie felt a bit saddened. "Aww... I almost don't want to go."

"We should definitely do this again sometime!", Troy said cheeringly.

"Yeah!" Mary shared the same expression. "Maybe we should do this in the forest." They all stared at her, each with worried faces. "Or, the park?"

Alecia chuckles. "Yeah. That'd be nice."

Alecia yawns. Lance pats her on her shoulders, "Shall I, escort you home?"

"Yes, thank you.", Alecia replied to her rhino boyfriend. She then waves back to everyone else, "Night everyone. Nice to getting to know you Mary and Trixie."

Trixie waves back, "Nice to meet you too."

Mary did the same, "Night!"

Lance and Alecia start parting off. Lance waves back, "Night guys."

"Night Lance. Night Alecia.", Hunter answered back.

Troy suddenly picks Mary up in his strong arms, "You two have a good one. Come on Mary, let me fly you home." Mary chuckles in response, and then they were off the ground. "Sit tight!"

Hunter and Trixie watched as Troy and his love flew off into the night sky. As for them, they took a moment to stare at the starry sky. Hunter realizes something. "Wait a minute..." Trixie looked at him, and then they skimmed the area around them. "They left us to clean up the mess."

"Oh...", Trixie replies. She then remembers the one great thing about Hunter, taking a look around first to see if anyone was watching. "Then again, you can just 'make' this area clean."

Hunter stares at her, and then grins. "Heh. Oh yeah, huh." With a snap of Hunter's fingers, the area went from messy to clean in a flash. "Just one thing left." Hunter bends down, about to distinguish the fire.

"Wait." Hunter stops. Looking up at Trixie. She blushes a bit at what she was about to say, "You think, you can turn into a dragon real quick?" Hunter was a bit surprised at the question. "Just to see what it's like? And, maybe you can fly us home too?"

Hunter stares at his love for a moment, then says...
1141112111121121111211111111111111122121.title: Left With the Mess

1141112111121121111211111111111111122121.content:
Hunter imagined himself as a dragon for a second. He was a bit curious what he would be like as well. And flying would be more convenient than walking. "Sure, why not?" said Hunter. Trixie clapped her hands in joy and excitemet. "You might wanna stand back just to be on the safe side," he told her.

Like before when he turned into a fox, Hunter tensed his muscles and imagined himself turning into a dragon. All of a sudden, his fur melted onto his skin and hardened into scales. His orange color and stripes remained. His tail grew longer and thickened to the size of a tree trunk. His muzzle grew longer as well as the claws on his hands and feet. Then dubs emerged from his back and grew into giant wings with the span of seven feet! For the final touch, Hunter grew more teeth and sharpened them.

Trixie was amazed to see an orange striped dragon in front of her now. Hunter was impressed himself. His new scales defined his muscles better than ever before, even as a fox. He raised his arms high and flexed them. "What do you think?" Trixie was speechless; she could barely get a sentence out. She finally yelled out, "You look amazing! Look at your scales! Your wings! Your muscles! I swear they're bigger than when you were a tiger!"

Hunter chuckled at her compliments. "If you think I look good, check this out!" He raised his head to night sky and flew fire to the stars. Trixie couldn't contain her excitement at such a site. She hugged Hunter tight feeling his warm but cool scaly muscles on his chest. "You are so amazing, Hunter," she said. "I'm glad I met you!" "I'm glad I met you too," replied Hunter. "How about we fly home?" Trixie nodded yes excitedly.

Hunter picked up Trixie to his pecs and Trixie wrapped her arms around his neck. "Don't worry," said Hunter, "I won't drop you!" Hunter spread his wings and squatted his thunderous legs. In a single jump, Hunter and Trixie were in the air riding the wind.

Troy immediately walked over to the barbell, and loaded it with as much weight as he could fit. 25 tons. These bars were meant for squats. The curling bard only went up to 5 tons. Not nearly enough to challenge two Gods. Then, he curled it with ease. "Well Troy, if that's what you're starting with, I think I'll play your game." The two muscular dragons started, and never stopped. 20 minutes later. "DONE!" Both dragons exclaimed simultaneously. "Okay, so the strength portion is a tie. Let's see whose muscles are bigger." The two flexed their behemoth muscles. Then, Lance took out a tape measure. "Hunter's biceps are... 42 inches. Troy's are... 42 inches. You're biceps are the same size." Lance said. "Okay, but how about our chests?" Troy asked. "Okay. Hunter's chest is... 103 inches. Troy. You're chest is 103 as well. It's another tie." Lance worryingly said. "Well. It seems we are equal. I honestly do not mind." Troy decided. "Actually, let's arm wrestle. That would be fun." "Okay Troy, let's do this." The two found a place to wrestle, clasped each other's hands, and began. Their biceps exploded to their full 42" and vascularity. Their biceps looked like a road map of veins. After 5 minutes, nothing happened, and the let go. "Wow, we really are equals." "Troy, that was fun." "Yeah. It was." The two muscle dragons left to go to the locker room to change back into their normal clothes.

"Troy!" Mary yelled. "One minute Mary." Troy responded. Soon, the two dragons were changed and reunited with the group. "How did you become so strong?" Mary asked. "Um, it's a long story." Hunter knew that he was going to admit to his God status. "I have an idea. One night, Trixie and I found a nice island. Let's go there." "Great idea Hunter."

The two dragons flew themselves and their friends to the island. "Okay, there's something the guys need to tell you three." Hunter said. Trixie knew what was coming. "Each of us are omnipotent Gods." "Well." Mary said. "That is awesome. My boyfriend is a God." "Same!" Alecia exclaimed. "I told Trixie a while ago," Hunter said. "Wait, if you three are Gods, prove it." Mary suggested. "Okay." Troy answered. First, Troy changed the cabin Hunter built on his last visit into a large mansion. Then, Hunter changed himself back into a tiger. Finally, Lance changed into a dragon. "Is this proof enough?" Hunter asked, while changing himself back into a dragon. "Yes. But, I have two requests." Trixie interjected. "First, seeing how we have a beautiful mansion here, why don't we all live here together. We're always together anyway. Plus, furnishing, internet and electricity could be magically created with our boyfriend Gods. Next, can you change me into a dragon too Hunter?" "Okay. I don't see why not." With a snap of a finger, Trixie transformed into a red dragon, complete with wings, tail, and draconic features. "Now I can get here anytime." "How about we all become dragons?" Lance suggested. "OKAY!" The others yelled. Soon, the island, now known as God's Island by the six, was inhabited by 6 dragons. "I can get used to this." Lance, the now grey dragon, said. He also changed himself to be as muscular as Troy and Hunter. "Wait." Alecia said. "I know in mythology, Gods sometimes disguise themselves as mortals to check on Earth. Do you have 'God Forms'?" "Now yet, but we an make them." Troy responded. "I think I know what they would be." Trixie started. "I think that your God forms should be like, 10 feet tall, really muscular, and glowing a gold color." "That works for me." Hunter said. Soon, he changed into that. He grew to 10 feet in height, doubled the size of his muscles, and changed his scales to a bright gold color. "Does this look God-ish?" He asked. "Yes." Everyone said. "I wonder how strong this form is." Troy broke in. "As strong as you want it to be." Hunter responded, as he reverted back to his "Mortal Form". "I personally wonder how strong this form is." "Let's find out." Lance suggested. The six dragons entered the mansion, and walked to the designated gym room. "First, magical equipment. This will let you set it to whatever weight you want." With a snap of Troy's fingers, equipment appeared. "First, let's bench." Troy walked over to the bench press, set the weight to 100 tons, and benched. "Okay, 100 tons is too easy." Troy bragged. "I could probably curl this in one hand." "Hey Troy, the machine seems to have a percent mode. That probably means a certain percentage of your max." Lance said. "Set it to 100" Troy beamed. Lance did, and Troy benched. He could only do one rep before feeling like his arms would fall off. "Wow, that's a new feeling. How much weight was that." "1000 tons." "Holy crap. I just benched 1000 tons? I'm stronger than I thought." "Anyway Troy, my turn." Lance said. "Wait Lance, the three of us are equally strong. So, we each should test an exercise." Hunter suggested. "That makes sense. Since Troy just went, I'll go with squat." "I'll do deadlift." "I'll wait."

The three muscle dragons worked out as their girlfriends watched. "Okay. We've compiled a list of all our results." Hunter quipped. "Here it is."

1 kt = 1000 tons.
Bench: 1 kt
Squat: 1.5 kt
Deadlift: 1.75 kt
Curling: 400 tons per arm. 800 tons using both.
Lats/Pull ups: 750 tons.
Abs machine: 50 kt
Running/Flying speed: Mach 3

Muscle Size Measurements:

Biceps: 42"
Chest: 106"
Waist: 45"
Thighs: 67"
Calves: 47"
Forearms: 34"

"Interesting. You're abs seem really strong." Alecia observed. "Yeah. When growing our muscles, it seems our abs became unnaturally strong in comparison to the rest of them." Troy added. "How much do you weigh." Mary asked. "1 ton of pure muscle." Hunter answered. "Our bodyfats are 0%." "I wish I was as strong as you Hunter." Trixie said. "Maybe I can train you one day." Hunter said.

The six left the Gym, and walked around the rest of the mansion. They chose their bedrooms, Trixie sleeping with Hunter, Alecia with Lance, and Mary with Troy. "This was a good day." Hunter laughed. "Yes it was. I love you Hunter. You may be a God, but you're my God." Trixie chuckled. "As a God, I can do whatever I want. But I never know what to do." "Maybe tomorrow, we can walk around the island and explore. Find a good place to make a pool." "That sounds fun Trixie. Anyway, good night." "Good night Hunter." Trixie fell asleep using Hunter's pecs as a pillow. Despite their diamond hardness, they were comfortable. The 7'7" dragon stretched his body, yawned, and fell asleep.

The next morning, Hunter woke up feeling different, but good. He got up, and did his morning routine. First was a quick flex in the mirror. That's when he noticed why he felt different. He looked bigger. Hunter made a tape measure appear, and measured his height. "8 feet exactly. When did I grow 5 inches?" Hunter wondered. He then measured his bicep. 51" In fact, all of his muscles were 20% bigger. Using his God mind, he calculated that he was two times stronger than yesterday, that he weighed 1.2 tons now, and that his bodyfat was negative somehow. "Trixie? Do you notice anything different about me?" Hunter yelled for Trixie. "Yes, you seem bigger. Also, liking the 12 pack." Trixie responded. "Do you know why I'm bigger?" "No." "Actually, Troy, Lance and I made a pact yesterday that if one of us grew, all of us would grow to the same size/strength. Something tells me that someone grew. Anyway, something else is weird. Somehow, my bodyfat is negative. I have a bodyfat percentage of -5%. I think Troy would know why."

"Troy, why is my bodyfat -5%, and what does that mean?" Hunter asked Troy. "Well, Lance wanted to see what would happen. Turns out that having negative bodyfat is amazing. While you were asleep, we learned that having negative bodyfat made our bodies literally indestructable, somehow. Take that knife, and try to stab me anywhere." Hunter did as he was told. He took the kitchen knife, and stabbed Troy in the abs, inbetween the the two columns of 6. The knife bent and broke, leaving no mark on Troy's body.
1141112111121121111211111111111111122121.title: Dragon Vs Dragon

1141112111121121111211111111111111122121.content:
"That's not the only thing too. Besides being pretty much indestructible, I felt no pain at all. On top of that,it made our muscles look even more ripped." Hunter noticed that Troy's abs looked much more vascular than yesterday. In fact, his whole body was covered with veiny bumps. "Wow, this is nice." Hunter added. He made a gun appear out of nowhere, and show himself in the head. (DON'T TRY AT HOME!!!! If you do, it's not my fault.) Sure enough, the bullet ricocheted off, despite having very little muscle where he shot. "Anyway, time for breakfast. What to have." Hunter s himself. "I think I want some eggs." Hunter walked over to the refrigerator and took out a full carton of eggs. He then cracked each one, and made a 12 egg omelet. That n cholesterol at once would be horrible for any normal person. But, Hunter was not normal. His metabolism converted the whole meal into pure muscle. "I've always wondered where the muscle I get from eating goes." Hunter said. "Abs. That's why ours are so much stronger than our other muscles." Troy explained. "Makes sense to me." Hunter added. "Anyway, this dragon has a romantic walk with his girlfriend scheduled for now."

"Hunter, is that what you're wearing for our walk?" Trixie commented. "What's wrong with it?" Hunter asked. He thought he looked fine. He was wearing a polo and cargo shorts. "Hunter, why would a muscular dragon need a shirt?" "Fair point." With a quick flex, the shirt was destroyed. "Better?" "Much. Let's go." The two dragons left the house, and started to walk through the woods of the island. "Trixie, remember how you wanted a pool. Well, I do too." All of the sudden, about 50 feet from the house, the ground changed into a giant swimming pool, equipped with diving boards, and a swim up bar. "Hunter, you never cease to amaze me." "Thanks." As the two continues their walk, they came across a river with a waterfall. "This is really pretty Hunter. How did you know this was here?" "I did a quick flyover of the island to find the perfect place to do this." Hunter knelt down on one knee and pulled out a small box. "Trixie Samantha Winfield. Will you marry me?" "Hunter. Could I say no? Of course." Hunter opened the box, and revealed a diamond ring with a large orange piece of garnet in the middle. Trixie put it on, and immediately hugged her fiancé. "Hunter, you're the best. How much was that ring?" "I shouldn't say. But if you want to know, it was $1,000,000." Hunter answered. "You really did not need to spend that much on me." "But I wanted to. Now, do you want to join me in the river?" "Sure." Hunter used his powers to set up chairs and towels, and to change their clothes into bathing suits. "Before we go in, I need to check something." Trixie said. He walked over to Hunter, and touched his abs. "What are you doing?" Hunter asked playfully. "Lay down please." Hunter did as he was told. "I'm seeing how deep you're abs go. I've always wanted to feel your abs. Plus, I'm comparing your abs to the diamonds I have in my hand." Trixie stuck her finger between the two columns of Hunter's abs, and observed how far it went in. "I can stick my whole finger into your abs?" Trixie gasped. "They are 4 inches deep." Hunter commented. "How hard are they though?" "Let's find out." Trixie took the diamond ring, put it next to Hunter's abs. Then, she compared their hardness. "I have concluded that your abs are harder than diamond." "Would you like to know how much harder?" Hunter asked condescendingly. "Of course." "Now, I promise that I am not exaggerating. My abs are the hardest things in the universe, aside from Lance's and Troy's abs. We're equal." Hunter explained. "God that's hard." "You rang?" Hunter joked. "You said God, and I am a God. Anyway, river time." The two jumped into the river, the cool water feeling incredibly refreshing. "This is nice. We need to remember this spot." Trixie said. "Oh definitely."

After an hour playing and relaxing in the river, the two got out, and dried off. "That was really nice. I'm glad you proposed to me. I was waiting for it." Trixie said. "How long?" "Since you told me you were a God." "Oh. Anyway, want to fly back to the house?" "Sure. Take it slow though. This is my first time flying myself." The draconic couple flapped their wings, and flew to the house. "This is easy!" Trixie laughed. "When transforming you, I made sure that flying would come naturally. I've heard learning to fly is horrible." "Thank you Hunter. You really are the best." "You're welcome Trixie." The two stopped in midair to hug and kiss each other. When they finished, Trixie asked, "If we're not flapping, why are we still in the air?" "Dragons can hover in place without flapping." "I really like being a dragon." "Wait, there's one other thing about being a dragon that you should know Trixie." With that, Hunter breathed a huge column of fire into the air. "How did you do that?" "Easy. First, concentrate on breathing fire. Then, let it rip." Trixie inhaled as much air as she could, and blew fire right at Hunter. "Are you okay?" "Perfectly fine. Dragons are fireproof." With that, Hunter blew fire at Trixie. "Hahaha. That tickles!" "Told you." With that, the two dragons landed on the roof of the mansion. "I set up a landing spot on the roof." Hunter said.

"Guys, Hunter proposed to me!" "Congratulations!" Everyone said. "I was waiting for the perfect time to propose to my perfect fiancé." "When's the wedding?" Mary asked. "We're still finding a date. My stepdad is very busy." "Well, congratulations Hunter." Troy said. "I think I know what this calls for." "What?" Hunter asked. "A celebration workout!" "Okay, I think the girls and I are going to go shopping." Trixie added.

"Okay. Since we made that pact, there's no point in competing." Troy said. "What do you want to do for you're celebration workout?" "How about taking a dip in the pool?" Hunter suggested. "What pool?" Lance asked. "The pool I made." Hunter answered. The three Gods walked into the backyard, and saw the massive pool Hunter made. "Hunter, this is amazing." Troy approved. "I especially like the bar." "You order, and your drink appears in front of you. No matter what it is." Hunter explained. "I'll show you." Hunter swam up to the bar. "I'll have a glass of orange juice." All of the sudden, a large glass of OJ appeared in front of Hunter. "Personally, I like it. And, if people who do not know about our God powers come, there will be a bartender in it." "Perfect. However, I'm not in the mood for a swim." Lance said. "How about a fly?" "That sounds fun. Where do you want to go?" "Let's see. Our little island is 5 miles outside of LA. I've never been to Chicago before." Hunter suggested. "Yeah. Chicago sounds fun." "Plus, with these, we can get there in under an hour." Troy beamed, while flexing his wings. "Let's change, and go."

5 minutes later. "Trixie, we're going to Chicago. We'll be home tomorrow." "Hunter, isn't Chicago really far away?" "2020 miles to be exact. Remember, I can fly at Mach 5? I can fly around the whole world in 8 hours, without tiring." "Okay. See you tomorrow." Beep. Hunter put his phone away. "Okay, got your stuff packed?" Hunter laughed. He didn't need to pack, he could just use his powers to get his stuff to Chicago. "Let's go!" The three dragons flapped their wings, and started flying to Chicago. 32 minutes later, the three landed. "What to do here?" Hunter asked. He used his powers to find all of the sites to see in the city. "I know." Troy interjected. "Let's go to Navy Pier!" The three flew to Navy Pier. Navy Pier had everything imaginable on it. A ferris wheel, many restaurants, attractions, theaters, and more. "Troy. Not to disapprove of your idea, but there's a lot to do here." "I'm hungry." Hunter interrupted. "Let's get something to eat." The three walked around until they saw a good seafood restaurant. "This place looks good." Troy said. The three entered the restaurant, got a table, and sat down.

After their lunch, they continued touring the pier. By dinnertime, they had covered most of the pier, when suddenly, they noticed something. A sign reading "Professional team bodybuilding. Make a team and try to win! Come to Fur's Auditorium for more information." "Team bodybuilding. Even with our unfair edge, that sounds fun." Hunter said. "Let's go." The three made their way to the auditorium.

"Hello, we're here to find out more information about the Team Bodybuilding." Hunter spoke to the fur running the event. He was a tall, built horse. However, not nearly as tall or as muscular as the three. "Certainly. Team Bodybuilding is where a team of up to 4 bodybuilders organize a performance showing off each person's muscles, posing proficiency, strength, and chemistry. Would you like to sign up?" The organizer asked. "We can't, but I think that we've just found a new profession. Thank you." Troy explained. "No problem. We have another competition in LA in 3 months." The organizer said. "We live in LA. That will be perfect. We'll get back to you on that." With that, the three dragons left, and checked into the best hotel in Chicago. Money was not an issue for the Gods, because they're Gods. They made it to their room, and immediately fell asleep.
1141112111121121111211111111111111122121.title: A Nice Sunday Walk

choices: The next morning.  Preparing for the team bodybuilding.
1141112111121121111211111111111111122121.content:
The three woke up, ate breakfast, and flew home. They made it back in half an hour. "How was Chicago?" Alecia asked. "It was really nice. We may have found something to do in three months." Troy answered. "What?" Mary chimed in. "Team bodybuilding. There's a competition in LA in 3 months." "Sounds right up you're alley." Mary chuckled. "Anyway, Hunter, you and me have a wedding to plan." "Right. See you later." Hunter and Trixie went up to their room.

"Now, do you want a big wedding, or a smaller one?" Asked Trixie. "I'm thinking of inviting as many people as we need. I don't really have much of a family, so it will be mostly yours." "Aw. It's okay. We don't need to have a big wedding. Plus, no one in my family knows I'm a dragon now. How would I explain that?" "Good point. Want it to just be the six of us?" "That works for me. We don't need anything too extravagant." "Just have a nice, low key wedding." "Let's do this."

One month later. "Hunter James Tusson, do you take Trixie Samantha Winfield to be your lovely wedded wife?" "I do." "You may kiss the bride." Hunter and Trixie shared a long kiss, as their friends applauded. "Let's eat!" Hunter yelled. Trixie changed into a more suitable dress, and the six flew to Verde's, a nice French restaurant. They decided that they would celebrate there. "Congrats lovebirds, or in this case, lovedragons." Troy congratulated. "I like the name Trixie Tusson. It works very well." Alecia stated.
