"Hello, and welcome to Verde's." The waiter interrupted. "I am Jacques, and I will be you're waited this evening. What would you like to drink?" "I think water for the whole table, and 2 bottles of champagne." Hunter said. "Anything else?" "No thank you." Lance said. "Your drinks will arrive momentarily." Jacques left. "Well, I'm glad that I'm married to my Hunter." "Maybe Lance will propose to me soon." Alecia joked. "I've known you for one month!" "I'm kidding." The three chatted for the rest of the meal. "You're bill sir." Jacques said, handing the bill to Hunter. "I'll take it." Hunter said. "Our meal cost almost $1000. But it was worth it." Hunter put his card on the check and waited. Soon, the six were out of the restaurant, and in the skies. "The next part of the celebration is a movie." Trixie yelled. "What movie?" "We'll find out." They landed in front of the movie theater, and entered. "How about Fur's in Space?" Lance asked. "Didn't it get really good reviews?" "Yes. 6 tickets for Furs in Space, please." The deer handed them their tickets, and sent them on their way.

3 hours later. "That was amazing. Time for sleep." Trixie said. The six flew to their private island, and landed on the roof of the mansion. "Good night guys!" Hunter yelled. "Good night." Then, the group split, each couple heading to their bedroom. In the newlywed's bedroom... "Hunter, I love you." "I love you too Trixie." Trixie hugged Hunter, barely getting her arms around Hunter's waist. "Goodnight." "Goodnight." With that, Trixie put her head on Hunter's massive pecs, and fell asleep. "I still don't understand how she thinks my pecs are a good pillow. They're hard as diamond. Whatever." And Hunter fell asleep a married man.
1141112111121121111211111111111111122121.title: The Wedding

choices: Continue because the character limit is too small.
1141112111121121111211111111111111122121.content:
"Good morning Hunter!" Trixie yelled. "Geez! I was sleeping. Why would you yell so loudly?" Hunter yawned. "Sorry, I'm just way too excited to Honeymoon. Do you have any ideas?" Trixie asked. "In fact, I do. Just, let me eat breakfast first." Hunter left his bedroom, and walked to the kitchen. For the first time, he walked into an empty room. "Where is everyone?" Hunter asked. "Still asleep. It's 6 A.M." Trixie responded. "Why would you wake me at 6?" Hunter grumbled. "Because, we should make sure our honeymoon lasts as long as possible." "Fine." Hunter approached the fridge, and decided to have a sweeter breakfast. He took out a large wedding cake, and ate the whole thing. "Hunter. How many calories was that thing?" Trixie gasped. "I don't know. Probably around 10,000. Don't worry, remember my metabolism? In fact, I feel it working right now." Hunter responded as he felt his muscles harden slightly. "There, all of it was converted to muscle. Anyway, ready for our honeymoon? I have a real treat for you." "Ready!" "Step outside, and get ready for the time of your life."

Trixie and Hunter walked to the large backyard of the mansion. "Sit down Trixie. You're God is about to get a whole lot Godlier, if that's a word." Trixie sat down, and watched as her husband transformed into his "God" form. Hunter grew two feet, evening out at 10 feet. Then, all of his muscles exploded to new proportions. His biceps grew from their original 51" to a staggering 95". His chest grew until his pecs jut out two feet in front of his 14 pack abs. His legs grew to become even stronger than before, which is quite impressive. Finally, his wings grew until his wingspan was 20 feet. Last, his orange scales switched to a bright golden color, and started to glow, energy emanating from his body. "Ready to travel the universe?" The God asked. "Yes. Where are we going." "I think the better question is where aren't we going. Hold my hand." Trixie grabbed onto Hunter's hand, and a large bubble formed around the couple. "This is so that you will survive in the cosmos. Anyway, Space Shuttle Hunter is ready to lift off. 3. 2. 1. Go." Hunter spoke as he started to flap his wings.

Soon, the couple was traveling at 50x the speed of light. Then, 100x. Soon, Hunter accelerated to infinite speed. "We have reached our first destination." Hunter said as he stopped in front of a large galaxy. "Ready to see the power of a God?" "Very." Hunter raised his hand, and the galaxy disappeared. All of the sudden, Hunter started to glow more. "Hunter? What's happening?" "I've taken the galaxy, and transferred some of the mass of it into my God form's muscle. The rest was sent into another dimension. Anyway, we have two options. You can see what the galaxy has done to my body, or we can create something to fill in where that Galaxy used to be." "Why not both?" Trixie responded as she flew up to Hunter's arm. Hunter knew exactly what to do. He flexed the God bicep, for his wife to feel. Trixie squeezed it as hard as she could, yet, she couldn't even dent one of his veins. Hunter's muscles were currently the hardest things in the universe. "Hunter, let's make a new galaxy." With that, Hunter waved his hand, and an entire galaxy appeared. It glowed the same red hue as Trixie's scales. "Trixie, this is your galaxy. Do you like it?" "How far away is it from home?" "50,000,000 Light years. We're at the edge of the universe." "Wow. How can I come back?" "Just ask me. Anyway, let's go to another universe." Trixie grabbed Hunter's hand, as they disappeared.

"Welcome, to a parallel universe!" "What's different about this universe?" "How about you find out." With that, Hunter and Trixie traveled to Earth, where they noticed a scrawny looking teenage tiger. "This universe is one where I never became a God." Trixie watched as other Hunter was beaten up in school, then abused by his cruel step-father. "Why would you show this to me on our honeymoon?" "Because you are the only person I trust enough to show this to. Plus, I want to make other me's life a bit better. I want you to decide how." "Okay, I think he should have a loving set of parents." With that, Hunter's old step-dad became a lovely set of parents, embracing Hunter, and tending to his bullying wounds. The old, torn-up house became a lovely suburban home. "I think he also deserves a little meat on his bones." "Okay, will do." With that, tiger Hunter's scrawny body was replaced with a toned, athletic build. His muscles were big, but not huge. He looked like a teenage natural body builder. "Nobody on this Earth will know of this Hunter's past life, and nobody will be mean to him ever again. Anyway, are you happy? You just improved the life of a sad child." "Thank you Hunter. It felt amazing to do something for someone else." "Anyway, onward to destination number 3." Trixie took Hunter's hand, as he teleported.

"Welcome, to our Earth, in 100 years." "Where are we?" "At our mansion. Do you see something strange?" "Yes, I see all six of us, and we do not look a day older than today." "The boys decided that it's unfair to have 3 immortals when six of us deserve it. So, we made you, Mary and Alecia immortal. Also, we have not decided what powers to give you yet. We want to give you powers, but it's tough to decide. I just wanted your immortality to be a surprise." "Wow. Hunter, I know I've said that you're the best, but I really mean it." "Thanks Trixie. Anyway, we have one more stop." "We've traveled through our universe, went to another universe, and traveled through time. How can you top that?" "I think I know. Hold on a minute." With that, the couple disappeared.

Hunter and Trixie reemerged in a bright, cloudy area. "Is this heaven?" "Yes. I want you to meet my parents." "Oh my God!" "Yes?" "Haha, very funny. Hunter, this is amazing." "Thank you." With that, Hunter and Trixie flew into a large room, with a plethora of Gods. There were dragons, leopards, rhinos, sharks, dogs, wolves, etc. There two gods for every animal. "Here we are. The way that the Gods work is that they have one child, which is the Demigod representing the species. Anyway, here are my parents." "Are you Trixie Tusson?" The female tiger asked. "Yes." "Well, our son could not have picked a better wife. You'll fit right in with the rest of the family." "Anyway, Mom, Dad, I hope you're not angry that I'm a dragon now." "Not at all Hunter." The male tiger said. "Hunter, the dragon look fits you really well. Anyway." He turned to Trixie. "Trixie, you might not know it, but your parents are here too." "Why are they here? Did they die?" "No." Hunter's mother assured. "They are over there." She pointed down the hall to the two foxes. "Trixie, you're a Demigod too." "Then why do I not have powers like Hunter?" "Why don't you ask them?" Trixie and Hunter flew over to the fox Gods. "Hi mom. Hi dad." Trixie said. "Trixie?" The male fox said. "Yes, it's me. My new husband, Hunter, took me here to meet his parents. He turned me into a dragon like him. Anyway, I have a question. If you are my parents, then why do I not have powers like Hunter?" "Trixie, you do not have powers for a simple reason." Her mother began. "It's because you have not developed them yet." "Hunter developed them when he was thirteen. What's taking so long?" "Well, the age you develop them is random. Hunter was lucky. Your friend Troy developed his when he turned 50. He then used them to look and have the body of a 21 year old. He still has it. Anyway, we know when your divine revelation will happen." "When?" "On your 35th birthday." Her father said. "Don't worry, it's your biological age. I'm aware that Hunter made you 21 indefinitely. In 14 years, you will have the same powers as Hunter." "Hunter, can you speed that up?" "That's the one power no God has. Sorry Trixie." The golden dragon responded. "Anyway, it was a pleasure seeing you Trixie. Also, tell Mary and Alecia that it's no coincidence Troy and Lance chose them. They're Gods in waiting too." Her mother said. "Bye mom, bye dad. When I have the power to, I will visit again." With that, the two dragons flew out of the hall. "Ready to go home?" Hunter asked. "I guess so." Trixie responded. With that, Hunter and Trixie disappeared.

The two dragons reappeared in the exact place they left from. As Hunter was reverting back to his Mortal form, he felt different. "Trixie, do you notice anything different?" Hunter asked. His face showed that he was actually confused. "Yes, I do. Your bigger again. Both in the muscle and height department." "I blame Lance." Hunter walked into the kitchen, where he saw Troy and Lance eating lunch. "Hey Hunter, where have you been?" Troy asked. "Honeymooning. I took Trixie to the edge of the universe, then to a parallel universe, then to us 100 years in the future, and finally, to heaven. Fun fact, we were destined to develop relationships with Trixie, Mary and Alecia. Soon, they will become Gods too. When is a mystery." Hunter responded. "Anyway, who became bigger?" "I'll admit, I saw a ship off the coast of the island, and it was heading right for us. I flew out and redirected it away. However, it was too heavy to move with our past musculature, so I grew in private and pushed it." Troy responded. "That's what we have our God forms for." Hunter jeered. "I forgot. Anyway, why are you complaining?" "I don't know. I feel like we're becoming so strong that it's not fun anymore. I have not found something to put this strength to use for." "We'll find something." Lance stated. "Anyway, I think we should test drive these new bodies." "Okay." Hunter smiled as they walked towards their basement.
1141112111121121111211111111111111122121.title: The Universe's Biggest Honeymoon

choices: The Gods figure out what they can do with their strength/powers.  Superhero time
1141112111121121111211111111111111122121.content:
"Okay, first, let's see what we can bench." Troy said, as he wandered to the bench press. He set the machine to 100%, and got under the bar. Troy used all of his might to lift that bar, and was able to crank out the one expected rep. Then, Troy used his powers to get rid of the muscle soreness. "How much did it say?" The gigantic blue dragon asked. "I'll tell you when it loads." Lance responded. "Accoring to this, you just benched 100 kt. Anyway, time for me to squat." The former rhinoceros yelled. He got under the bar, and did one hefty squat. When he put the bar down, it looked like Lance's thighs were going to explode. Just like Troy though, he used his powers to get rid of the soreness. "Lance, that squat net you a grand total of 150 kt." Hunter said. "Now its my turn." Hunter went over to the deadlift, and with perfect form, squatted with the weight. "Hunter, that was 175 kt." "Hmm. Not bad." "Not bad? I can't think of anything that heavy!" Troy gasped. "Airplane?" Lance inquired. "Nope, most can't take off with more than 500 tons." Hunter responded. "That's the weight of a large aircraft carrier." "Okay, can we get back to lifting?" The trio took turns trying each exercise, and found their maxes for each one:

Bench: 100 kt
Squat: 150 kt
Deadlift: 175 kt
Curling: 40 kt per arm. 80 kt using both.
Lats/Pull ups: 75 kt
Abs machine: 5 Mt (Megatons. 1,000,000 tons)
Durability: If not immortal, would be able to survive any kind of blast (Including supernova from 1 meter away)
Running/Flying speed: Mach 300

"So, we got 100x stronger since our last test?" Lance asked. "It seems so." Troy responded. "Let's see how big we are now!" The three pumped dragons walked over to the measuring machine, because tape measures are too impractical now. They got in, flexed every muscle they could, and came up with these measurements:

Biceps: 72"
Chest: 160"
Waist: 47"
Thighs: 100"
Calves: 80"
Forearms: 50"
Height: 9'0"
Weight: 3 tons
Bodyfat: -5%

"Our biceps are bigger than most people are tall. Is it just me, or is that awesome!" Troy yelled as he flexed a gargantuan bicep. "Troy, how heavy was that ship?" Hunter inquired. "100 kt." Troy responded, using his God mind to tell. "Well, now this makes more sense. I think this calls for a posing session with the girls." Lance stated. "I think you're right Lance." Troy and Hunter said simultaneously.

"Ladies, say hello to your new and improved boyfriends/husband!" Troy yelled as the three showed off their 6' biceps. "Guys, don't you think this is a bit much?" Mary asked. "We understand that you're Gods, but you need to pretend that you're mortal to blend in. "Well, this can be between us." Hunter laughed as he bounced his mega pecs. "But, I think Mary's right. We should try to look more like mortals." Lance muttered. "Fine." Troy grumbled. The three muscle dragons shrunk down to their 8' tall forms. (Their measurements are in the chapter Dragon vs. Dragon) "We may have to look like mortals, but we don't have to be as weak as them, no offense." Lance yelled. "We're going to keep our current strength levels. Anyway, we have a show to prepare for." With that, the three dragons flew off into the clouds.

The three Gods landed in the deserted forest behind the house. "Okay. We need a show showing off our muscularity, strength and chemistry in an interesting way. Any ideas?" Lance asked. "How about acting out a story?" Troy responded. "Sounds fun, but none of us are actors." Lance said. "Aren't you forgetting that we're Gods? We can make ourselves amazing actors!" Hunter said while flexing all 12 of his abs. "I'm thinking a western. One of us is the sheriff, one is a bank robber, and the other one is a local hero." "That sounds fun! Anyway, we need three aspects. First, posing." "We can have a pose off between the robber and the sheriff, to try and intimidate the others. Then, when the hero arrives, he'll pose and show off his muscles." Hunter said while bouncing his pecs. "Hunter, I'm guessing that you want to be the hero." "Sure. I'm thinking Troy will be the sheriff, and Lance will be the robber." "Why am I the robber?" "I feel like you'll be better at the role than Troy. Anyway, not to be self-centered, but for this, the hero should have larger muscles than the others. That way, it really shows his heroicness. (it's in the dictionary)" "That makes sense. But, what about our pact?" "We can pause it for when we are on stage, then when it's over, I'll shrink down." "Perfect. Now, let's get script writing." "Wait, how do we show off strength?" "The sheriff and robber can try to hurl things at each other. Boulders, buildings, cars, etc. Then, when the hero comes in, the robber will use his gun, and try to shoot the hero. The bullets will bounce off my body, and I'll save the day." "Perfect. Now let's write the script."

Many hours later. "Guys, dinner's ready. I ordered pizza." "Coming. We were writing." The three Gods entered the kitchen, and saw a mountain of pizza boxes. "Well, this is a lot of pizza." "Well, we know how much food muscle monsters like you need. We got you one of each variety of pizza. It's 30 pies. We're splitting our own. Those 30 are for you." "How much did this cost?" "Does it matter? You're Gods. If we need money, just add zeroes to our bank account. It's not difficult for you." "Good point. Let's dig in." 30 pies and 16000 calories (Per God) later, they were full. "That was good. Now, back to our writing." Lance said as the three dragons' muscles got noticeably larger. "Their metabolism sure does them justice." "Yeah. But my pec pillow is starting to get too big." "Don't worry Trixie, you'll find another muscle to sleep on."
1141112111121121111211111111111111122121.title: Preparing for the Show

choices: Learn more about this ultra-God power
Reader's choice.  I can't think of anything to put here.
1141112111121121111211111111111111122121.content:
"Name?" A kangaroo asked the 3 dragons. "The Good, the Bad, and the Strong." Hunter responded. "Here's your number." The kangaroo handed Hunter a tag that said 18. "When it is called, you go on stage, perform, and wait for your results." "Thank you." Hunter walked towards Troy and Lance, saying, "Okay, we're 18th. Am I big enough to show a difference from a distance?" Hunter asked. "Yes. Don't worry." Lance said. Lance and Troy were in their 8' form, whereas Hunter was 8'5. Another key difference was that Hunter's muscles were 20% bigger than Troy's and Lance's. Their biceps were 42", whereas Hunter's were 51". "Okay. Let's do this." The three sat in the waiting room. There, they saw a whole assortment of furs. There were lions, wolves, bears, zebras, elephants, and more. Plus, all of them were very muscular. Some were even bigger than the three dragons. A fact that changed very quickly. "Guys, I know it sounds like cheating, but I saw a bull out there with 45" guns. I'd say that Troy and I should grow until we're the largest ones here, then wipe memories of our former sizes. Deal?" Lance asked. "Sounds good to me." Troy responded. "Okay." Hunter said. Immediately, Troy and Lance grew to 8'4", with 46" biceps. "Hunter, you're still noticeably bigger, don't worry." Troy assured. "Number 18!" The voice on the loudspeaker said. "That's us." Lance beamed. "Let's go." Troy yelled. The trio got set and the music started playing.

First, Lance ran onto the stage, only wearing a train robbing bandanna, a cowboy hat, and his posing trunks, and carrying a bag with a dollar sign on it. "Hold it right there criminal!" Troy shouted from offstage. He flew on, wearing a cowboy hat, a sheriff badge glued to it, and his trunks. "That money belongs to the town, not you." "What are you going to do about it sheriff? Fight me. Look at these!" Lance yelled as he put the money down to strike a double bicep pose. Each vein on each muscle was clearly visible. "Think you can handle that?" "Actually, I think I can." Troy bounced his pecs as he copied Lance's pose. However, he finished off with a tricep flex, showing off the horseshoe shaped muscles. "See this baby?" Troy asked as he pointed to his arm. "There's nothing you can do to scare me when I have this around." "Well, how about this!" Lance shouted as he took a car from offstage, and hurled it at Troy. The audience gasped with fear, but Troy stopped it with one hand. "Is that the best you can do?" Troy laughed, as he took the car, broke it in half, and compacted the pieces of it into small cubes. "This was your big weapon?" "No, it's all that i could find. This town doesn't have much in it." Lance said, as he reached for his bag. "However, I do have a trick up my sleeve." Lance reached into the bag, and pulled a pistol out. "NOT SO FAST." Hunter yelled. His body silhouetted in the back. "I can't let you get away with this." "Well too bad." Lance yelled. He took the pistol, and fired straight at Hunter. Surprisingly, to the audience, the bullet just plinked off his muscles. "You're going behind bars, strong enough to hold you." "Oh yeah?" Lance yelled as he took more shots at Hunter. Again, the bullets plinked off. "I've caught you red-handed. You're done for." "You've got me this time, but never again. I'll be back." Lance swore, as he was carried off stage by Hunter. "How can I ever repay you?" Troy asked. "You don't. Beating criminals is all the reward I need." Hunter said as he flexed a most magnificent body, and flew off stage. The crowd went nuts.

One hour later. "And the winner is.... The Good, The Bad, and The Strong!" Hunter, Lance and Troy flew back on stage to receive their prize. One million dollars per participant. "Thank you. I would like to thank my wife for being so supportive, and my parents, for supplying me with the genetics to have a body like this." Hunter cried. Troy and Lance also gave thank you's, but they were pretty much the same as Hunter's. "FLEX! FLEX! FLEX!" The audience chanted. "Well, if you insist." The three dragons got into a position that showed off their biceps, triceps, abs, pecs and legs perfectly. "Thank you, and good night."

Later. "I'd say that went well." Hunter laughed as he shrunk down to Troy and Lance's size. "Yeah. Our powers certainly helped." Troy laughed. "When don't they." Lance cackled, as the three sat in the gym in the mansion. "I don't know about you guys, but I think I want a good run." Troy said. "I haven't had one in a while." "Where?" "I have an idea." Troy said. "Follow me." Troy walked outside into the night. He took off, Hunter and Lance closely behind. Within seconds, they were in space, and within one hour, were on the surface of the moon. "Why are we on the moon Troy?" Hunter inquired. "This is a pit stop. I actually want to go to deep space, but I want to fly. So, we need our God forms. I just did not want to change into it at night, while people were awake and could see the glow." "Ah. Okay." With that, the three Gods transformed into their golden 10 foot God forms. "Now follow me." Troy said. Troy levitated up, and flew off at the speed of light. Lance and Hunter followed suit. Soon, they accelerated to 10000 light years per second. After a minute, they were in intergalactic space. "Here we are." "What is here?" Hunter asked. "The location of the gravity gym." Troy then created a light year long, wide and high cube. "Teleport into it." Troy said. The three teleported in. "Now, revert out of your God form, and say hello." Troy turned on the lights, and a large gym filled with equipment and a running track emerged. "Now, the neat thing about this gym is that you can change the gravity in it. Right now, it is set for 10000 times Earth's. So, one pound in here, is 5 tons on Earth. Now, let's run." Troy set the gravity to normal, and the three dragons ran on the track. It had scenery produced by God powers, so it felt like a real run. "I'd say, we run for 1,000,000 miles, then, we crank up the gravity." Troy suggested. "Even with our speed, 1,000,000 miles would take a couple of hours." "True. How about 500,000?" "Much better." The three dragons, running at mach 270, or 207,163 mph, felt very alive. It's been a while since they just ran for the sake of running. Plus, their 50" calves needed something to do. "What's your heart-rate?" Hunter wondered. "30 BPM." Lance answered. "That's pretty slow." "Well, this isn't exerting much energy. That's the only slow thing about me." "True." "Ready for 500,000 miles with 50,000 times gravity?" Troy asked. "Let's do this." Troy set the gravity to 50k, and they continued running. However, their speed slowed from mach 270, to mach 3. "Okay. Not 500,000. 5,000 miles. Fair?" "Yes." "Okay."

5 hours in the gym later. "That was fun." Troy said as he reset the gravity to normal Earth. "Yeah. I like gravity training." Hunter panted. "Wow, I've since I became a God, nothing has ever fatigued me, except for that." "Yeah, but our legs are super pumped. I think I know what this calls for. A God's arm wrestle." The three smiled as they transformed into their God forms, replacing any fatigue with pure energy. "First, me and Hunter." Lance said. An arm wrestling station was added to the gym. "The battle of the Gods has begun!" Troy yelled as the two golden dragons arm wrestled. Troy decided to be the announcer. "Hello, I'm Troy, and welcome to the holiest arm wrestle in history! We have two Gods of pure strength duking it out. You can see their pain. Oh, and look at those biceps. Am I seeing 95" of solid muscle? I am. Wow, these two are evenly matched. Neither of their arms have moved at all. Plus, with their stamina, it doesn't seem like they will. Let's change things up a little then." With that, Troy upped the gravity from earth's to 1,000,000,000,000 times Earth's. "The gravity in here is enough to be a black hole. Good thing nothing outside of this is effected by its interior gravity. And look, no straining from either of our competitors. However, I am seeing something extraordinary!" As soon as Troy said that, Hunter and Lance started glowing white. "I think we need more gravity. Let's set it to infinite!" Troy set the gravity to the highest setting, the gravity caused by the mass of the universe being compressed into the size of a singularity. The two Gods (and now Troy) started glowing even brighter, white flames erupting from their skin due to the energy. "Look at this. Guys, stop the fight, I need to examine you." Hunter and Lance let go of each other. "Guys, I think with that arm wrestle, and my changing of gravity, we've transcended the realm of God. We're too powerful to be called Gods now. We are the rulers of the universe." "Stop messing with us Troy." Hunter quipped. "No really, did you hear what I said? The gravity in here is infinite! And we're glowing white. Look at me!" Hunter's mouth dropped as he looked at Troy. He was glowing white, with while flames coming out of him. "Check our measurements." Troy yelled as he set the gravity back to Earth's. "Okay. Here they are." Lance gasped.

Height: 25'
Weight: 1 kt.
Biceps: 300"
Chest: 800"
Waist: 100"
Thighs: 500"
Calves: 400"
Muscle Density: Black Hole
Muscle Strength: Infinite

"Guys, we did it. We're pretty much super Gods now." "What does that mean?" "Anything that we could not do before, we can do now." "Like what?" "I have an idea." Hunter, Lance and Troy teleported to an alternate dimension. "This is a different universe. Correction. This was a universe." With that, Hunter did nothing. However, the entire universe became a swirling vortex of matter, which compressed, and exploded in front of the Gods. "Well, you just destroyed an entire universe by staring at it." "Yes I did. That's the extent of our power."
1141112111121121111211111111111111122121.title: The Show

choices: The 6 go to Troy's gravity gym to do some testing.
The 6 fly around the world, looking for things to do.
1141112111121121111211111111111111122121.content:
"What else can we do?" Troy asked, flexing a 300" bicep. "Well, we have 3 forms. Mortal, which is our weakest, god, which is our golden one, and now this, which I'm calling Super God." Lance answered. "I think I get it." Hunter exclaimed. "Our mortal forms can alter the Earth, and individual things. My God form was able to destroy and create galaxies. I think this one can control entire universes!" "I see. That's how you destroyed this galaxy." Troy confirmed, as he looked around at the literal nothingness. "Well, I think whatever our God form can't do, this can." Lance said. "Like make other people Gods?" Hunter asked. "Let's try it out. But first, I want to try something." Lance waved his hand, and the galaxy that Hunter destroyed returned. "Let's play a game." Just then, Lance compressed the universe into a ball the size of a beach ball. "Play ball!" Lance threw the universe to Troy at speeds light would call fast. "How hard did you pitch that?" "Probably around 100 light years per second." "Anyway, what are the rules of Universe ball?" Troy asked. "Well, we throw the ball at each other, and the first one not to catch it loses." "Seems simple enough. Go long." Troy took the universe, and threw it. "Hunter, you're next." "Troy, where did you throw it?" "It's probably around 1,000,000 light years away by now." "Got it!" Lance yelled, as he returned to the others. "Hunter, time for you." Lance took the ball, and threw it directly at Hunter's abs. "Lance, why?" Hunter asked after being hit. "I thought I would catch you off guard." "Whatever. I think we need to go to Heaven to see what exactly happened." "Okay." The three Gods reset the universe, and disappeared.

"Mom? Dad? I have a question." Hunter proposed. He was currently in his 10 foot golden God form. "What is it Hunter?" "Troy, Lance and I were working out in these forms, trying to see what they could do. Eventually, the three of us transformed into this." With that, Hunter transformed into his white Super God form. "Do you have any ideas why?" "No, but we need to speak to the other gods. Now." The two tigers got up from their thrones, and walked into the hall. "Troy? Lance? Where are you?" Hunter asked. "Right here." The two other dragons flew over to Hunter. "My parents were stumped. What about yours?" "Yep. Their meeting with the other Gods." "Speaking of which, their coming back." "Hunter, Troy, Lance. We have something to tell you." A golden human stated. "I am the lord of Heaven. All of these Gods work for me. A long time ago, I foresaw 3 young Gods transcending their Godliness, becoming, as you call them, Super Gods. These Super Gods were supposed to have power beyond any other of the Gods, including myself. If you truly are these Gods, then prove it to me." "Okay, follow us." Hunter said. Hunter, Lance and Troy disappeared. The human God shortly after.

"We've been experimenting with our power in this universe." "First, we should show you our adopted forms." Hunter transformed into his normal 8'5" form. "This is what we normally use when walking around on Earth." Then, he transformed into his golden form. "We created this form to look more Godly when using the full extent of our powers, at the time." Finally, Hunter transformed into the new white form. "Finally, when the three of us were working out in our golden forms, we transformed into this form. We have no idea why though." "What can you three do in this?" The human asked. "Well, we played a game we call universe ball." "We took this universe, shrunk it down to the size of a beach ball, and played catch. Whoever dropped it first lost. I made it!" Lance explained. "Yeah, but I won." Troy interjected. "Can you show me?" The human asked. "Sure." Hunter waved his hand, and the universe shrunk down to the size of a beach ball. "Can I try to hold it?" "Well, it's still as heavy as the universe, so if you can." Hunter took the ball, and handed it to the human. He could see the human struggling to hold it. Hunter immediately took it back, and held it on one hand. "Troy, go long!" Hunter threw it as hard as he could. Troy then bolted off after it. One minute later, Troy returned, holding the ball. "How far did you just travel?" The human wondered. "Well, if the universe still was a universe, then it traveled the distance of it's edge and back around 50 times. Otherwise known as 2.5 trillion light years. That's a new record for us." "I think the prophecy has finally come true. You are the Super Gods of the prophecy." "What does that mean for us?" Lance asked. "Well, you three have powers that no other God has. You can transform others into Gods, and control the multiverse." "We get that, but did that prophecy say anything about what we would do with that power?" Troy asked. "It did not. People say that Gods have limitless power. However, there are limits. We cannot let others become Gods. Your powers are the only that are truly limitless. The only thing you can't do is lose you power, die, or get hurt. Before you transcended, we could have taken away your powers if we saw you as unworthy. Now, we have no power over you. In fact, you have power over us. You are Gods of the Gods." The human explained. "Now, could you put this universe back?" "Sure." Lance said as he threw the ball. This time, it exploded into stars, nebulae and galaxies. "Now, let's go back to heaven." After that, the four Gods disappeared.

"Hunter, Troy, Lance. You three have an important choice." The human said to the trio, still in their Super God forms. "You can either stay here in Heaven, and rule over the Gods and the multiverse, or you can go back to Earth, and live out the lives you had before. "Can we talk it over for a bit?" Troy asked. "I'm in no position to say no." "Fair point." The three white dragons walked over. "I feel like I'd prefer to live on Earth. There's so much to do. That, and I think with our powers, we could be superheroes!" Lance said. "I agree with Lance. We have our relationships and our legacies on Earth." Troy agreed. "I agree too, but we should still do something with this power. I think that we should rule from Earth. Every once in a while, check up with Heaven." Hunter suggested. "That can work." Lance agreed. The three dragons approached the plethora of Gods. "We're going to stay on Earth. One day every month, we will check up here, and make sure everything is in order." Hunter proposed. "Perfect. See you three in one month." With that, the three white dragons disappeared.

"Trixie, there's something I need to show you." "What is it Hunter?" "Just come outside." The 8'5" dragon flew outside with his wife. Immediately, he transformed into his golden God form. "Troy, Lance and I decided to test the limits of this. We found something unexpected." With that, Hunter turned white. "Hunter? What's happening?" Trixie trembled. As soon as she said that, his muscles exploded, tripling in size. He also grew to 25' tall. While light poured out of his body, leaving a white aura around him. "We've become Super Gods. This is our strongest form." With that, he laid down on the ground, his head resting on a tree. "Trixie, come here." She immediately flew onto his abs, and stood up. She couldn't see his head over the pecs. Rather than fly onto the pecs, she just laid down on the 24 pack. "We have power over the multiverse. Any power that I did not have before, I have now. Because of that, you tenure as a mortal is over. Now, I need you to fly with me." She flew up into the sky, with Hunter following her. After they reached one mile in height, they stopped. "Ready to become a goddess?" "Yes." Hunter turned towards Trixie, and blew a large column of white fire at her. This fire burned hotter than the sun, but it did not affect Trixie at all. After a minute, Hunter stopped. Trixie emerged from the fire, and started to glow. "What should I do first?" "Well, Lance, Troy and I all have God forms. How about you make one for yourself. Also, they are doing this to Mary and Alecia too." "Okay." Hunter shrunk down to his normal God form, and helped Trixie. Soon, she grew to 10 feet tall, gave herself an athletic build, and changed her scales to a similar golden color. "A god finally gets his Goddess." The two kissed, and slowly descended from the clouds. The two Gods came to greet the others. "Look at me!" Trixie yelled to the other four dragons. "Yeah, Troy turned me into a goddess just now." "Same with me." Alecia added. "I think the six of us should all transform into our God forms, and hang out as Gods." Hunter suggested. "Okay!" Soon, the room was populated by six 10 foot tall golden dragons. "What should we do now?" "Well, it's our first time in this form, let's see what it can do!" Mary suggested.
1141112111121121111211111111111111122121.title: The Gods of Gods

choices: Continue because the character limit is mean to me.
1141112111121121111211111111111111122121.content:
"I know the perfect place to train you three in the ways of Godliness." Troy realized. "Follow me." The six dragons walked out of thee mansion, and started to fly. The girls were used to flying behind the Gods, because the Gods were so much faster than them. This was the first time they were able to keep up. After a minute of flying, they were passing Jupiter. "Okay, now let's pick up some speed." Mary said telepathically. The six accelerated to trillions of times the speed of light. Soon, they were almost 100,000,000 light years away from Earth. "Here we are." Troy said as he stopped. The girls were confused. "There's nothing here." Alecia questioned. "Yet." Troy smirked. He waved his hand, and a large structure appeared. "This is our private gym. One that only the six of us can use. However, the only draw is that you have to fly there. That's how I was able to make sure it was incapable of being seen from Earth in all ways. Anyway, let's go in." The six disappeared, teleporting into the structure.

"Welcome!" Troy yelled. "This place is huge!" Trixie marvelled at the gym. There were machines for every muscle group imaginable, a large track for running and flying, a swimming pool, and a strange looking wall monitor. "What's the monitor for?" "It's to change how strong the gravity is in here. We can make it stronger, and harder to lift things." Troy explained. "At one point, Lance and I arm wrestled, to see how these forms matched against each other. However, these forms have infinite strength. So we set the gravity to that of if the mass of the universe was converted into the singularity of a black hole. In essence, infinite gravity. That caused us to transform into the Super Gods." "Well, the two infinities clashing probably caused that." Mary suggested. "Makes sense to me. Anyway, ready to learn what these powers are good for?" Lance asked. "Ready!" The three girls yelled simultaneously. "Okay, everyone pair up." Hunter yelled. "Let's train Trixie." "I'm ready." Trixie assured.

"Okay. First, change into your normal mortal form. We'll be training that first." "Okay." Hunter immediately shrunk down to a modest, in comparison to his 10 feet, 8'5". Trixie did the same, however, her height was closer to 6'. "First thing is first, try to grow to my height." Trixie thought about Hunter's height, and she shot up to 8'5". 'Perfect, now, change to whatever height you'd think is nice for you." "Okay." Trixie shrunk down to around 7'3". "Next is your build. Your mortal form seems to have a slim build. Try bulking up a bit to a more athletic looking one." Trixie did just that, her muscles bulking slightly. She looked strong, but not like a hulk. That was Hunter's job. "Perfect. You look fantastic. Now, this is your new mortal form. Whenever you are out in public, stay in this form. If something comes up where you need to use your God form, make sure nobody sees you transform. I would say stop time, but only the God form can control time. In your mortal form, you can control people's emotions, feelings, strength, bodies, memories, etc. You can also change objects into whatever you want. The God form allows manipulation of space time. It allows manipulation on a much larger scale, like me making your galaxy. My Super God form is able to manipulate entire universes with a blink of an eye, but I do not believe you are able to achieve that. We met with the head God of Heaven, and he said only 3 gods could become Super Gods, and prophecies are unchangeable." "It's okay. Anyway, what's next?" "Using your powers to change something other than yourself. Try changing my height." "Okay." Trixie concentrated on Hunter, trying to grow him. Soon, Hunter grew to 9' tall, with all of his muscles growing in proportion. "I decided the muscles had to change too." "Okay." Hunter responded as he shrunk back down to his normal 8'5". "Now, time to test manipulation of objects. Try to make anything appear out of thin air." "Okay." All of the sudden, a bench press appeared. "I made this, I did not move it." "Why a bench?" "We're in a gym, I thought it made sense." "I guess." Hunter laughed. "Anyway, since we have a bench, now I'm going to become a fitness trainer. God's mortal forms are much stronger than normal mortals. It's time to see your physical potential." Trixie layed down on the bench. "Okay, I'm setting the bench to your max. All you need to do is pull off one rep. Now, the number may be smaller than mine, but that's because I've been a God much longer than you. You will strengthen over time." "Let's do this." Trixie grabbed the bar, and benched the bar. She struggled a bit, but that was expected. It was set to her one rep max. With a little boost from Hunter, she completed the rep. "That was hard." "I never said this would be easy. For a person I've never seen work out, you have amazing form." "I've watched you work out. A lot." "True." The muscular dragon laughed. "Okay, the machine says that you benched about 50 tons. To give you some perspective, I weigh close to 3 tons of muscle, and my biceps are 46" big. I can bench 200,000 tons. However, this is your first time exercising as a God. Mu first time, I could bench around that too, and I was much bigger. I sense much potential in you." Hunter smirked. "Thanks. Anyway, my arms hurt." Trixie complained. "Not anymore. I've gotten rid of muscle soreness and fatigue for this workout. That way, your maxes can be found as quickly as possible, and we can get to the more important parts of your training." Hunter ranted. "Anyway, let's get this show on the road."

One hour later. "Okay, you're a very strong Goddess. You squatted 100 tons, deadlifted around 120 tons, curled 40 tons in each arm, and was able to perform a lovely pull up with 75 tons of extra weight. Nice. Anyway, unlike me, you have not had the chance to really develop your body. Mine was developed through the frequent contests I would have with Lance and Troy, as well as the bodybuilding competitions. You'll figure out a way. Anyway, you weigh around 500 pounds, most of which is muscle. But that aside, it's time for the next part of your training. God mode. Switch into your God form." Hunter demonstrated by transforming into his. The now 10' muscle beast looked as his wife transformed into her form. With her eyes finally at eye level, Hunter said, "Now that we're the same height, I now realized how beautiful your eyes are." "Thanks." Trixie blinked her hazel eyes, while Hunter gazed with his sea blue ones. "Anyway, try to stop time for everything but you and me." "Okay." Trixie concentrated, but it seemed like nothing happened. "Nothing happened." Trixie muttered. "Are you sure. Follow me." Hunter started to fly. trixie followed him to where Lance and Alecia were training. Lance was frozen in place, trying to spot Alecia while she was doing her pull up. "Are you sure nothing happened?" Hunter laughed. "I just stopped time!" Trixie proclaimed. "Anyway, unfreeze it." Trixie waved her hand, and Alecia finished her rep. "Where did you come from?" Lance yelled. "We were practicing time manipulation. Trixie stopped time, but she wasn't sure that she was successful. We came over here and saw you frozen. She's learning fast." Hunter explained. "Congrats!" The now smaller Lance roared. "Thank you. How's Alecia doing?" "Very well. We just took a bit more time than we thought we would with the making things appear. We got carried away a bit." With that, Lance pointed at a large pile of random objects. There were chairs, a t.v, a couple of water bottles, and even a 5 foot tall teddy bear. "Well, I'll leave you two doing what your doing. We have more work to do." Hunter and Trixie flew back to their spot. "Okay, your final task is different. Time manipulation is the only new thing. However, I have one last task for you. Take me to your galaxy I made for you." "Okay." Then, the couple disappeared.

The pair of spouses reappeared near a large red galaxy. "Here it is Hunter." Trixie proclaimed telepathically and proudly. "Okay, now I need you to create a new galaxy next to it. I think that's a good test." "With pleasure." Trixie jokingly cracked her knuckles as she started to form a galaxy next to her's. Then, she made it have a slight orange glow. "This is your galaxy Hunter." "Thank you. Anyway, time for my work." Hunter then made the two galaxies collide. The orange and red mixed, and formed a swirl of the two colors. "Just like us, the galaxies are married." "Aw!" Trixie cooed as they had an intergalactic kiss. Then, the two returned to the Gym.

"Did we miss anything?" Hunter asked Lance and Troy, both of whom were in their golden God forms. "Besides a double marriage proposal, both of which were answered with yes, no." Troy joked. "You two are getting married. About time. I was feeling lonely being the only husband in the group." Hunter laughed. "Yep. Just like you, It's going to be low key." Lance said. "We're joking. We're having it in Heaven." Troy corrected. "Well, that's certainly something. Anyway, how did your training go?" "Mary got the hand of omnipotence pretty quickly!" Troy said. "The only issue is that she refuses to stop creating flowers in the Gym. At this rate, the gym will become a greenhouse!" "How about Alecia." "Besides the aforementioned pile of random stuff, she was perfect!" "I took Trixie into space and had her create a galaxy as a final test. Did you guys have final tests?" "I made Mary reverse the gravity so that we were walking on the ceiling." "I made Alecia travel to an alternate universe." "Those work." "Anyway, I'd say this was a success. Let's go home."
1141112111121121111211111111111111122121.title: Learning from the Best

choices: Wake up, and fly around the world, searching for problems to fix.
Wake up to find Trixie wanting another workout.
1141112111121121111211111111111111122121.content:
Meanwhile, on the fly home. "Hunter? Could you stop for a minute?" Trixie asked. "Sure, why?" "I see this really pretty thing near us." Hunter turned around, and noticed the Eagle Nebula. (Look it up, it's really cool.) "That is pretty, almost as pretty as you Trixie." "Oh Hunter, come here!" The two hugged each other, as they explored the nebula. They flew through the Pillars of Creation and the Spire. "Hunter, can I ask you something?" "Sure." The golden dragon answered. "I know it seems weird to be asking you this now, but I have not had a private posing session in a while. I want to see you're muscles in action." "In which form?" "This one." "Right now?" "Yes." "Okay, fly back a bit." The golden dragon used his powers to give all of his muscles a big pump. "Ready?" "Yes." The first thing Hunter did was flexed his biceps. They rose to a huge 95" peak. "This bicep is almost 8 feet around. Would you like to feel?" "Is that even a question?" Trixie answered as she drifted towards the bicep. She wrapped her arms around it, but nothing she did could even dent the arm. "Even with my infinite strength I cannot dent my bicep." Hunter smirked. "Ready for the next one?" "YES YES YES!" Hunter let go of his flex, and started to bounce his pecs. Then, he flexed the chest. "This is what a 250' chest looks like." Then, he flexed his 16 pack abs. "Only in God forms can abs exceed 12, like mine." Then, he flexed his 150" thighs. "These legs could kick a galaxy apart. Finally, he flexed his 125"calves. "These let me run across the whole universe in minutes. Anyway, ready to go home?" "Not quite. There's one more thing." Trixie and Hunter flew towards a star, many light years away from home and the nebula. "Can you use your physical strength to destroy a star?" "We can find out." The golden dragon dove into the star. Hunter tried to swim through the plasma, getting all the way to the core. He thought he would just punch the core, but it was made of plasma too, and punching plasma just doesn't work.

5 minutes later, the star exploded in a massive nova. Hunter flew out of the explosion towards Trixie. "I figured it out. Somehow, me breathing fire overheated the star to the point of collapsing. Anyway, let's get home." The lovebirds, or lovedragons, (I made that joke already, but I don't care!) flew back to their island home, changed back to their mortal forms, and slept. It may have been the first time in Earth's history that two Gods shared a bed.
1141112111121121111211111111111111122121.title: Continue because the character limit is mean to...

choices: While in the air, they meet up with Troy and Mary
While in the air, they meet up with Lance and Alecia
1141112111121121111211111111111111122121.content:
"Blarg!" Hunter yelled as he stretched his massive arms. "Rise and shine my big God." Trixie greeted. Trixie always got up before Hunter. She was in her gym gear, a sports bra and shorts. It showed off her athletic physique very well. "I want to work out, but I need my trainer." "Trixie, I just woke up!" Hunter laughed. "Give me some time!" "Okay. I'll meet you in the gym." Trixie ran off, presumably to warm up. Hunter changed into his gym shorts, and met Trixie in the gym. "Look at who decided to show up!" Trixie teased. "Okay Trixie, what are you working out today?" "I don't know." Trixie answered. "Well, when working out, you devote a day to a specific area. It's best for the muscles. I'd know." Hunter explained as he flexed a veiny 46" bicep. "Speaking of biceps, how about arms?" Trixie suggested. "Perfect, we'll do upper body. Have you warmed up?" Hunter asked. "Yes. I looked up how." "Okay, I believe you." Hunter checked using his powers just to make sure. He knew the consequences of working out without the proper warm up. "Okay, the real question is why you are working out. Do you want to be more toned, more muscular, or stronger?" Hunter asked. "Stronger." Trixie replied. "Okay." The pair walked over to the bench. "Now, getting stronger is not easy." Hunter started. "Good thing we're Gods. One thing I've learned as a God is that in our mortal forms, workouts are 1000 times more effective than normal mortals. So in one workout, you will become 1000 times stronger than a mortal would if they used the same exact routine. With that, the first exercise I want you to do is bench. You will be doing 8 reps at the weight I set for you. It may not be easy, but it will be effective." Trixie laid down on the bench, and put her hands on the bar. Hunter set the percent to 85%, and stood behind the bar, ready to spot. "Go." Trixie picked up the bar, and benched it for eight reps. By the eighth rep, Hunter could see her struggling. He helped her with the bar, and set it bach into it's holders. "That was not easy." Trixie panted. "It's not supposed to be. Anyway, I'm guessing you want to know how much that was." Trixie nodded. "It was 42 tons." "Wow. Anyway, what's next?" "Well, you have two more sets." Hunter grinned. "Oh." "With each set, you add weight, and subtract reps. This one, you need to do six, but I'm adding one ton." Hunter did not lie. After her six, he added two tons, making the weight an even 45 tons, and Trixie benched the 4 reps she needed. "Next are biceps, which we will take care of by curling."

(BTW, writer's note. Two chapters ago, I screwed up all her numbers. Her maxes shoould actually be Squat: 75 tons, Dead: 80, Curl: 20 each arm, Lats: 35 I forgot how to math that night.)

"Okay, here we are." The two dragons arrived at their destination. "We're going to do the same 8-6-4 sets. Get ready." Trixie took the bar, and started to curl it. "How much was that set?" "35 tons." "Wow. I really like the sound of that." "Ready for set two." Trixie did her other sets, eventually making it up to 37 tons, which is very close to her max. "Next are lats." They made their way to the lat pull down machine. "Okay, same set rules here." The couple continued this with pull ups, curl ups, shrugs, tricep extensions, and more. After two and a half hours, Trixie threw in the towel. "I'm exhausted Hunter, but I feel great." "You went through every exercise I could think of for the upper body!' Hunter quipped. "You're doing well. You should see your results soon. Anyway, I think you need some ice cream." "I agree." Trixie panted. "Before we leave the gym Hunter, can you do something for me?" "Sure." "Can you curl me your max. However, could you make the bar look as heavy as it is?" "Okay." Hunter walked over to the barbel corner of the gym, and loaded it with as many 5 kt plates as he could fit. "Well, this is an issue. The bar is not long enough." He said as he held the 80 kt bar in his hand. "This is almost enough for one arm curls." "Hunter, just use your powers." "I usually try to refrain from using powers while working out, but I think this exception can be forgiven." He lengthened the bar so he could fit the 180 kt he needed on the bar. The bar was longer than Hunter was tall, seeing how it had 18 plates on each side. "One curl." Hunter curled the bar, but it felt too easy. He curled it again, and again, and again. After 8 reps, he put the bar down. He walked over to the measuring machine. He still had the same exact measurements, including weight. "Usually when I get stronger, I increase in weight. More muscle. I think the muscle fibers themselves strengthened." Sure enough, that is exactly what happened. Hunter's strength increased 10 times. The machine read him his new maxes.

Bench: 2 Mt
Squat: 3 Mt
Deadlift: 3.5 Mt
Curling: 800 kt per arm. 1.6 Mt using both.
Lats/Pull ups: 1.5 Mt
Abs machine: 200 Mt
Durability: Nothing can harm at all.
Running/Flying speed: Mach 7.5 k (7500)

"Huh. Millions of tons, that's new." Hunter smiled. He lengthened the bar until it was 100 feet long. He then filled the whole thing with plates. Finally, he made sure that the bar was strong enough not to break. "Okay, there are 320 5 kt plates on here. That should be enough." It was. Although difficult, Hunter successfully curled the 1,600,000 ton (3,200,000,000 pound) bar. Hunter used his powers to get rid of the ridiculous bar. "Okay, shower time." The two decided that they did not want to shower though. They took a romantic bath together instead. Trixie loved to lay with Hunter and is muscles. Might as well get clean doing it. Hunter was not very fond of showers anyway. Soap always got stuck in his abs because they're so deep. (3 inches deep to be exact).

After their romantic bath, the two got dressed. They both wore a tank top and shorts. They walked outside and took off. On their way into town, they noticed a train heading for broken track. "Trixie, our ice cream may have to wait." The two flew down to the train. They calculated that it was moving 120 mph, and that if it didn't slow down in two miles, it would derail. The two dragons flew in front of the train, and braced for impact. Just like in a superhero movie, the train pushed them into the ground, slowing gradually. By the time the train reached the missing track, it was stopped. "What was that about?" The conductor yelled from the engine room. "The rails are broken. The train was about to derail." Trixie yelled. "Well, thank you!" The conductor replied. "Who are you?" "That's for us to know, and for you to figure out." With that, the two dragons took off, soaring quickly into the skies. "Well, that was interesting" Hunter laughed. "Yeah. Did you see me? I helped." Trixie pointed out. "You certainly did. I think you deserve that ice cream even more." The two had a midair hug, and continued their journey to the ice cream store.

The two landed in front of Frostie's Ice Cream Parlor. "Huh, Est. 1902. It's been around a while." Hunter remarked. "Yeah, but there's a reason. It's the best around." Trixie replied. The two entered the parlor. "Welcome to Frostie's. What would you like?" The penguin behind the counter asked "Could I have a strawberry and chocolate milkshake?" Hunter asked. "And could I have a medium cup of Rocky Road?" Trixie asked. "Okay. Coming up." She replied. "This place has been here a while." Trixie said. "It's been a family tradition to run the parlor. I'm generation 4." "Interesting. I can't wait to have my shake." Hunter said. "It's my first time here." "Is it?" The penguin asked. "I think I'll add something special to your shake then." Once the shake was done, the penguin took it to the topping area, where she put white chocolate syrup into the mixture. "Thank you!" Hunter yelled. He was excited. He loves white chocolate. "Here you go. That will be $4.50." The penguin said. Hunter handed her a $5 bill. "Keep the change." "Thank you, and enjoy your ice cream." The two sat down, and had their cream. "I see why this place has been around for 113 years. This is amazing." "Thank you." The penguin giggled. "Could I have a XL shake to go. This time, with hazelnut and chocolate?" "Sure. We call that the Nutella Special." "Perfect." The penguin made the shake, and gave it back to Hunter. "That will be $3.50." Hunter handed her another 5. "Keep the change again. This is too good." The two left the parlor, milkshake in hand. "We'll have to remember this place." The couple took off, heading back to the house.
1141112111121121111211111111111111122121.title: Training.  Now With 100% More Train

choices: September 18th.  First day ruling heaven for the trio
Trixie wants to work out, again
1141112111121121111211111111111111122121.content:
"Hey Troy! Hey Mary! Funny meeting you here!" Hunter yelled at the couple flying. "Hey, long time no see!" Troy laughed as he and Mary approached the other couple. "How's the wedding planning?" Trixie asked. "It's going very smoothly. We're having our wedding on the same day as Lance. Might as well make it easy." Mary responded. "So, what brings you here?" "We went out for ice cream. Trixie wanted to work out, so we did. Since she was very good, we got ice cream." Hunter stated, showing the Milkshake. "What about you guys?" "We went to a sports game." Mary responded. "That sounds fun. Anyway, can I speak to Troy for a minute?" Hunter asked. "Sure. We'll meet you home." Trixie answered. "See ya." Mary yelled as she and Trixie flew home. "Hunter, what's going on?" "I'm not sure if you noticed, but we've gotten much stronger, again." "What do you mean? I'm not bigger or heavier." Troy responded confused. "Well, the actual muscle fibers got stronger. The weird thing is that our muscles were not this strong when we went to bed, and none of us used our powers to make this happen. Any ideas?" Hunter rambled. "No. How strong are we now?" Troy wondered. "I'll show you. Follow me." The two dragons flew off at speeds unimaginable by most.

Approx. 32 minutes later:

"Okay, the only place I could show you this is in here." Hunter explained as he entered the Gravity Gym. "I also came here because Lance is here for some reason. Anyway, while Trixie was working out, she wanted to see me curl using a traditional barbell. It took over 300 5 kt plates!" Hunter explained. "I calculated my maxes, and they were measured in megatons. Which reminds me. LANCE!?" "YEAH!" he yelled. "GET OVER HERE!" "OKAY!" Lance flew over, barbell in hand. "I can't seem to find a weight with enough resistance." "Well, that answers that question. For some reason, our muscle fibers strengthened, but nobody used their powers to do that. They just did that on their own." "Maybe it has to do with us transcending the realm of Gods." Troy suggested. "Yeah, but we did that a while ago." "I know why." A mysterious voice said. All of the sudden, the human God appeared. "Your mortal forms strengthened because your muscles wanted to. They've become capable of increasing their strength on their own, without your consent." "Well, that's annoying. I like having limits to my strength, even if they are too large to matter." Lance complained. "There, I've used my powers to get rid of that. It would get annoying very quickly." "But did you truly get rid of it?" The human asked. "By the way you said that, no. Hang on a minute." After saying that, Hunter transformed into his Super God form. Troy and Lance immediately followed suit. "Now I've removed it." Lance smirked. "The only thing this form cannot do is let other Gods transcend into Super Gods." Hunter explained. "In fact, I just realized something. If we want, which we wouldn't, we could take away the powers of other Gods." "Just in case someone corrupts, we'll handle it." Troy grinned as he reverted to his normal God form. "Okay, from now on, unless the true need arises, our mortal forms will not become physically stronger than they are currently." Lance said. "Agreed." Troy and Hunter said. "Anyway, isn't there something that's supposed to take place in one day?" Hunter grinned. "Oh, the weddings. Let's get back to the house." The three gods transformed into their Super Gods, and teleported to the house. (Remember how I said the Gravity Gym cannot be teleported to. I never said anything about from. Take that Plot-holes!)

One Day Later

Heaven, a place of wonder. Most wonder if it truly exists. Spoiler alert, in this story, it does, as shown previously. How else would Lance be marrying Alecia and Troy marrying Mary in Heaven right now. Anyway, the six dragons were all in their God forms, because only angels, Gods, and those taken there by Gods can enter Heaven. Hunter wouldn't be allowed in in his mortal form, even though he is technically one of the God of Gods. Rules are rules. Anyway, onto the story at hand. The six golden dragons were all standing in front of a large marriage alter, waiting for the Human God to marry those getting married. Hunter and Trixie were off to the side, sort of being Best Man and Maid of Honor respectively. Once the human showed up, the ceremony began. An angel was playing a lovely organ, and all of the Gods in heaven were watching. Soon, Lance and Troy walked down the aisle, both in very fancy suits that somehow were not tearing under all that muscle. Hey, God powers work on clothing too. Soon, everyone was standing, watching as the two beautiful Goddesses walked down, both in flowing white dresses, matching the clouds they were walking on.

Some unspecified amount of time later.

"Well, that took a while." "Yeah, it must be confusing marrying two couples at one time." "Yeah, but that doesn't matter. Now, Troy is finally my husband." "Yeah, thank God. Or in this case, thank us." The six all laughed at that joke coming from Alecia. They make Oh My God jokes all the time. "Anyway, let's celebrate." The six left Heaven, and went to one of the fanciest restaurants in the world: Masagawa Restaurant in Japan. They were in the mood for sushi. Plus, this one was perfect for their wedding celebration.

The six arrived at the restaurant, and got a table. To make a long story short, the appetites of three muscle giants can be large, and the girls were decently muscular too. So when the bill totaling $4000 worth of Yen came to the table, those paying were not surprised. (Or worried) After that, the six returned home, ready to do the thing most couples do after getting married that I do not want to mention to keep this story line as age appropriate as possible. However, the subject matter may make this difficult. Either way, they did that.
1141112111121121111211111111111111122121.title: More Weddings

choices: Hunter gives him his adress and tells him to ask for trixie
1141112111121121111211111111111111122121.content:
Well, it wasn't PEOPLE, more like one person. but still. Hunter flew down low and saw a little kid getting picked on by 2 thugs. they beat him up and took the little guys money. Hunter snarled and spoke

"Why don't you guys pick on someone your own size?!"

they looked around to see where it came from. "or better yet, someone BIGGER!" hunter crashed into the ground and towered over the thugs snarling. "you think your so tough picking on innocent little kids?!"

"hey, stay back, we don't want any trouble!" they said nervously pulling out knives. Hunter scoffed. his scales were too tough for those. he grabbed them by their necks and clunked their heads together knocking them both out. then he set them down and walked over to the kid. It was a green wolf pup. he wore a hoodie and sweatpants, and was both amazed, and nervous at the sight of the dragon. "you ok little guy?" hunter said kneeling down, "they didn't hurt you?"

"N...no. thanks for saving me." he said sheepishly

"its ok. where's your mommy and daddy?" hunter asked

"Their dead." he sighed, "I don't have a home. I'm too poor to afford one, and nobody will give me a job cause I'm so young."

Hunter couldn't believe it. he checked this kids memorys and saw he was right. his parents died in a train accident, and he had been a wanderer his whole life.

"whats your name little guy?" he asked putting his hand on the pups shoulder

"My name is Joseph." the pup said

"nice to meet you, im Hunter. do you get bullied a lot?"

"yeah. I really really wish I was big like you. then nobody would pick on me." joseph said

the dragon god felt pity on this little guy. he felt he should help. no problem, he could just snap his fingers and this kid would instantly be wealthy, big, and happy. but... he would have to alter the kids memory, if he did that, it wouldn't be special... but could he trust this kid?

"Ok, kid, I can help you. I'm a god and I can make you the biggest wolf alive, but you gotta promise me something."

"what?" he asked eagerly

"Promise you will keep it a secret, and not tell anyone that I'm a god."

"I promise!" Joseph said

Hunter checked, and saw he would keep his promise, so he smiled "ok stand back!"

he took a deep breath expanding his chest and blew a green flame onto Joseph. it consumed him, but didn't hurt. the flame grew covering him from view. Once it cleared, there stood a humungous green wolf as big and as old as Hunter.

"You did it!" he said pulling hunter into a hug. hunter hugged him back

"you can make all the money youll need by wrestling and advertising." hunter said

he remembered his competition, "bye Joseph"

"wait! can I join you?" joseph asked

hunter stopped, this kid would fit in with his life, and he seemed like a great guy, why not?
1141112111121121111211111111111111122121.title: people in trouble!

choices: Hunter has a dream where he talks with his godly parents.
Hunter wakes up when Lance knocks at the door.
11411121111212.content:
The charity event ended and the large crowd began to disperse. However, some stayed around to have their items signed and photos taken with Hunter and Lance. Hunter signed things that he never thought anyone would want signed. After the rabid fans finally dispersed, the two giants talked to the event organizer. The event had raised tens of thousands of dollars for charity and people were paying through the nose to get Hunter and Lance to show off their strength at other events. Hunter and Lance left happy and satisfied.

Once they got to Hunter's penthouse, Lance said good-bye and headed back to his own house, giving Hunter the rest of the day to himself. He lay on his over-sized bed, pondering what to do. He could work out in his private gym, or go shopping with his millions of dollars, though he might be mobbed out in public...

Hunter's thoughts were interrupted when he heard the familiar ring of the phone. He rolled over to the side of the bed and picked it up.

"Hello?" Hunter boomed.

"Hey! How's my favorite wall breaker?" a familiar voice responded. Hunter's stepdad.

"Hey dad, what's up?" Hunter asked.

"I've got some exciting news, Hunter! Tina and I are getting married!"

Hunter had to search through his memories even faster than the last time to figure out who Tina was. Apparently, she was his stepdad's girlfriend of 3 years. She had a thing for muscle guys, so she was at one of Hunter's competitions when she and his dad met. She originally was attracted to him for his competitor-like muscles, but through dating she found him to be kind and loving too. Tina herself was also very kind and supportive, coming to all of Hunter's competitions and events and treating him as well as a real mother would.

Luckily, all of this information was given to Hunter in a second so he could answer in a normal amount of time. "That's great! Good for you two!" Hunter responded, his happy energy quickly renewed.

"Hey, we're at the house right now, so why don't you drop by for a little?" Hunter's dad asked.

"Alright, I'll be there soon. See ya!" Hunter hung up the phone and got ready to go.

Twenty minutes later, Hunter was walking up to his dad's house. It was the same house he had lived in during the previous reality. Hunter had the money to buy his dad pretty much any house in the world, but his dad insisted that he enjoyed the comfort his current home gave him.

Hunter tapped lightly on the door (which still sounded like a hard knock) and soon his dad opened the door for them. They embraced in a hug that would shatter the spines of most people in the world and Hunter's dad let him in.

Hunter's dad led Hunter to the living room, where Tina was sitting on the couch waiting for them. Though Hunter had saw her briefly during the memory flash, being able to fully stare at her really made his jaw drop. Though she was in her mid 40s like his stepdad, she had the body of a teenager. She had luscious curves and breasts that strained against her shirt. Along with that, being the girlfriend of the father/trainer of the world's top bodybuilder had convinced her to start working out. She had a fit, toned body, complete with very visible six pack abs. She was drop dead gorgeous.

The three sat on the couch for hours, talking about everything from protein shakes to good TV shows. Tina had a smile on her face the entire time and was always supportive of the two men. Hunter and his dad regularly looked at each other, both knowing that they both had a good woman in their lives.

Eventually it got late, so Hunter politely excused himself and jogged home. Before he knew it, he was in his boxers lying down to sleep. Though he had thought it many times before, Hunter was extremely happy. He was the strongest man on earth, he was a millionaire, his dad was happy, he had a loving mother...

Hunter was so busy listing the good things in his life that he didn't even realize it when he slipped into a deep sleep...
11411121111212.title: Hunter gets a call from his stepdad

114111211112121.content:
As Hunter was sleeping, he saw nothing but darkness at first but brightened into a pure white room. He had no idea where he was or what he was doing in there. Hunter truned around to see no one anywhere. The place was deserted.

"It is good to see you again Hunter." The voice startled Hunter not knowing where it came from. He looked around the room once more and said, "Who's there." After one more random turn, two giant tigers appeared out of no where. They looked majestic and beautiful with their unique garment made out of jewls and gold. Although it would seem that Hunter would not know these remarkable strangers, he did.

"Mom, Dad?" Hunter asked. "Yes, Hunter," Said the woman, "It is us." His father the spoke, "We are sorry that we could not be in your mortal life. We had business to attend to and it would have been very lonely for you with us."
"I understand." Said Hunter.
"Hunter," Said his mother, "We saw how you used your powers and we are very proud that you are having a good life in the mortal world. You're almost as strong as your father!" Hunter blushes a little bit but his mother continued talking. "Although you have a good life Hunter, there is more to being a god than just the luxury."

Hunter was puzzled by this. "What do you mean?" He asked. His father answered, "We mean that it is time for you to take on the responsibilities you were destined to complete. You having been using your powers for yourself but now it is time to use it for others." Hunter thought about this hardly. He loved his powers and the life that it gave him. Was he willing to sacrifice some of his selfish desires to help others?

One thought mad his decision: "If his powers gave him so much goodness towards him, imaging how others would be like if they were exposed to it." Hunter said to his parents, "I understand and ready to take on my duties as a tiger god." His parents smiled proudly to him after he said that. "Good to hear, my son." Said his mother.

"What do you want me to do?" Hunter asked. "Your first task Hunter regards your friend Lance." Said his father. Hunter was a little worried by the sound of that.
"What do you mean? Is he all right?"
"Yes, he is fine. But you will need to accomplish your task."
"You must start by telling him of who you are." Said the mother.

Hunter was more confused than ever now. "What do you mean tell him? What is my task?" "All will be clear once you tell him."
"Wait!"

Before Hunter could ask his parents anymore questions, he woke up to a cold sweat with the morning sun beaming through his bedroom window.
114111211112121.title: Hunter has a dream where he talks with his godl...

1141112111121211.content:
Hunter sat up and wiped the sweat off of his forehead, still breathing hard. He wasn't sure whether that was a dream or not, but the fact that it was so vivid made him almost positive. But what should he do about it, especially when he didn't even know what to do?

His deep thought was interrupted by a knock on the door. Not bothering to put on anything over his boxers, Hunter got up and walked over to the door, opening it to see a smiling face. It was Lance.

"Hey bro, what's up?" Lance greeted.

Hunter's mind went back to the talk he had with his parents. The one thing they did tell him about his destiny was that it involved Lance. Though that did involve revealing his biggest secret...

Lance could obviously see that Hunter was in deep thought about something, and his voice became more serious. "What's the matter?" he asked.

Hunter considered it for a second. Revealing that you're a god is obviously a big deal. But Lance was such a good friend, and had never broken Hunter's trust. Hunter decided to go for it.

Hunter sat down on his bed. "Look, I'm going to tell you something, but you have to swear to keep it a secret," he said.

Lance nodded. "Dude, you know I'd never tell your secret. What is it?"

Hunter took a deep breath and, taking a leap of faith, said, "I'm a god."

There was a long silence between the two friends. Hunter was waiting to see what Lance would say. Would he be afraid? Angry?

Lance finally broke the silence. "You serious?"

Hunter nodded. "You know how my stepdad raised me because my real parents died in a car crash?" Hunter asked. "Well, the truth is that they didn't die in a car crash at all. They were secretly gods who had a kid in the mortal world before leaving to resume their godly duties. I'm that kid."

There was another long silence. Lance stood up. "Dude, you know I'd trust you with my life, but that's a pretty crazy story. How can you prove it?"

Hunter stood up right next to him. "Is there anything that you want, something big that you've never been able to have?"

Lance gained an even more serious expression before going into deep thought. "Well... there is one thing I've never been able to do that I've always wanted. I think everyone has. But for me, I've always wanted to..."
