13.content:
Hunter was so psyched! Can you imagine, him, a demigod? Wow! He was so fired up, he just HAD to go tell his best friend Alec about this! He couldn't hold it in any longer, he was about to BURST if he couldn't go over to his friend's house and tell him about it!

"Man! I need to go over to Alec's house right NOW!" Hunter shouted out loud.

Suddenly, there was a flash of light, and Hunter disappeared from where he was standing, which was outside on the street, just a block away from his house. In fact, he could see his house from where he was standing. In a blink of an eye, he was suddenly standing in front of Alec's house!

"Whoa! How did I get here so fast?" Hunter wondered. "I must have gotten here because I just wished to be here!"

Hunter knocked on the door and Alex, an anthro dog with brown hair, opened the door. Alec was slightly shorter than Hunter, but he had a friendly face and he immediately recognized his best friend from school when the door opened up.

"Hunter! Dude! Whoa, man! You've been lifting weights?" Alec grinned.

"Listen, I gotta tell you a secret!" Hunter whispered to Alec as he followed him to his bedroom and closed his door behind him. The tiger and the dog sat down on Alec's bed as Hunter got a little more serious. "An angel appeared to me and told me that my parents are gods and that I'm a demigod!"

"What?" Alec replied in disbelief. "You're kidding me, right?"

"Okay, dude! Stand up! I'll show you!"

Alec stood up and presented himself right before his best friend, in the middle of his bedroom.

"Name something you always wanted changed to your body!" Hunter mentioned.

"Uhh... I'd like to be a few inches taller!"

"Alright! I want you to grow three inches taller!" Hunter commanded.

Suddenly, Alec felt a tingling in his back legs! His rear dog-legs began to grow longer and longer, making him stand a few inches taller, just as Hunter had commanded it! When the growth spurt was over, Alec realized that he was now standing at the same height as his friend!

"Whoa! We're the same height now!" Alec noted. "That was amazing! You did it!"

"Told you I was a demigod!" Hunter grinned, as he folded his arms across his chest.

"Wow! Hmmm..." Alec pondered, as he thought about what Hunter had just done to him...
13.title: Hunter visits his best friend.

choices: Hunter and Alec go to the gym
Hunter and Alec go to the mall
Hunter and Alec go to the park
131.content:
"Thats's amazing!" Alec said, as he looked down and noted that he had indeed grown a few inches taller. "You just said the words and I grew! Just like that!"

"You got it!" Hunter grinned. "So... Do you want anything else?"

"Umm..." Alec pondered, while he looked down and glanced at his own body. "I'm kinda tired of being a skinny dog. I would like to be bigger..."

"Uhmm... Sure!" Hunter chuckled, looking at his best friend.

"Well... Would it be too much to ask..." Alec began. "Can you increase my muscles?"

"Sure!" Hunter grinned. "I was waiting for you to get the courage to ask me!"

Hunter then got up from the bed and walked over to Alec, placing his paws on his shoulders.

"I want you to become a big, teen, muscle-dog!"

Alec was overcome by that weird prickling feeling in every muscle in his body! This time, every muscle began to inflate like balloons which were being inflated with air! His arms thickened as his biceps filled out while his calves and quads all became large round balls of muscle! His pecs bulged out from his chest into nice round globes of rock solid muscles while his abs popped up all over his torso. He had suddenly become a very muscular dog indeed!!!

"Whooooooff!!!" Alec barked out of happiness, as he realized how big he has become.

"There! Now you got your muscles, Alec!" Hunter laughed. "Now, what shall we do?"

"Ummm..." Alec pondered. "How about..."
131.title: Alec asks Hunter to make him more muscular

choices: Alec picks the truck up and rips it in half easy. He wants to grow even bigger.
Same as 1 but he wants to show off more after getting as big as the arena.
1311.content:
"Let's head to the gym!" "Great idea but first..." replied Hunter. Alec suddenly shrank back down to his original size. "You won't like us when we're angry.." Hunter growled. Alec beamed and nodded. Suddenly he dropped to the floor grunting as his tail grew to the length of the bed! His spine added 3 feet to his height making him 8 ft tall. His socks were no match for his expanding paws. He gave a grin and looked at his hind paws, the socks began to shred, the toes poking through until his socks exploded off and his feet added another 4 ft to his frame making 12 ft tall! His legs made short work of his jeans. Those muscles bulged out so much they turned his already dewarved jeans into shorts. He stood up and flexed as his chest began to inflate to mega proportions. His abs grew into a massive 12-pack while his pecs plopped out 5 ft, streching the fabric of his now skintight t-shirt to the limit until it ripped up the middle and a flex soon sorted the rest out. Alec stood up to his full height, towering over Hunter, beaming with satisfaction. He flexed showing off all his massive muscles in full. Hunter's eyes went wide with amazement and whispered "Woah! You look like you could break a truck in half!" "I CAN, and if you take us somewere we won't be seen i will". Hunter smiled and said "You're on!"

In an instant they found themselves in an abandoned wrestling arena. Alec was staring at a nearby pickup truck. Alec stomped over, causing the concrete floor to crack and buckle and shatter all the windows.

WHAT HAPPENS NEXT???
1311.title: Muscle Growth to the MAX!

13112.content:
he picked up the truck, then with muscles bulging he heaved it over his head. hunter watched
"hehe you can lift it!" he said, "now show me you can rip it in half!"
Alec nodded and strained. at first nothing appeared to happen, but slowly they heard metal creaking, then it grew louder, and louder, until finally the truck ripped apart.

alec Cheered but suddenly felt himself growing even huger,
"for every feat of strength you perform you grow bigger" hunter said, and it was so

1312.content:
"Dude! Let's go to the mall and have some fun over there!" Alec suggested to Hunter. "For sure you'll meet some guys there you can use your powers on!!"

"Okay! Let's go!" Hunter said, as he hopped off the bed and grabbed hold of Alec's arm. Then he snapped his fingers, and in a blink of an eye, both boys were standing in the center of the large shopping mall in the middle of town!

"Look at all these people!" Alec smiled, as the boys found them surrounded by hundreds of people who were walking around the large mall, carrying bags, small baskets, or purses with goods, items, clothes, food, or packages containing gifts or other small items which they had purchased during their visits to the shops in the mall.

"Now, we can have some fun... Oh, looky!" Hunter grinned, as he spotted three anthro lion teen boys, wandering around the mall as they were looking over the large display window in front of the sporting goods store.

One boy was tall and skinny, the second was short and skinny, and the third was short and fat. To Hunter, this was a golden opportunity to have some fun using his divine abilities.

"Go and make those three a little more muscular!" Alec said, as he pointed at the three guys who were standing next to each other, gawking at the exercise equipment that none of them could afford.

Suddenly, the chubby anthro lion's big belly melted away and his fat legs became thinner, Every ounce of fat disappeared from his body. He now looked like the other two guys. Next, all three of them started growing more muscular, all at once! Their arms bulged out, their legs thickened as their calves inflated, their quads grew thicker, and their pecs became big and round with amazing muscle. Their abs were defined with washboard buttons and their physiques now resembled those of lions who competed in the Olympics!

"Whoa! Look at us!"

"We're huge!"

"Hey we look like we belong in the gym!"

All three of them stood there, flexing and admiring their new bodies, while Hunter and Alec just grinned at each other.

"Let's find other dudes to grow!" Hunter said.

"Yeah..." Alec said, as he turned and wondered which way to go...
1312.title: Hunter and Alec go to the mall

choices: Alex and Hunter think of a way to surprise Mr. Hollis.
Alex and Hunter do nothing special in Mr. Hollis's class.  They go to next class
Alex challenges Mr. Hollis to name something impossible for him to do.
135.content:
It is the next day. Alec waits for Hunter to arrive to school. Sue, Betty, and Fred pass him. "Hi Alex. Why are you here instead of in your first class room like you usually are?"

Alec replies, "I'm waiting for Hunter. I need to ask him something. You guys go on ahead. I'll catch up with you later."

Eventually Hunter arrived. Alec rushed to meet him. "Hunter, I want to stay with you all day. Can you switch my class schedule around so that we have the same classes all day?"

Hunter said. "We are in the same classrooms all day long." And it was so.

Their first class is in general science. Mr Hollis is explaining how a lever works. "The seesaw is an example of a lever. An adult and a small child can seesaw if the adult sits close to the middle and the child sits far away from the middle. The child's less weight exerts more force because he is farther away from the center point. When the seesaw is balanced, there is an equation. The weight on one side times the distance of that weight from the center is equal to the weight on the other side times its distance from the center."

Alex whispered to Hunter, "I wonder if there is any way we can surprise Mr. Hollis."
135.title: Alec and Hunter have more fun at school

choices: Hunter goes to the boys locker room.
Hunter goes to the weight room.
14.content:
Hunter looked around, many options swirling around in his head. He finally decided to head back to school, thinking that he could maybe get an idea there. Hunter went back in the direction he came from, back towards his school.

Hunter walked through the doors to his school and started looking around. The school was mostly empty, aside from some kids who were involved in after school activities. Hunter was looking for someone or something to change when he heard voices. Panicking, Hunter hid behind a wall, close enough so that he could hear what the people were saying. He peered around the wall to see who he was listening to.

The first person was Mary, a shy bookworm who didn't have many friends. She was a panther, short with nerdy glasses and messy blond hair. The second person was Derek, a lion. He was captain of the football team, not to mention a jerk who pushed everyone around because of his superior muscles.

"Um... Derek..." Mary said, her voice soft and quiet.

"What is it?" Derek asked, the annoyance in his voice evident.

"Would you... possibly consider... going on a date with me?" Mary asked, finally managing to get the words out of her mouth.

There was a slight pause as Derek took in what Mary had said. Then he burst out laughing.

"Yeah right! Like I'd ever go out with you!" Derek laughed, not even acknowledging Mary as he walked off.

Hunter saw that tears were beginning to form in Mary's eyes as she sat down. Hunter wanted to go and knock Derek's lights out, but he heard Mary say something.

"Why does no one like me? Why am I not beautiful?" Mary asked herself between sobs.

Hunter felt really bad for Mary and wanted to do something for her. "This is what gods do, right? They help people," Hunter thought. Hunter decided to grant Mary's wish.

Hunter focused on Mary's first change. She grew from 5' up to 6', her legs becoming slimmer. Her waist thinned out, giving her the hourglass figure that was envied by most women. Her breasts, formerly very small, ballooned out into C-cups that gave her a stunning look. Mary had been too busy crying to notice the changes before, but now she began to notice that something was up.

Next Hunter changed her face. Her lips became full and red, making her mouth one that any boy would want to kiss. Hunter took away her need for glasses, revealing her gorgeous green eyes. Speaking of her eyes, Hunter altered them slightly to make them look seductive and luring. Mary's hair came next, straightening itself out and lengthening down her back.

As Mary seriously began to wonder what was going on, Hunter changed her personality. Before, Mary was shy and not very outgoing. Hunter made it so that she was cheerful and outgoing, proud of her own looks but not vain or stuck up.

Finally, Hunter changed reality so that Mary had always been this beautiful. Her tomboyish clothes morphed into a revealing tank top, short skirt, and high heels, all designer. She was no longer crying, instead checking out her makeup in the mirror. Hunter smiled, knowing that he was going to like changing things, but wondering what to do next...
14.title: Hunter goes back to school.

choices: Hunter exits the boys locker room and sees Mary flirting with a leopard
142.content:
Hunter has second thoughts. His conscience weighs on him, and he darts into the boys locker room.

He takes one look in the mirror and thinks, "What have I done?"

Knowing in his heart that Mary is a wonderful person, Hunter wonders why he has played into such foolishness. Like the angel said, he is supposed to use his demigod powers for good.

Now, in a moral crisis, and fearing that he has made a terrible mistake, Hunter hears echoes of cheers and shouts. The basketball team has just won their game, and is leaving the court for the locker room...
142.title: Hunter goes to the boys locker room.

choices: See what's there to do in the palace
145.content:
Hunter couldn't lay his eyes off of Mary during class. She was stunningly beautiful and he was the reason why. He felt proud but envious. Hunter was happy that he could help someone like Mary but he wanted to be with her also. After pondering for a solution, he Hunter came to one. He wanted to change reality so he could be with Mary and help others with his powers. Hunter concentrated on this wish. The more he did, the more sleepy he got. Eventually, Hunter collapsed on his desk before the school bell rang.

Sunshine from a nearby window caught Hunter's eyes. He opened them to find himself in an unfamiliar area. Hunter was in a huge round bed and everything in the room from wooden furniture to the carpets was lined with precious metals and jewels. He stood up to have the floor squeek underneath him. He went to a full view mirror to find a muscle-bound titan in front of him! The mirror showed Hunter in his silk boxers outlining his gigantic thighs with 10-pack abs, bulging biceps, and some slight facial hair. Hunter flexed a bicep and it grew to the size of a beachball! He touched his bicep only to see it was as hard as diamonds! He felt power rushing all over his new body. He then noticed the new facial hair and height. Memories ran through Hunter's head and found out he was now 24 years old. Memories overwhelmed him when he reached the double doors in his room.

Hunter noticed the double doors of his room and opened them wide. He found himself on a balcony revealing a whole new world! There were building all different shapes and sizes, remarkable green and natural parks, and people that appeared scrawnier than him. Hunter then realized what happened. He began to remember that he was now the king of utopian world and he was a great king to others. Hunter felt overwhelmed with this new reality. He had new responsibilities he was expected to meet. However, he was satisfied that he was now living in his fantasy world. "Enjoying the view?" Said a voice behind him.

Hunter looked back to see a finely dressed and 24-year-old Mary. She looked slightly muscular than when he transformed in the last reality but not enough to be considered a bodybuilder. "Mary." Said Hunter. He then comes her in open and powerful arms. Mary accepts his offering and give each other a good morning kiss.
145.title: Hunter changes the enitre world.

choices: Hunter goes to another soccer field
Hunter goes to the baseball field
Hunter goes to the football field
Hunter goes to the basketball court
15.content:
Hunter was totally pumped up about his new divine powers and he couldn't wait to use them on his classmates in order to help them out whenever they were needed. He decided to get out of the classroom as soon as the last period was over and to see what was going on near the athletic fields after all the classes were over. This was where all the student athletes were hanging out, and Hunter figures that this would be the perfect place to test his powers. He could help out the football players, the baseball players, or the soccer players, depending on who was having their practice sessions that afternoon.

A small soccer team called the Phantoms were having their soccer practice at the soccer field at the back of the school at that point in time, and Hunter decided to go take a look. He wandered over to the bleachers and sat down, watching a big group of anthro dogs and wolves all dressed in black shorts, green socks and green jerseys with black cleats battle it out against the Wolverines, who were dressed in black shorts and cleats but in red jerseys and red socks instead.

Since the Phantoms were the home team, all the kids in the bleachers were cheering for their boys who were dressed in black shorts and in green jerseys and socks.

Hunter sat down in the bleachers and he realized right away that a few of the boys were growing tired after spending over thirty minutes chasing after the soccer ball and trying to defend their goal from the relentless attacks that the Wolverines were dishing out. Three players, all of them were wolves, sat down, all sweaty and tired, as they drank some water and they began to talk about the game as Hunter overheard them.

"Man, these guys are tough!"

"We gotta get through their defense!"

"We need two more goals and we got this game in the bag!"

Hunter noted that the three boys were named Giovanni, Anthony and Tristan.

The three boys stood up and slowly walked back on the field as they waited for the referee to blow the whistle.

"I can help out our guys before the seecond half starts!" Hunter grinned. "I want our guys to gain ten pounds of muscle each!"

Suddenly, each one of the boys on the Phantoms soccer team were suddenly overcome by a tingling sensation in their muscles. All six of them, who were now standing on the field, began to experience a slight episode of muscle growth: Tristan, Anthony, Giovanni, Nicholas, George, and Carlos. All six of them felt their calves bulge out a bit; their quads inflated a little, their abs became firmer, their biceps became harder, their pecs inflated and their biceps enlarged.

Giovanni and Anthony quietly stared at each other.

"Dude.... Are you like... feeling... stronger?" Giovanni whispered.

"Yeah..."

Six other players from the Wolverines got on the field when the ref blew the whistle.

The Phantoms attacked the goal right away and Giovanni scored a goal within a minute! Then, three minutes later, Anthony scored the next one! Finally, Tristan scored the third goal about ten minutes later! The home team ended up winning the game by four goals!

Hunter only grinned as he saw the results of his powers and wondered where to go next...
15.title: Hunter goes to the athletic field at school.

155.content: Where Exactly? I feft a few choices.
155.title: Hunter goes somewhere else

info.brief_description: A young anthro tiger learns that he has the powers of a demigod! GPs for first addition!
info.description:
Hunter is an average tiger anthro living with his stepfather who treats him badly. He is depressed about this, but he soon learns that he has the power of a demigod, which means he can do anything he wants! He can grow others' muscles, make them bigger or smaller, and pretty much anything Hunter can imagine. Follow Hunter and see what he does!

200 GPs for your first addition!
